1.content:
You are driving on a beautiful afternoon on the country side. The beaches and smell of the air engulf your senses as the wonders of spring overtake you...that is, until a clap of thunder shatters the dreamworld around you, and you realize its best to put up the cover of your car.

as you go to do this, your knee hits something which sends the car flying down a hill and into a stonewall at the bottom. Your car...is, in a word, broken.

"Great! What the hell am I supposed to do?" you wonder aloud, as something catches your eye. Its a huge mansion with spires taller than you have ever seen. You have no choice but to look for shelter at the building that looks like it belongs in Disney World more than your little town.

after knocking on the huge door, it slowly creeps open with a strange looking man straing at you. he looks like a cross between your dad, and Vincent Price.

"welcome, child. I am Lord Hugo Prosperio, and I own this house? I see that you are in need of assistance and shelter from the storm? well, fee free to spend the night here, altought you may not leave the same. Take any of the rooms, and feel free to roam around. if you need me, give a shout." and he seems to vanish from the room leaving you to pick which room you want.
1.title: a trip to the Mansion

11.content:
You open the door and you see the floor littered with clothing from previous guests. you also see several items around, such as a strang looking booth. You also see on the nightstand two items, a bottle with what looks like baby formula, and the other and Ensure shake unopened...

You plop down on the bed and your limbs begin to rest, but your mind is going crazy. There is so much to explore in the room, and you want to look at all the stuff. then the words of the owner enter your head "you may not leave the same"

what could that mean?

or the more important question. which "thing" in the room do you want to check out first?
11.title: The Age Room

choices: an elegant jasmine scented oriental dress
a child's sailor suit that smells of bubble gum
111.content:
It had been raining outside before you came in, and you just feel the desire to get out of your soaking wet clothes.

Looking around you, you see a number of outfits in a nearby wardrobe as well a selection of outfits laying on a nearby bed, some in an open closet, and a couple of large dressers so full that clothing is spilling out of them.

There are elegant suits and dresses, kids clothing, sexy stuff, frumpy stuff, and all the necessary articles to accessorize your look. The colors range from neon greens and pinks, to more somber tones of khaki and rusts.

Some smell of the smoke of pipes and cigars, while others are the smell of sweat, candy, and even perfumes and cologne.

You decide to pick...
111.title: The Age of Style

1111.content: An elegant dress catches your eye. It is green, embedded with diamonds and looks quite oriental. You see a tag on it that has a number. You didn't know it yet, but once you put on the dress, not only would you turn into a beautiful Asian girl but your age would change to match the number on the tag. By the way, what was the number?
1111.title: an elegant jasmine scented oriental dress

11112.content:
After you forcefully put the dress on you start feeling an enormous pressure all over you body. As you look down a curtain of black hair falls in front of you eyes. You take it away from your range of vision and look at your hands, they look darker and way smaller than just 2 minutes ago. You look down and see in horror as your entire body seems to be shrinking at an alarming rate, just then you feel a great pressure in your head and pass out.

When you regain consciousness you immediately get up feeling wrong all over and almost falling down. You go to stand in front of the full size mirror and look in shock at what you see. In the reflection there's a petite, Indian girl no older than 13 looking back at you.Frightened you put a hand between you legs, only to find nothing. You......

choices: You decide to put your old outfit back on
111121.content:
Let out the biggest, loudest, and highest pitched scream you ever made.

"This can't be real!" You repeat to yourself as you pace frantically back and forth across the room. "This has to be a dream. I passed out, so I must be dreaming this." You stop pacing as you come to a realization. "But you can't feel anything in a dream. I know I felt something when I checked..." You stare down at your crotch. As you look at your new prepubescent body, you can't help to wonder one simple question. Why? "Why did this happen to me? Why did I feel the need to put on this stupid dress? Why is any of this happening to me?" You look back in the mirror and see your reflection stare back at you. You see a budding Indian girl with a look of terror and uncertainty in her dark green eyes. Beads of sweat rolling down your new mocha colored skin. Her silky raven black hair artfully weaved into a long braid that reached the middle of her back. A nervous hand clutching her brightly colored silk saree. You couldn't hold them back for very long, it was too hard. You dropped to your knees, cupped your face with your hands, and started crying your eyes out. After a few minutes of crying, you picked yourself up, wiped away a remaining tear, and decided there was only one thing to do. "I've got to fix this somehow."

You look around the room for something, anything, that could change you back when...
111121.title: Panick and scream

choices: Take a closer look at the candy
1111212.content: You spot your old clothes on the floor by the bed. "Maybe if I dress like my old self, I'll change back." You say to yourself. You have no idea if this will work, but you have to try. You take off the saree as fast as you could and leave it on the bed. You frantically put on your old clothes. At most parts it was very awkward, mostly because of how big they were on your new small and slender frame. The pants and underwear were very baggy and wouldn't stay up, even with your belt on the last notch. Your shirt just hung off you and your shoes were impossible to keep on. You look in the mirror and see just how silly you look. "Any second now." You say, waiting for the changes to begin. You wait around for a few minutes and nothing happens. After about ten minutes without a single change, You decide that this plan won't work. "I guess it was just wishful thinking." You say in a defeated tone as you take off your old male clothes and put the silk saree back on. "Maybe it didn't work because my clothes didn't come from the mansion. But there has to be a way I can change back." You glance back the closet, only to look away with the thought that maybe taking another outfit would just make things worse. "Maybe something else." You look around the room and on the dresser you spot some candy on a tray on the dresser. You decide to...
1111212.title: You decide to put your old outfit back on

11112121.content: You walk up to the dresser to get a closer look at the candy. You see there seems to be two different colors, red and blue. You also notice that each piece as a number written on it ranging from 1 to 12. You pick up a red piece with the number twelve written on it. "I shouldn't." You say to yourself. Your head is saying this is a bad idea, but your new childish body is telling you to pop that candy into your mouth. You eventually give into temptation and stuff the number candy into your mouth. You're hit with a strong cherry flavor as you chew. Suddenly, as you swallow the remains of the sweet, you start to feel a strange sensation overtake your body. It was like you were begin stretched out. Remembering which room you were in, you realize what is going on. The candy is making you older. As you grow taller, your body begins to mature as well. Your bust expands as your hips and rear round out and your lips plump up. You are now a 24 year old Indian woman with a curvy hourglass figure and large bee sting lips. "This is insane." You say in your new sultry voice. You look down at the candy and notice something you failed to notice before. You see a second mark on each of the candies, the red candies have a plus sign, while the blue candies have minus signs. It didn't take much to figure out that this meant that the red candies make you older and the blue ones make you younger. Once you realize this, you decide to...
11112121.title: Take a closer look at the candy

111121211.content: "I've got to get out of here." You know that if you stay in this room any longer, something really bad will happen. You'd age into dust, you'll become a baby again, you could even age backwards until you just don't exist anymore. It was too much, so decided to leave. You went straight for the door and left without looking back. "There has to be a way I can change back." You start searching the halls for a room that could have the answer to your problem. As you wonder down the halls, you pass a room marked "Toy Room." "There's a toy room in this mansion?" You ask out loud, not expecting an answer. "Why would there be a toy room?" You think that maybe it's just a place where Hugo must keep something like a vintage toy collection. Maybe he has a kid and this is a play room. But then you remember what kind of place this is and that a toy room could be anything. You're afraid of what could be behind the door, but you also just really want to know what the point to a room like this could be. eventually you decide to...
111121211.title: Leave this room

choices: ... Going to play with us (age regression)
... Going to be my bride (toy tf)
1111212111.content:
You knew you shouldn't have, you knew the best thing for you to do was to just turn around and keep looking for a way to return to normal again. But something was drawing you towards this Toy Room. "Maybe just a quick look. I won't even touch anything." You say to yourself as you turned the knob and open the door.

You step inside and see a room that any child would want but could only dream of. The interior was massive and housed a collection of toys likes of which have never been seen before. Toys, games, and puzzles from nearly every era were scattered about and in perfect playing condition. There was even a tv with a gaming station that had every kind of video game console, from atari to xbox. In the corner was a large colorful bed with a race car shaped bed frame. The wall were painted in a wide spectrum of colors and depicted many different whimsical scenes. Scenes such as a medieval castle, a pirate ship, the lunar surface, and an enchanted forest. You heard a small whistle blow as you noticed a model train running along a track that wrapped around the upper portion of the room. "Wow..." was your only response at such an elaborate sight.

"Mr. Prosperio really went all out on this one." You say as you walk around the room. "If he really does have a kid, that child must be spoiled rotten." As you look around, you see a complete set of classic Ninja Turtles action figures, the kind you always wanted as a kid. You reach for them when suddenly, you stop yourself and pull your hand away. "NO! No, you're not going to touch anything. Nothing!" You walk away from the action figures. But as you do so, the heads of Bebop and Rocksteady begin to turn on their own as if they were watching you. Soon the other figures started turning their heads as well.

You approach the bed. As you get closer, you begin to notice just how small it is. "This is a little kid's bed alright." You say to yourself as you inspect the bed. As you take a closer look at the fish printed sheets, a thought begins to run through your head. "I don't remember Hugo saying anything about having a child." While you are thinking about this, you failed to notice the ninja turtle actions figures from before, along with a barbie doll and a tin robot, were getting ready to launch a baseball at your head with a slingshot. "If he doesn't have a kid, why does he have all this stuff?" As you say this, a wind up toy soldier walks up and gestures towards you with his sword. The toys then release the ball and it strikes you in the head. You fall onto the bed as everything goes black.

You wake up moments later, groggy, and with a throbbing pain in your head. "What happened?" You ask yourself as you try to get up. You find it hard to move as it feels like you've been tied down. Things come into focus and you see that you are tied down. From the looks of it, you were tied to the ground in a similar fashion to Gulliver upon his arrival in Lilliput, but with what looked like yo-yo strings that were tied together and tacked down with jacks. You look around and see every toy in the room gathered around you. The toys seemed to move on their own. "You're all alive?!" You ask, though you shouldn't have been surprised. You were a white male in his late teens when you arrived. Now you're in the body of a beautiful Indian woman in her mid twenties.

"That is correct my dear!" You hear a voice call out. You try to find the source of the voice, but you vision is limited by the fact that your head was tied down as well. You then feet a small pair of feet walking across your stomach and up your chest. You see a wind up toy soldier climb up top your breasts and stand there. "Okay everyone!" The soldier calls out to all the other toys. "Let it begin!" The other toys begin a chant a strange series of words. It is hard to tell what they were saying, not just because of the unidentified language they spoke, but also because of all their strange voices. "Don't worry, it will all be over soon enough."

"What will?!" You ask in a demanding tone. "Who, or what, are you? What are you doing to me? What do you want?"

"Oh, where are my manners?" The toy soldier replies as he slides down your breasts and walks up to your face. "My name is Alexander Gearheart and you're..."
1111212111.title: Go in

11112121111.content:
"Excuse Me?!" You asked, shocked by everything that is going on around you. Suddenly, you feel the binds loosen a bit as a pulling feeling begins to overtake your body.

"You heard me right my dear" Replied Alexander, the toy soldier. "You see, we need someone to play with us."

"But why do do you need to be played with?" The pulling feeling continues as you now notice that your breast are beginning to recede into your chest at a slow and steady rate. Alexander notices this and immediately jumps off your chest and onto the ground.

"The reason for why is quite simple. We're toys!" We motions to all the toys around the two of you as they continue their chant. "Our purpose for being to be played with by children, to inspire imagination, create stories and adventures. Without a child to do that with, we have no reason to exist." Hearing this, you suddenly realize what is going on.

"You're turning my into a little kid so that I would play with you." The strings that held you down suddenly become loose enough for you to pull them off and sit up, but at that point, you've been regressed to about ten years old. Your chest is now perfectly flat and you've lost the hips you gain back in the age room. But the pulling feeling continued as the toys continued to chant.

"That is correct my dear lady." Alexander replied. "Soon you'll be the ideal age for us all."

"But why me?" You ask. Your voice beginning to get much higher as you've now past the seven year mark.

"Simply put, you came into this room." Alexander replied. "We aren't picky about who plays with us, so long as we get the attention."

The pulling feeling stops at five years of age as you look down at your hands. Everything about you has changed, even your clothes now small enough for your new childish body. Angrily, you grab a hold of Alexander and bring him up to your face. "Give me one good reason why I shouldn't just pop your head off right now?"

"Because the second stage of the spell is just about to take effect and you'll find that you'll no longer have that desire."

Your angered expression drops into a daze as you suddenly find your staring into space. Your mind starts to go into a haze as images and events begin to invade your head. New memories forming and a whole new life beginning to take shape. Your name is now Lilavati, Lila for short. You grew up in an orphanage in Calcutta after you were left their by your parents who were too poor and couldn't care for you. One day, you met a rather flamboyant man named Hugo who just seemed to fall in love you and adopted you to take home to live him in his big mansion. After a long series of paper work and doctor visits, you were finally ready to see your new home. It was enormous, the biggest house you had ever seen. You felt so out of place, that is, until Hugo showed you your new room. A room paked with toys and other playthings. Things you could only dream of back in India. This made you very happy, not all the toys, but the idea that a man you've known for so little time would go so far out of his way just for you, that's what made you happy. Once these memories settled, all the toys, even Alexander, went back into their limb and lifeless state. You smiled as you took the key in Alexander's back and gave it a few turns. Setting him on the ground and watched him march away.

The door then opened and there in the door way was...
11112121111.title: ... Going to play with us (age regression)

111121211111.content:
"Hello Lila my dear" Hugo said as he walked in.

"Hello Mr. Prosperio." You replied as you got off the floor and greeted your new father.

"I know we've only just started living together, but you should try to call me father or dad. The soon you do..."

"I know." You reply "Its just... This is all so new."

Lord Prosperio kneeled down to meet with you eye to eye. "I understand." He said "This new life will take some getting used to for all of us, you especially. Just know this." He then gently pats you on the head and gives a nice warm smile. "I want to give an opportunity that most children like you don't have. Not because I felt bad for you, but because I saw you in that orphanage and fell in love with you and that sweet little heart of yours." You then jump up and give Hugo an tight and loving hug. To which he responds by hugging you as well. The two of you then spend the rest of the day together, playing with the many playthings in your new room, telling stories, on until the sun had past setting and the night had come.

Lord Hugo sat on the side of your bed as you lay tucked into the covers with a Pinkie Pie plushie in your arms. "I hope you've had a good first day in your new home my dear."

"It was really nice." You reply, pulling your plush toy in tighter. "But something does not feel right." Saying this, Lord Hugo looks back at his new daughter, curious as to what she is saying. "I remember being somebody else. I came here because I was lost and this house... This house changed me. Is there something wrong with this house?"

"Well I suppose I should tell you." Hugo replied. "This mansion has an... Well... Let's call it an enchantment."

"Enchantment?"

"Yes, this house changes people, turns them into something they weren't before. The only ones immune to this are those with the Prosperio name. Which now include you. Since you are now an officially Lilavati Prosperio, my daughter."

"But why does the house change people?"

"That's hard to say. Most of the time it seems random, that there is no method to the madness. But I have found that this house changes people according to their desires. That they want to be changed and this house does it for them. Leading them to the rooms where they seek the change they want."

"So they want to be changed?"

"While they may not admit it, yes."

"So then why did the house change me into your daughter? Why do I remember that and the orphanage?"

"Perhaps you remember both lives because you now being a Prosperio means you've gain the same immunity to the house's power that all Prosperios have. As for why you wanted to be changed in such a way, that I am not certain of, but maybe because you wanted a new life. Maybe your old life was not ideal for you and you desired a new one. One that this house provided for you. But I hope you do realize that doesn't mean I don't love you any less."

"I know. I love you too *yawn* father."

Lord Hugo smiled as he leaned in to give his new daughter a gentle kiss on the forehead as she fell into a deep sleep. Hugo shut off the lights and turn onto a nightlight by the door as he made his way out the room, slowly closing the door behind him.
111121211111.title: Lord Hugo

1111212111112.content:
It has been a good while since your life as Lila Prospero began. You have grown into an attractive young woman. Over the years you have seen many men and women come, those who leave never walk out the same, and others just never leave. In fact just a few nights ago a young man and his wife arrived, they had been arguing about children. it seemed that the husband wanted to be a parent and the wife did not especially since the young man had recently lost his job. Luckily he had found a new job in the manor as your father's nurse, and was going to soon be a parent having been changed into a woman and pregnant with her former wife. You are glad for all the help with your father, the years have not been kind and it seems his physical and mental health are failing him.
"Lady Lila?" your father's nurse says as she approaches you from behind. "Is everything all right?"
"It's not fair!" You shout punching your vanity mirror and shattering it, "A week before you came to work for us an old man with stage IV brain cancer who couldn't even lift his head was wheeled in, by the time he left he was a seven-foot-six twenty-two year old Mixed Martial Arts Champion! But my father can't be healed by the powers of this house at all!" You turn around in anger, and then start to chuckle as you see the nurse. "Carol," you manage to laugh as you take in the woman, formerly known as Carl, "have you been exploring the house again?" Carol looks shyly down at her distended stomach and pulls up the tail that wasn't there the other day.
"Well, I just, I figured if I was going to be a nurse I might as well make myself some kind of sexy vixen. So I found the animal room and put on fox ears and a tail." You shake your head at the vixen. You stopped reprimanding her about the dangers of exploring the house, she forgets all about the houses magic when she goes to sleep anyways. You send her away to go back to your father's bedside when you hear a thunderclap outside, you look out to see a storm raging over the mountains. So it's going to be some kind of backpacker tonight huh? Lost in the German Alps, caught in a storm and desperate for shelter they come across a strange mansion that doesn't appear in any maps or guidebooks. Doesn't anyone ever watch horror movies anymore?
Right on cue you hear a voice calling out from the foyer.
"Hello? Is anyone home? I got caught in the storm and I just need some shelter for the night!"
Showtime you think as you head down the stairs.
"Welcome to Prospero Manor! Yes yes it is quite the storm out there today. There is no need to feel afraid, you are among friends here. Feel free to spend the night here, although you may not leave the same. Take any of the rooms, and feel free to roam around. if you need me, give a shout." With those words there is a soft and subtle sound you have heard often, the sound of the magic coursing through the room. You'll have to tell Carol not to leave your father's chambers as the magic is far more potent now. As about to leave your guest turns around to reveal...
1111212111112.title: Years later

choices: Lila to check on her father
Eugene and see how he handles the mansion
11112121111121.content:
He was a small and slender young man with curly ginger hair. He had a small bulbous nose with a few freckles across the bridge of his nose. He had large hazel eyes and a small cleft chin. He wore a green and yellow striped european football jersey with a white polo shirt underneath. His khaki cargo shorts were stuffed with unknown items and his hiking boots with caked with mud. He carried a massive hiking backpack With a mess kit, sleeping bag, and various maps and paperback books hanging out the pockets.

"Hello, I'm Eugine. I was backpacking through the German Alps and I got caught in this freak storm. It's strange, your house doesn't seem to appear in any guidebooks or maps."

"He" You silently snicker to yourself in response to Eugine's statement. "You're not the first person to say something like that. We get a lot of people in the same boat as you and we are always more than happy to take them in."

"Well that's good to hea-... Wait... What was that part about not leaving the same?"

"Let's just say this place has a habit of changing you in ways you'd never thought possible. Now as I said, if you need anything, just give a shout and either me or a staff member will help you."

"Ooooookay, good to know." Eugine put his backpack down by the door and walked down the hall while giving you a suspicious stare. You shrug it off as you go to a different part of the house for personal business.

(Who do you follow?)
11112121111121.title: his face

111121211111211.content: You walk down the hall and into your fathers chambers. Only to find carol has left, just then you hear what you can only guess is the scream of eugine "Ahhh, help" but carol is part of staff who do you look for...
111121211111211.title: Lila to check on her father

111121211111212.content:
The mysterious woman was beautiful: Warm skin, deep brown hair, lovely brown eyes. But you, Eugine, can't help but feel that there is something just a little off about her, like she is in on some joke that you will never quite get. But you forget about that as you wonder the house. It's huge! So many rooms and corridors. How could it not be on any map?

You wander the halls, not sure if you should dare enter any of the rooms. It's all so big and beautiful, and yet there's something off.

But you shake your head and decide that you must be crazy. It's just a house with a strange woman, that's all.

What room do you find first?
111121211111212.title: Eugene and see how he handles the mansion

1111212111112122.content:
The house was huge! And so many rooms! A person could get lost in a place this size.

You make your way through the beautiful halls, stopping every now and then to take in a beautiful portrait or sculpture. These people had to be loaded, you think as you squint at a particularly odd painting. It's of a very old man and a very young woman. It doesn't look like the woman you met at the door...who could it be? Maybe just a painting. Suddenly, you feel very tired. Perhaps one of these rooms is a bedroom?

You pick a door at random, grateful to find, yes, a bedroom.

A pink bedroom, filled with toys and beautiful furniture, with pink satin sheets, pink walls, pinks toys...

Pink.

But you're very tired and don't mind. You stop and see a...
1111212111112122.title: A Bedroom

111121211112.title: How about one of the servants?

choices: You try to get up and run
11112121112.content:
"What?!" You scream. Suddenly you feel a tingling all over your body. Soon, the ropes start to feel loose, no longer holding you tight. With each second, they become more loose and the room around you becomes bigger. It's obvious what's going on - you're shrinking. Soon, you become small enough to free yourself from the now very loose ropes. You sit up, still towering over the dolls, but only half your previous height.

"Why are you doing this?" You ask the toy soldier, still getting smaller. "Why do I have to become your bride? Why can't you marry other dolls - I can see a few of them in this room."

"They are part of my troops. A commander can't get involved in a love affair with one of his soldiers - it'd cause problems of discipline. So I marry the occasional guest who enters this room."

"Wait", you ask, now only twice the size of the toy. "You mean there are more like me here? More people changed into dolls?"

"Yes. A man can't just have one wife. The more women he marries, the greater his status."

"How many wifes do you have?", you ask. You realize you're making eye contact with him, so you stand up, so you can tower over him just a little longer.

"You'll be my thirteenth bride", he replies. "Soon, you'll join them in the dollhouse. I'd say you'll have your every need taken care of, but, being a doll, you won't have any physical needsm and the need for company will be taken care of by my other wives."

"Wait, you mean I'm going to become a doll, too?!" You scream, terrified. You're no longer taller than the doll - in fact, you're looking up to him, a head shorter than he is.

"Why, yes. I'm a toy. I can't marry a human - that just wouldn't be proper."

You want to scream for help, but suddenly you feel very sick. You fall down on your knees, holding your stomach. You can't see clearly for a while, but after your vision clears, you realise your transformation is complete. Your entire body is made of plastic. Your fingers can no longer move, since your entire hand is just one piece of plastic. Your moves are pretty restricted thanks to the artificial joints.
11112121112.title: Indian Doll

choices: take a closer look at yourself.
1111212112.content: You decide to ignore the Toy Room - who knows what would happen to you there. You continue onwards, and soon you pass a large mirror. You realise you haven't seen your current form. You decide to:
1111212112.title: Mirror on the wall

11112121121.content:
You find yourself glancing in the mirror and you find after that first glance you cannot look away. You look at you long hair, your dark eyes, that seem to smile back at you. You like your slim figure, that of a young woman…..who seems to be getting younger the longer you look.

Perhaps the candy is wearing off?

You nod, and the figure in the mirror nods back. You smile, still your tongue out, make faces, and giggle, thoroughly enjoying yourself. You swing your long hair back and forth and then start dancing….at first just randomly though pretty soon there is a pattern to you movements, like something in classical Indian dance you saw on pbs once.

You smile and you see that is a dazzling smile of a happy girl who now….again on the edge of womanhood. Just for a second, you think how different you are from the boy who entered the mansion.

A boy whose face you can hardly remember. Who was caucasian…..you think? And who was much older than twelve. You---
11112121121.title: take a closer look at yourself.

111121211211.content:
After all, isn't being who you are rather than who you are rather like being reincarnated? This is a concept you find you thouroughly believe in after all (and are pretty sure the former you didn't).

Not that you want to be anyone else anytime soon. You like being you. Who wouldn't like to be you?

You sit their for a few more minutes as this thought permeates your being, and you smile, satisfied.

In the mirror you see another figure moving up behind you. It is a tiger.

"Hello," it says.
111121211211.title: shrug these thoughts off.

1111212112112.content: “Wait” the tiger said and follows you. Soon you find out that this of course is not a real tiger, but a human being…
1111212112112.title: You scream and run.

11112121122.content:
You ignore the mirror, deciding that you'd rather concentrate on changing back than on contemplating your current form. You move further down the corridor, and soon find yourself back near the entrance.

Suddenly you have an idea - maybe if you leave the mansion, you'll change back to your proper gender, race and age.
11112121122.title: The entrance to the Mansion

choices: You ignore the voice and leave the mansion.
You pause and turn towards the voice.
111121211221.content:
"Worth a shot", you decide out loud. Your now female voice only makes you more resolved to try anything - just to return to your true form.

You quickly move towards to door. Howevere, as soon as you put your slender hand on the handle, you hear someone calling out to you.
111121211221.title: Time to leave!

choices: You go back into the mansion.
1111212112211.content:
You're desperate to change back, so you ignore the voice. You open the big door - which takes you longer than when you entered - and quickly go into the rain.

Now in the middle of the room with enough space, you remove the baggy shirt first. As you lift it up and pass it over your head, you're suddenly overcome with just how soft and flowing your long hair is. As a guy, the most effort you could put into your hair was to spend 5 seconds brushing it out of the shower into some sort of tangled mess, but now as a little girl your feelings have drastically changed. Mesmerized, you put the shirt down and take an impromptu timeout from changing to inspect your flowing blond hair. While the panties fit perfectly now, the loss of muscle has made it more difficult to stand up. You can't imagine at this age you've been able to walk for very long. "I wawt my hair bwack..." you mumble to yourself, trying unsuccessfully to hold back tears. In your short time as a girl, your hair had become the most important thing to you and now it was gone. Before you can break down and cry though, you remember there's other rooms in the mansion. "Maybe they have clothes for 4 year olds in there!". It's gotta be true. It has to! Otherwise, you're gonna have to wait to grow your hair back.

You suck up the snot in your nose and wipe away tears. "It's been a long time since I cried so easily..." you think to yourself. Indeed, you can't remember feeling so upset over something as trivial as hair, But as a 3 year old girl, the feelings inside your brain have become sirens, and it's impossible to ignore them.

You remember that you still only have a pair of panties on and the other clothes are still waiting to be worn. It makes you feel a little better knowing you'll get to put some clothes on at least. As a guy, clothing was just something that you used to cover yourself up with, but even as a 3 year old, you can't help but be morbidly interested in the clothing you picked out, much the same way most all girls are. You pick up the blue sleeveless top you found earlier and slip it on. Like the panties, it fits perfectly. It brings a strange satisfaction you never felt as a guy to wear it, and you can't help but walk over to the windowed door of the closet again to admire yourself in the reflection. You feel terrible compared to her and it causes you to suddenly tear up in anger. How come she gets to be the pretty one with long hair? You've never felt so jealous of someone else in your entire life. Your face turns beet red from embarrassment and you wipe away tears before you collapse into all-out crying.

You know if you can just put on her clothes, for even a moment, you might be able to become older again. But how can you get them? Your small mind tries to scale the task but you're having trouble thinking. For some reason you just can't think clearly like you used to when you were 18. A slave to your emotions, more tears come out in frustration and now some of the other kids are noticing. Unable to handle the embarrassment any longer, you get up and run over to a quieter corner of the room. You can't hold it back any longer and start to cry. How come you can't think properly anymore? Why does she have to be so much prettier than you? Has becoming young also affected your decision making ability? You're beginning to regret ever coming to the mansion.

"Calm down", you keep telling yourself. You need to concentrate and try to remember how you used to think in these situations. You suck in a bit of snot in your nose and rub more tears away from your eyes. The noise of the room thankfully seems to have drowned out your crying from the adults, which gives you a few moments to think before your emotions take over again. All you can think about is how the other girl looks better than you, and whenever you try to think about how to fix it it just makes you think of her more and makes you even more upset. in a brief moment of clarity, you gather that your little mind is only developed enough to think in extremely simplistic terms which is why you can't stop feeling inadequate. "Why do I care so much about something so stupid?!" you try to ask yourself in your mind, but the best response you can come up with is, "Because she's so much prettier and older than I am and I'm just a stupid ugly 3 year old!"

The other kids are starting to notice you cowering in the corner. What little rationale remaining is starting to fade into nothing. You can feel the tears forming in your eyes again and it starts to cloud your vision.

Will you...

You walk out of the Age room, glancing at the door, and wonder if there is a weight room, because, having always been a slender fellow, having some meat on your bones is a wonderful feeling.

A maid passes by, and you see fit to ask her if there is one.

"Hello, Miss!" you say.

"Hello, sir...er...little lady. How can I be of service" She says with a smile.

"I was just wondering...I was in the age room, but is there is a room for weight gain."

"Of course. Down the hall, three doors to the right. Have fun, now." she says with a knowing look and continues on her way.

You wander down the hall and when you come across the room, it's obvious. The door is wider than any other door in the hall, and you see the words WEIGHT emblazoned in gold on its wood surface.

As you open the door you see a very fat man in a pair of swim trunks walking towards you.

"Oh, Hello. Don't mind me, I was just leaving. I think I want to hit up the Gender room. I think being a girl would be some fun"

"Sure is." you say with a smile as he walks past. You enter the room. You close the door behind you and wander around the room. The room is filled with the signs of its former occupants. Empty clothes, either too small for their now larger frames, or the other way around, with those loosing weight having clothes that are way too large. You also see several items of magical quality that look quite enticing. Two such items lie on a table in front of you.

One is a jar of candy, each a little gummi bear shaped like a fat child. The jar says

"Fat Candy. 50 Pounds per candy. Enjoy"

The other item is a ring with a note.

"Place me on my finger, say a weight, and in moments you will become that weight. The ring will change size to match your new weight. The possiblties are endless. Please use to your hearts content. signed Fatima, Queen of Plumpenia.

You reach your only slightly chubby hand down and grab for
11121222.title: Finding New Weight

You grab a rail next to you so you can balance properly. You try to take a baby step forward and as you swing your right legs onwards you feel a new sensation, something you had never felt before being so skinny.

Running around in just his diapers and pacifier doesn't bother him!" the mirror rattles off as the image of you ripples and begins to change.

The sailor's suit fades away leaving you almost naked, in just your child's underoos. The underwear begins to thicken, the fly splitting and rearranging itself as it becomes a disposable diaper, with blue tapes in the same style as a toddlers diapers. A small diaper bag, small enough to be carried by you, fades into the side of the image covered in cartoon teddy-bears, a real teddy-bear sticking out the opened top, as well as the edge of a folded diaper.

You smile, as this is an old dream of yours, to be able to go back to being a child, even a baby, but this way, you would still be somewhat capable of doing things for yourself, while still being able to be a baby, in a sense. you stare longingly at the image...

111221122112.title: To where though

1112211221122.content:
You wander through the mansion, sucking on your pacifier and feeing the thickness of the diaper force you to walk with a waddle. You giggles to yourself as the diaper felt warm and comforting between your legs.

You turn a corner and feel a strong rumbling sensation from your tummy.

“Oh wow I’m hungry!” You exclaim.

With those words, a door appears next to you that you didn’t notice before. The frame is wood and lined with giant candies and sweets. The handle is even a giant cookie stuffed with chocolate chips.

Inside, you find a massive, cavernous kitchen with a plethora sweets covering a long banquet table. You begin to drool at the sight of all the scrumptious food. You’re not sure where it came from or who it’s for, but your tummy doesn’t question it!

You walk as fast as you can and gather up as many sweets as you can on a plate and waddle to a high chair conveniently in the corner.

You greedily stuff the sweets into your face and end up smearing the cakes and pairs all over your mouth and new clothing. Even your diaper takes a few hits but who cares! You’re a greedy little boy and eating like one. Besides, babies are super messy.

While you shove these treats into your face, you’re blissfully unaware of a bottle of whole milk that’s materialized next to you. As you guzzle it down, you quietly realize yourself more in your diaper, causing it to swell and swell further. Not that you noticed, even as you shift your legs to accommodate.

Once all the trays you could muster are in your tummy, you pat your now domed-shaped stomach and feel your new softness. It wasn’t much, maybe ten pounds.

Maybe 10 pounds. Okay more like 15 you thought to yourself.

You hop out of the chair and see your new stomach in a near mirror. All the fat shifted to your tummy and butt, puffing them more out and giving you an even more distinct toddler appearance. You slapped your gut as it juggle under your constraining T-shirt that’s now riding up just a little.

You also see how much more your diaper has swelled after the feast. It’s thicker and wider but seems to still be ready to take on more!


So, do you decide it’s time for a second round of snacks or waddle around more?
1112211221122.title: Start to feel hungry

11122112211222.content:
You wander through the halls comfortably patting your newly fattened belly. You pass long corridors with painting hung on the walls and thick oriental rings under your feet. The rooms seemed even larger given your shrunken size.

As you walked, you felt yourself relieving yourself again in your extremely swollen diaper and decided it was time for a change. As if by magic, a door swung open on your left. Inside, there seemed to be a large changing table, a crib, high-chair, and toys as far as the eye could see. You must have stumbled upon the nursery!

Feeling the diaper swell to the point of immobility, you waddled to the table and hoisted yourself up.

You weren’t sure what to do at this point, so you simple asked “Can someone help?”

As if you said the magic words, the tapes on your disposable diaper instantly flew off and you felt invincible hands beginning to change you and remove the old diaper. Giggling to yourself as you flipped through a comic book nearby and sucking on a pacifier, you smiled as you were truly living the best life.

As the change was getting a fresh diaper ready, a bottle appeared to your left. You greedily sucked down the concouction of chocolate milk and felt your swollen tummy bloat forward more. You giggled at your new, squishy belly.

When the change was done, you rolled off the table and felt how immensely thick the new diaper was. Almost double the last one and probably way more absorbent.

Strutting to the toy area, you saw a bunch of fun object to play with: a game system, a coloring book, and some strange, huge dice.

Which do you chose?
11122112211222.title: Nah, let’s keep exploring

111221122112221.content:
You plopped down next to the game system and the retro style tv in front of it and started up the gaming console. Your new diaper was so thick and comfy that it made the perfect amount of padding for your butt to relax.

You played the adventure game for what felt like hours and hours, all the while sucking on the pacifcyer around your neck and adjusting the backwards ball cap on your head.

You heard a slight trickling and felt yourself wetting your diaper again. These ones, you noticed, had little aliens in spaceships all over the patterns. The intergalactic beings were slowly vanishing away the more you filled your diaper.

You giggled to yourself as you were crushing aliens in both the game and around your crotch.

Finally, you reached a save point and we’re prompted by the game with a message. “Must be older to continue playing”

“That’s weird” you thought.

At the same time, a rumble came from your tummy. You were famished...again!
111221122112221.title: Game system

choices: Games are bad for you, go find something else to play with.
A few more hours of mind-numbing gaming wouldn't hurt, right?
1112211221122211.content:
You were too invested in the alien game to stop now. Deciding your belly can wait for a little bit, you hit “Ok” on the age screen, resuming the game. You’re completely engrossed in the simple, repetitive gameplay. It’s pretty addictive. As you rack up points shooting aliens and other monsters, you begin to start feeling a tingly sensation inside, though with how absorbed you are in the game, you can’t say you really notice.

You don’t seem to realize, or care anyway, that your body is beginning to grow with each point you score. With each spacecraft you shoot down, your clothes just start to feel that much tighter. And each new weapon or item you acquire, your legs and arms just start to feel just a little bit longer. Your face starts to itch, so you scratch it, and don’t even notice you’re starting to grow some small strands of facial hair. ‘Maybe I should shave?’ you briefly ask yourself, but when a new alien warcraft approaches from the side of the screen, that thought drifts from your mind as you just start button mashing again.

The gameplay is about the only thing you do notice, and what you do see is that it’s not that much harder than the first part, in fact, it actually seems to have gotten a little bit easier. You chuckle dumbly, ‘Heh, stoopid video game saying it’s for big boys only. Well, I am a still just a little boy, an’ I don’t find it all that much harderer really.’ Though you end up eating your words when you find that there’s a sudden difficulty spike. Oddly, you don’t think it changed too much.

The enemies… they had an attack pattern, didn’t they? You remember that that’s why the second part was so easy and addictive, because you knew how they’d attack. But, for some reason, you can’t really remember what that pattern was. Something changed, was it their pattern? It felt a little familiar, but wait, did it? You can’t seem to remember them ever having a pattern, not one that you noticed anyway. You felt that maybe there was one, but you weren’t good at figuring that stuff out. You liked how challenging the game was, and how you always seemed surprised when the alien startroopers came from the left side of the screen, and the spacecrafts from the right. It was hard remembering which was which, or knowing which would come out first and from what side. Good thing you had infinite lives, because you wound up dying a lot now, but you were determined to beat it. How did you ever think this game was easy?

You continue on, playing the same game you had been playing for the past hour, only with a lot more dying and restarting. Suddenly you weren’t very good at it. You weren’t really good at most games, but you loved playing them. The constant losing doesn’t seem to affect your growth much, and you seem to keep getting bigger. You start to drool, utterly oblivious to the changes taking place, and the rest of the world around you, far too wrapped up in your game to do anything, even think, not that you did much of that anyway now.

Your child-sized shirt strains under your aging and expanding body, as the seams start to rip. Your belly hangs out, completely exposed under the shirt. Your diaper doesn’t seem affected though, and only seems to grow with you. Good thing too, as you were so obsessed with the game, you had practically been using it every few minutes. It was pretty damp and heavy by now, but it didn’t bother you too badly. You cared more about beating the pants off the invading forces of the game.

Finally, after hours of non-stop playing, you somehow, out of either dumb luck, sheer bruteforcing, or the game taking pity on you, manage to blow up the last alien ship. The screen pauses for a few seconds, before pulling up another “Must be older to continue playing” message. You stare at the screen dumbly, not fully realizing that another wave wouldn’t be coming, for a good couple minutes, before asking “Duh… Did I win?” Your eyes light up, and a smile creeps across your face. “I won? I won!” You grin widely, and jump up, cheering and running around the room, buzzing your lips in satisfaction. Finally, you run back over to the TV. “In your face!!” You laugh and point at it, trying to see your high-score, but are disappointed that it doesn’t list it, and what are those words on the screen? They aren’t changing. Are they credits or something? You try and read them. “Duh, uhhhh… M-Must… Must-arrr-d? B-B-Buh-Beee… Oh-Old-duuurr…” You try and sound them out. You can’t read too well, and you’re starting to drool even more just attempting to understand the message. You aren’t even going to attempt those last two words, because they look too big.

Giving up and deciding it must be some kind of food recipe or whatever, based entirely on having somehow perceived ‘Must’ as ‘Mustard’, you remember how hungry you were and rub your stomach, which also causes you to slowly become aware that you had grown, as your shirt now barely clung to you. “Boy, I sure grew a loooooot.” You giggle. How long had you been playing that game? You look at the clock on the wall, but remember that you can’t really tell time, and that you can’t really count up that high either. You struggle to (“One, t-two, th-three… Uh… What come after three? F-Ffff-Fart? Heheh, farts. D’uhhh….”) but ultimately just give up when your stomach starts growling. You look around, wondering where the food is, before remembering that food is usually kept in the cold box thing you can’t remember the name of.

You look around, opening anything in the nursery that looks openable, or attempting to with anything remotely box-like, and end up seeing another husky teenage boy in the nursery with you. “Hey, d’uh… Could you help me? I’m looking for… food…” you get distracted when you notice his attire. Despite being a teenager, he’s wearing a torn up baby blue sailor shirt, baseball cap, and a big, well-used diaper around his waist, all while sucking on a pacifier. “Heh-heh, why are you dressed like ‘dat?” You giggle. You begin to see that the boy is imitating your movements. He’s doing it pretty well too. “D-D’uhh… Why are you copying me? And, uh…. Do you know where all the food is?”

It takes far too long, just dumbly staring at him and being met with a dumb stare back, before you realize who he is. “D’oh! It’s a mirror! Hah!” You laugh and tap it, confirming it’s just a reflection. You can get a really good look at yourself now. You’re a teenager, older than you were definitely. You didn’t know how old you were though. You looked around your starting age, perhaps a little younger you guess, but… What was that again? It was too high for you to count. You’ve certainly gained weight, and a little bit of muscle mass too it looks like. You shake your hard, yet pronounced belly, and flex a little, admiring your new muscles, which causes the seams in your little boy shirt sleeves to rip, fully exposing your forearms, and causing you to chuckle.

It also causes you to become cognizant of the fact that you have a heavy, bloated diaper around your waist. ‘Oh yeah, I should probably change’ you think, and waddle over to the changing table, your swollen diaper slowing you down, but soon realize that you don’t know how to change yourself. As you look at the table, wondering what to do now, you start to feel more invisible hands on you, hoisting you onto the table, undoing your diaper and taping on a fresh one with cartoon animals you don’t know on it, and changing you out of your destroyed baby clothes and into a much larger black and blue striped onesie with a “kewl” picture of a dinosaur on it while they’re at it, all while you look on in astonishment.
