She seems annoyed but lifts you up in her arms. You smirk, "Ahh. Much better." As you near where you left your friends, you don't notice any of them, "I swear they were here earlier? I don't know where they went?"

The woman explains, "See that group ahead? Those are your friends. They took advantage of the magical resort and transformed just like you did."

You giggle, "I don't see any other toddlers?"

"They obviously all chose adult bodies. Including your girlfriend. Like I warned you before, you may want to consider being assigned to a volunteer family if you want to be a 2 year old girl so you don't burden your friends."

You laugh, "I won't burden them. I'm sure they will think the first body I chose to be is funny. I can't wait to see them laugh their asses off once they see what I look like. By the way, which one of them is my girlfriend? I can't wait to see her face. I'm sure she will think I'm completely adorable."

The woman carried you to a blonde bombshell in her mid 20's. You were amazed at your girlfriend's new body. She looked like a model. She had DD boobs and a porn star figure. She was looking around as if she was searching for somebody. The woman who was carrying you set you on your feet in front of your girlfriend's new body. You tugged on her leg with a smirk, "Hey Rachel. How's it going?"

Your girlfriend looked down at you confused, "Do I know you little girl?"

You spin around and bow, "Ta-da! It's me! What do you think? I'm pretty cute huh?"

Rachel's eyes get wide, "OMG? John? Is that you?"

You nod, "Yep! This is hilarious huh? I'm barely 2 years old now! Check out this tiny pink one-piece swimsuit I'm wearing. It feels weird to have bare thighs. You've worn spandex outfits like this your entire life you probably don't think it's strange. I'm sure you are used to the feeling. The attached skirt completes the look huh? This pigtails complete my look perfectly don't they? I'd say I look just like a real toddler!"

Rachel seems annoyed at your rant, "You've got to be kidding me??!! OMG! Seriously? I used my transformation to turn myself into a swimsuit model so I could have some fun with my boyfriend. I figured you'd turn yourself into a body builder or a college aged guy with a 6-pack. Why are you a little girl?"

You feel your face turning red, "i don't know. I thought it would be funny."

"Well it's NOT." Rachel replies, "We are on vacation for a week. The first transformation is free. It will cost you 2000 dollars to transform again. We don't have that kind of money! Good going John. You are stuck as a toddler girl for our entire trip!"

You had no idea it cost so much money to transform. You figured you'd walk around as a 2 year old girl for an hour or so before trying out another body. You gulp, "Oh shit! Can you at least vouch for me? Somebody has to agree to keep an eye on me while I'm a toddler. Can you tell this woman that you will watch me at least?"

Rachel replies looking down at your tiny body, "You can't be serious. I thought we were going to have the most amazing sex with our transformed bodies. You totally blew it! Now you are stuck spending the week like THAT. I'm not going to play mommy while we are on vacation. Sorry John. While you are busy playing dollies and dress-up, I"m going to be finding GUYS to have some adult fun with."

You are shocked as your girlfriend walks away and joins a group of college aged guys. You tell the woman who was holding your hand, "Uh oh. I might need a volunteer family. Is there anybody I can ask to watch me while I'm stuck as a little girl?"

The woman explains, "That's easy. There are lots of people here who want to try out being a parent. Sometimes married couples swap genders to get a feel for what their significant other has to deal with. Lots of potential babysitters are really little girls too. They want to try being a big-girl on vacation and play house. Their parents are more than willing to let them turn into adults so they don't have to babysit them during vacation. They would love to have a daughter to look after for the next week while they play house."

You cringe at the idea of a kid in an adult's body babysitting you all week. The last thing you want is some fake adult telling you what to do. You get nervous at all the dress-up outfits they will make you wear while they pretend to be a parent. You know your girlfriend isn't going to watch you and it's the only way you can be released into the resort to enjoy your vacation. You'll still have fun. You'l just be at the mercy of your temporary family. You tell the woman, "Okay. Find me a Mommy for the week."
112211112122212.title: You are the only little girl

choices: Adjusting to being a toddler girl
1122111121222121.content:
The woman holding your hand escorts you to the mansion's playground. She announces to the group of women watching their children, "Who wants a daughter?"

A very pregnant woman in her mid 20's wobbles up, "I call dibs on little miss pig tails." She smiles and bends down to you, "Hi there cutie. What's your name?"

You reply, "John."

She smirks, "That's not going to work with the body you have. From now on I'm going to call you Jan."

You nod realizing your new mother is right. You can't spend a week at the mansion resort in a girl's body with a boy's name. Out of habit from cordial conversation, you reply with the same question, "What's your name?"

The woman giggles, "You can call me Mommy. I'm so excited to take care of you! I can't wait to introduce you to your new sisters."

"I have sisters?" You ask.

"Yep. I'm already taking care of a few other kids. So what's your story? You obviously were a guy before you transformed. Why'd you turn yourself into a little girl?"

"I thought it would be a funny prank." You tell your new Mommy, "I didn't know after the first transformation that it cost thousands of dollars to get a new body. So I'm stuck like this for a week."

"Tough break. Don't worry. I'll take great care of you. I'm really a 12 year old girl. I'm here for a month to log practice watching kids. It's impossible to land a babysitting job these days without experience. That's why I volunteered to become this woman's body. I'm 9 months pregnant with a due date of next week. After I experience child birth and return to my normal body It will push me to the top of every babysitting list in the city."

You nod, "I'll be back to normal before you give birth. Good luck."

Mommy grabs your hand, "Thanks. Come on sweetie. I'll introduce you to your new sisters." She flags down two girls on the playground and the come over. After saying hello, your 6 year old sister explains, "I'm Isabel. I'm really a grandmother. I can't keep up with kids these days. That's why I wanted to spend a few weeks as a child again to understand all this new technology. I've learned to play with an iPad and know all the cartoons my grandkids watch now."

Your twin 4 year old twin sisters wave. One of them explains, "I'm Molly. That's Maddie. She's really my husband. We are normally both in our late 40's. For our anniversary we signed up for a last minute discounted vacation package. We should have known better. We thought we'd end up with youthful bodies to recreate our wedding day. But it turned out they were short on children during this week and assigned us to be twin sisters."

Maddie grumbled while awkwardly fidgeting with her dress, "It's nice to hear I"m not the only guy that got screwed. I thought I'd end up with a college guy's body and be banging coeds all week. I should have read the discounted website's disclaimer. I had no idea it was possible to end up in a body without a dick that has to wear night time diapers to bed."

You are somewhat relieved that one of your new sisters was really a guy. You suggest to your Mommy, "Can we go to the pool? I'm already wearing a swimsuit. I'd love to hang out with my girlfriend."

Maddie asks, "Which one is she?"

You point, "The one with the blue bikini and huge tits. I missed out. I really wish I'd have chosen a guy's body that I could......"

Your Mommy scolds you, "JAN. That's very inappropriate language!"

You take a step back after being scolded. Now that you have little girl hormones running through you body it feels scary to be yelled at. "Uh...Sorry Mommy. So can me and my new sisters go swimming?"

"Of course. I need to practice my pool side parenting ability anyways. That will help pad my babysitting resume. Your sister's need to change into swimsuits first."


10 minutes later in your new family's mansion suite while everybody gets ready. Maddie tugs at her Disney princess themed bikini glaring at you, "Thanks a lot sis. I was hoping to avoid having to wear such a girly outfit while I was stuck as a 4 year old girl."

You reply, "Sorry dude. This one-piece that I have on isn't any better. I just really wanted to say hi to my girlfriend. The only way to see her is to run into her at the pool."

Your new Mommy picks you up and lays you on the changing table as you ask, "What are you doing?"

Mommy pulls the straps of your swimsuit off and slides your one-piece down to your ankles, "It's resort policy that kids your age wear swim diapers."

Maddie snickers watching you get changed. You tell your Mommy, "Hey! This isn't necessary. I can just tell you when I need to use the bathroom."

Mommy finishes putting the thick swim diaper on and pulls your outfit back up. The diaper sticks out embarrassingly underneath the butt of your swimsuit. She tells you, "People are always watching. I'm trying to get good reviews so I can land a great babysitting job. I'd be a terrible caregiver if I let a 2 year old girl into the pool without protection."

Maddie giggles, "...Thus the night-time diapers Mommy has been making me put on at bed time."

You roll your eyes, "Shit. I'm younger than you. That means I'll have to wear them too huh?"

Mommy scolds, "Bad girl! You are a toddler. You can't say naughty words like that!"

Once again you feel scared at being yelled at, "Sorry Mommy."

"Okay girls. Let's hit the pool." Mommy says while reminding everybody, "Please be on your best behavior. All of us are trying their best to deal with our vacation bodies. I'd appreciate it if we started acting like a normal family. It would really help my resume after I leave here."
1122111121222121.title: Meeting your new Mommy

1122111122.content:
You proceed down the hall, looking in various rooms here and there. There was nothing to embarras you and truth be told every goofy thing a kid did, so then did you. There were all sorts of things lining the halls, and you played with them all, until you came across two odd objects...

On one side of the wall there was what looked like a periscope in the wall and a shiny cut-out on the floor under it. Upon seeing it, you immediately imagined being a sailor at sea, specifically in a submarine. What fun that could be, out with a submarine and seeing the oceans blue..

The other side held a cartoon character coloring book. You'd never seen these creatures, but they were like all the others, small and a lot like an animated movie, talking animals. Next to it was a whole box of crayons just begging to be used...
1122111122.title: Continue On

choices: Giant 'plays' with the little guy in the screen
Giant gets down looking for himself
11221111221.content:
The periscope outright wins, fun is running and 'fighting', not sitting with some stupid lines.

You run over to the periscope and find at this young age, your too short to see into it. With effort, you stand on your toes and manage to get high enough to see in. When at last you do, there is only dissappointement as you stare at a set of toes and wiggling them realize they are your own. A five year-old's imagination can't even overome that.

Suddenly, the scope is gone and so is everything else, but toes still dominate your view. Looking up, you see yourself, you've been CLONED! He's enormous, the barefeet are all your eyes have room for as at the moment just five of the mountains toes dominate your horizon. Looking up you see something enormous rather than a 'little' kid. By rough guesses you figure a half inch of him is a thousand feet to you...
11221111221.title: Big me, little me

11221111222.content:
Screw it, you felt like coloring. So, across the room went the kid and there you sat paging through the book, seeing some things already colored in and others blank. Eventually you come to a page that has yet to be touched. There's felines, canines, bird and more, all cartoon characters of course.

You color in the..
11221111222.title: I like coloring

choices: You are now an anthropomorphic kitten!
You keep changing all the way into a normal kitten!
112211112221.content:
You were five years old, you had crayons, you had a coloring book, it was time to let nature takes its course. You grabbed a handful of crayons after looking through the book and eventually settle on an uncolored page with a picture of a cartoon cat walking on two legs. You start to color the cat in, using a black crayon for most of its body, but every now and then leaving a few spots white on it, such as on the tips of its ears as well as its paws. You also decided to leave a chest and stomach white, then after some thought left the very tip of its tail white as well as two white rings near the tail. You continued to color getting it just perfect and somehow despite your age managed to remain inside the lines.

As you finished you suddenly felt as if the room was getting a bit warmer and your body also felt a bit itchy. You reached an arm under your shirt to scratch at yourself only to find to your surprise that your tummy was surprisingly fuzzy! You lifted up your shirt to look at yourself and could see white fur had grown in over your stomach and was spreading up to your chest. Meanwhile black fur was growing in over the rest of your body including your hands, feet and even your face! Your natural hair seemed to vanish into nothingness as the fur completely covered your head, but as it did your ears slid right up the side of your head as they shaped into enormous triangular ears covered in black fur with white tips.

Your hands and feet start to change shape, your fingers and toes getting shorter and small retractable claws forming along the edge of each finger and toe. The fur remains a uniform black over most of your new paws except for the tips where your toes were colored white. You felt your weight shift a bit as your body slimmed down a bit becoming just a bit smaller in your new feline form, this was enough for your pants to fall off but your shirt now easily went down to your knees covering you. Your legs seemed to shift position slightly as your tailbone stretched out into a new appendage, a long black furred tail with a white tip and two white stripes before the tip.

Your face pushed out into a muzzle as whiskers sprouted from it and your eyes became brighter, almost seeming to glow when light hit them. You felt your changed ears and your new tail twitch, a natural part of your body now that you could control by instinct. You were now very much a real life version of the cat you had just colored in! Well mostly, you were quite a bit younger than him due to your previous adventure in the age room so looked more like the cartoon cat's kitten than the cat himself.
112211112221.title: Kitten Kid

choices: Nah being a kitten is fun! Let's go play!
This is concerning! Better find out if it can be reversed!
1122111122212.content:
The changes don't stop with you just looking like the cat on two legs in the coloring book. You dwindle further in size as your shirt slips right off your shoulders and you collapse onto all fours as the shirt gets caught over the lower half of your body, held up mostly by your tail. As soon as you're on all fours your thumbs seem to met away completely as your hands shape completely into paws and the length of your legs and arms both shift to the point that standing on four legs feels perfectly natural. With some effort you untangle yourself from the shirt you were wearing only to trip not quite used to four legs and tumble out of it and onto the ground. You pick yourself up, balancing yourself with your tail that now seems to twitch with a mind of its own. Your proportions shift slightly, and in a few moments all traces of humanity are lost and you look completely indistinguishable from a normal white and black cat.

"Mrooow!?" You give a shout in surprise only to find that even your vocal chords have changed. You don't have any ability to actually speak whatsoever. You still possess your original mind but for all intents and purposes you're just an ordinary kitten.

You take a few more steps, getting used to walking on all four paws, and then burst into a full sprint across the room, and testing your body you leap and find yourself amazed as you fly several feet over the floor before landing. That was amazing! You feel so agile and, you suddenly really want to climb something and maybe find someone or something to pounce! You've never felt this capable and this full of energy in your life and!

Wait, you just turned into a kitten! An honest for goodness kitten, I mean sure you knew strange things happened, but this is a bit more complicated than changing age, you're a completely different species, and your age you new could be fixed later, is there a reversal for this? Maybe this is something that you should probably be concerned about!
1122111122212.title: Mostly Ordinary Kitten

choices: The sound of a can of food being opened
The sounds of beeps and boops
11221111222121.content:
"Mew!" You let out a joyful cry as you come to terms with your new feline form. You roll onto your back looking over yourself and get sight of your own tail. You try to bat at it, twisting yourself along the ground and then suddenly spring back up onto all fours as you chase your tail in a circle before getting dizzy and falling back down. After a little bit you pick yourself up again and look around the room you were in.

You wanted to have some fun and find a toy or a person or something to play with.

Without thinking you bolted out of the room and headed back down the hallway, abandoning both the clothes you were as a human and the coloring back that had transformed you due to being completely caught up in the moment. The halls of the mansion are a lot bigger to you than they used to be but you find yourself so full of energy that you can easily run full speed through them covering ground much faster.

You turn a corner to fast and trip over your own paws and fall and roll onto your back as you do. Were you human you would have been laughing at yourself but instead you made a soft purring noise as you let yourself be entertained by your own clumsiness. You lay there for a bit twitching your ears listening to every sound in the mansion. It was like you could hear everything that went on everywhere. You wondered what all could be going on, maybe there was someone else here you could pounce or some other fun to be had.

You closed your eyes and listened to see what you could hear going on. The thing that immediately caught your attention and demanded investigating was...
11221111222121.title: Kitten Life

choices: Jump up on the keyboard so you can see the monitor
Check out the glowing pads on the floor
112211112221212.content:
You heard some kind of computer or machine making noise in a nearby room. Considering what kind of machines you had seen in this place previously you wonder what it could be. You get back up onto all fours and pad along the hall until you find the room you think it's coming from. To your horror though the door is closed and you don't see any way to open it.

You sit down at the door and meow at it impatiently hoping someone would open it. No one does. You swish your tail in annoyance as you stand up on your hind legs, bracing yourself with your forelegs against the door and try to paw at the door. It still doesn't open. You fell back onto all fours and looked up at the door in annoyance. How dare this door block you from... things! You didn't even know what things it was that you were looking into, but now that this door has had the audacity to block you from accessing the things you're sure that the things are the most important things in the world.

You shouted a "MROOOOOWL!" of annoyance as you took a few steps back and then headbutted the door. It didn't open, and now your head hurt. You paced back and forth in front of the door in annoyance, trying to figure out how to open the thing. These things had never given you any trouble when you were human. Right, when you were human. Something about that statement, there was something you used to do as a human to open doors, what was it.

Oh right! Door handles!

You walked up to the door again and looked straight up. You could see the door handle way above your head. You stood up on your hind legs again bracing yourself with your forelegs against the door and stretched out as far as you could. You weren't nearly tall even like this to reach the handle. "Meow." You said in annoyance. You sat back on your hind legs and looked up at the door. You then shifted position a little to bit some of the weight on your forelegs while your hind legs raised into the air a little big and your bottom side wiggled.

You stared at the door for a moment longer, completely still and tense.

You sprung from your position, lifting your forelegs off the ground and pushing all of your weight into your hind legs. Then, with a mighty thrusts of your hind legs you launched yourself into the air jumping as high as you can. You came level with the door handle and flailed your forepaws at it trying to grab it. You missed.

You jumped for it again after you landed, and again, and again!

After several tries you finally managed to grab the handle while airborne. However you become alarmed when your hind paws never landed on the ground. Instea your forepaws were wrapped around the door handle leaving you suspended in the air hanging off of the handle. You mewed in annoyance as you tried to swing your body from side to side to get your hind paws onto something that could support your weight.

You suddenly felt yourself sink about an inch to the ground as the door handle turned under your weight. The handle you were hanging onto turned almost 90 degrees to face downward. You lost your gripped and plummeted to the ground meowing and hissing in anger as you were dislodged. You twisted your spine in midair to right your body so that you could land on your feet as you landed. You landed unharmed but your fur was bristled up in annoyance from the sudden drop. You sat down right where you were and started licking your paw then using it to push your fur down over your body until you felt properly groomed and tidy again.

Then you looked at the door and found yourself shocked to see that when you had turned the handle the door had opened just a crack. You stood up on all fours and puffed your chest out smugly as if everything had gone according to plan. You pushed your body against the door and were able to open it up slightly so that you could just fit through the crack of the door and into the room.

You found the sources of the beeping and booping noises you had heard earlier. This room is filled with various kinds of machinery. There's big things that look kind of like a giant space laser out of a cartoon, other things that look like big pods or chambers filled with mist prevent you from seeing what's inside, and little glowing circular pads on the floor. You walk around the room not able to see much from your height. Most of the machines have wires running through them, with all the wires running to a big monitor in front of a some kind of keyboard or control panel against the back wall. You can't really read what's on the monitor from down here on the floor though.
112211112221212.title: Roadblock

choices: One of the lasers goes off and zaps you!
One of the pods open up!
1122111122212121.content:
You're curious just what all these machines do and you figure the computer monitor would probably be able to explain what was going on. You padded across the floor and worked your way to the terminal and the keyboard. You looked directly up at it, your tail swishing as you did. Your whiskers bent forward as your stared straight up estimating the distance, then in a single graceful leap you easily jumped up and landed on the very edge of the keyboard.

From here you could see the monitor itself, there were all kinds of charts and bars going across it, something that looked like a radar, and things that were swirling about on the screen. There were also lots of numbers and equations. You couldn't make heads or tails of it. You started walking across the keyboard towards the monitor to get a better look at it. The keyboard made tick-tack-tick-tack-tick-tack noises as your paws pressed down on the key as you walked. As they did something changed on the monitor.

A red exclamation point appeared on the screen and words ran by the screen in a language you couldn't understand. You realized that you must have made something happened when you had stepped on the keyboard, but you had no idea what keys did what or what you had entered. You looked at the monitor for clues and couldn't figure it out. You swished your tail in irritation to find out what was going on, you didn't have to wait long to see what you had done.
1122111122212121.title: That's Not How You Type

choices: Becoming a very diferent kind of feline
11221111222121211.content:
You spin around looking for anything that's changed in the room. Your paws press down on more keys as you do making even more alerts pop up. You hear a whirring noising coming from somewhere behind you. Turning around you see something that looks like an ACME product out of a cartoon. If you were to say the words 'giant laser' this thing would be the exact image that pops into your mind. It was comically over sized and it was amazing someone had even managed to get that thing into the room since it was bigger than the door.

Or maybe they built it in here.

These were thoughts for later though as the giant laser beam was pointing right at you and before you could so much as move an inch to get out of the way a green beam of energy flew out from the ray and hit you right between the eyes!

You blinked, confused as you weren't hurt from the beam, and in fact felt fine, a little tingly but fine. However you looked over yourself and saw that your entire body was glowing with the same green light from the laser and you started to change. You were...
11221111222121211.title: Zaaaaaaaaaap!

choices: Were only about an inch long
112211112221212111.content:
You turn in place circling yourself on the keyboard as you check everything from your paws to your tail. You were expecting to change again like how you had changed into a kitten awhile ago. You found that everything still seemed to be normal, you were still a kitten. Except, wait. The keys were getting bigger underneath your paws. You looked down, where once your paws were able to press down multiple keys at once each paw was not resting on a single key by itself without going over. You looked around the room, and you noticed the monitor was farther away, the ridiculously over the top laser was bigger, and the floor was much further down from the keyboard than it used to be.

You were shrinking!

You got smaller as the keyboard became a landscape, the cracks between keys starting to look like cracks in a sidewalk. Soon the entire length of your body was able to fit on two keys with your front paws on one key and your hind paws on the other. You looked around dazed in confused as you realized you...
112211112221212111.title: Tiny Kitten

choices: Jump up and down on the keyboard
1122111122212121111.content:
You were only about an inch in length from the tip of your nose to your hind legs. Your tail gave you a bit more length than that when you were swishing it around but it didn't help much. The entire world was so much larger than you now that it was like being in an entirely different universe. The keyboard that had been easily pushed down under your paws earlier you now don't weigh enough to press down individual keys just by walking. If you jumped up and down you could probably still press them, but at least you wouldn't be in danger of setting anything else off on accident.

You looked around, the edge of the keyboard was a way away from you, it took you about a minute to walk over to it and look down. You saw the floor way down beneath you, it was like staring over the edge of a cliff it as so far down. Cats always landed on their feet right?

You looked back at the keyboard, being so small was rather daunting and thrilling at the same time. There was so much more to see now but at the same time it all seemed so dangerous.

You looked back at the keyboard wondering for a moment, If you jumped up and down on the keys you could try to activate the machine again and hope that it reverse the process. Of course it would be a gamble and you'd have no idea what would actually happen. Your other option would be to jump down and leave the machine, keyboard and monitor alone.
1122111122212121111.title: Smaller Than a Mouse

choices: Explore the now giant mansion alone
11221111222121211112.content:
Perhaps messing with the machine would make you big again, or it could make you even smaller! It could do something completely unexpected! You decide in this case it's best not to take risk. Being an inch long and smaller than a mouse was enough for you thank you! You moved to the edge of the keyboard and looked over the edge. It was a long way down, looked pretty daunting. But cats always land on their feet right? You didn't see anyway to climb down, so there was only one way. You closed your eyes and took the plunge.

You had plenty of times to flail your paws wildly and let out the world's highest pitch mewling in panic as you fell. However a few seconds later you landed completely unharmed on your feet. You barely felt the landing. You slowly opened your eyes and checked to make sure all four legs and tail were still attached. Everything was here. You supposed because you weighed so much less now falling was less of a hazard. Either way you decided to skedaddle out of this room now that you were safe before any more zappy things could happen.

It was a good thing the door to the room was still open. It was hard enough to get the thing opened as a normal sized kitten. At your current size it would have been impossible. you ran out the door and back into the hall. Of course now you had a small problem. This mansion had been huge to begin with when you were once an adult human. To your teeny tiny kitten body this place was now impossible big. You remembered there were some rooms including one called a size room that might be useful for now, but you weren't sure if you could still find it. You could wonder around in here lost forever at this rate. Maybe someone who worked in the manor would find you if you got lucky? Of course, if that happened you might live out the rest of your days as their tiny pet in a terrarium or something. Still, nothing was going to happen waiting around.

Whelp! For better or worse you were stuck as a shrunken kitten for now! You might as well have some fun and do something!
11221111222121211112.title: Leave the machine alone

choices: You were as small as a bug
1122111122212121112.content:
The shrinking hadn't stopped yet! The environment seemed to grow around you, the spaces between the keys on the keyboard ceased to look like small cracks in a sidewalk and instead started to look a lot more like holes you could fall into. Now you're body wasn't even big enough to reach two separate keys at the same time. You fit nicely on a single key of the keyboard and didn't weigh nearly enough to actually press the key down.

The distance to the end of the keyboard to get away from here was growing by the minute. It had only been a couple of steps from jumping up here to where you were standing now, but at your current size it looked as if you would have to run for several minutes to reach the end, and you'd have to cross the gaps between keys. Luckily, though they looked deep they weren't to wide and you estimated that you could easily jump them. Realizing that if you didn't move soon you might get stuck you quickly ran for the end of the key you were currently on and jumped to the next one.

It was quite easy with your feline body, you were good at jumping. The problem was you had just been getting smaller and smaller making the distance you have to jump longer and...
1122111122212121112.title: Tinier Kitten

choices: No bigger than a grain of sand
11221111222121211122.content:
You were still getting smaller and smaller!

"Woah! The game actually takes the years off. That so cool!" you say. Normally this would frighten you, but the thought of a challenge gets you excited, so you set to work to collect the books. You are pretty good at it too, as you collect enough to chase the kids around pretty quickly, but as in Pac Man, they start to blink, and soon your cocky way of playing the game has you near several kids, who now aren't afraid of you.

You stand there, naked and frightened. Your whole body begins to tighten, and you stare down at your nude form as you quickly transform. You watch as the nub that was your penis becomes a tiny stem. Your testicles hug up closer to your abdomen, becoming almost indistinguishable. Your arms shrink, and your legs begin to shift back as your hips realign. You collapse onto your now shrinking bottom, and roll back until your head rests upon the floor. Your hair shrinks back into your scalp, until only a few fine strands wrap around your head. The last thing you are aware of is that there is a loud baby crying helpless and pathetic somewhere around you. "Y-you!" you stammer, your cheeks turning red with rage under your newfound coat of fur. "You need to turn me back, right now!"

He smugly checks his nails before replying. "On the contrary, I'm afraid it was your judgment--or lack thereof--that led you here. Not mine. I merely facilitated the means. Didn't you want to give this new life a try?"

You gulp and look at the wide, wide world awaiting you beyond the daycare door. "I changed my mind!" you squeal. "I was just playing around, I didn't want.."

"Didn't want anything permanent?" he chuckles. "It's a bit too late for second thoughts, little one. Enjoy your new life, and by the way...you better get used to those diapers."

He promptly vanishes, and color and motion returns to the world. You begin to cry as your new parents joyfully carry you outside, knowing that you have no way back.

In time, you get out of the tub and dry yourself off. You go back i to the bedroom. The bed looks warm and comfy. On the other hand, you should get back to the machine. In the end, you decide to...
115222222112.title: ...the bathroom.

1152222221122.content:
You go back over to the machine and sit down. It shows you Jennifer's face and the starting screen:

""CHOOSE YOUR DESIRED FORM.

OPTIONS:

(1)PUBLIC FIGURE

(2)PERSONAL ACQUAINTANCE"

You press (2), but the machine responds :

"INVALID OPERATION. LIMIT ONE OPERATION PER USER."

What? you think. One per user? How am I supposed to change back?

You press buttons frantically, but nothing happens.

What am I going to do? I can't stay like this!

You decide to seek out help. You pick up Jennifer's clothes from where you dropped them and put them on. They seem loose, somehow. You decide to check yourself out in the mirror. When you do, you sense that something is wrong, but it takes you a minute to figure it out. You look a little younger! Jennifer is 18, the same as you are, but the image in the mirror looks more like Jennifer did when she was 16. What could be causing this? The age game! Apparently, unplugging it hadn't stopped the penalty it said it would extract. But the machine had said you would be reduced down to zero! Did that mean "zero" as in a newbowrn or "zero" as in nonexistence?

You go out into the hall to seek help. Lord Prosperio is staidning in the hall, as if expecting you.

"Can I help you, my dear?"

You tell him your whole story. Hoe looks thoughtful.

"It seems to me that you two problems, one more serious than the other. The first is that you are trapped in the form of a girl you like, and you want to change back, is that right?"

"Yes."

"I'm afraid that I cannot help you there, my dear. One of the rules of this place is that no ever leaves the way they come in."

"'One of the rules'? But don't don't you own this place? Don't you make the rules? Can't you make an exception"

"It is an interesting fact, my dear, that sometimes even the person who writes the rules cannot break them. You will never be exactly what you were. But, if you search the mansion carefully, and behave wisely, you may find a transformation that is more to your taste. However, you have a more serious problem. You unplugged the age game, didn't you?"

You nod sheepishly.

"It didn't like that, you know, and it's decided to enact the maximum penalty. I cannot interfere."

"You talk about it like it's alive."

"In a way it is.."

"What does it mean, the 'maximum penalty'?"

"I'm afraid that you will continue to age in reverse to infancy and beyond."

"'Beyond'? Does that mean that...?"

"Yes. I'm afraid that you will cease to exist. At least, as you are."

"'As I am'? what does that mean?"

"To be honest, I'm not sure myself. However, if you search the mansion carefully, you may find somehting that will help you. I'd be quick about it I were you", Prosperio said, gesturing down the hall. You followed his gesture, but when you looked back, he was gone.

Looking down the hall, you saw two doors, one that said "AGE" and the other that said "SIZE". Thinking about it, you deicded to try...
1152222221122.title: ...go back to the machine.

choices: ...stay and see what you can find.
11522222211221.content:
The AGE room is set up similarly to the GENDER room. You sit down at the machine. The screen reads:

"ENTER DESIRED AGE (IN YEARS):"


You think about it for a moment. If the GENDER room wa sanyhting to go by, you'll probably only get one chance at this, so you decide to play it safe and enter your correct age. You type in "18" and hit ENTER. Again there is a whir and a red light. When you stand up, you can feel that your clothes seem to fit again. You look into he mirror and see Jennifer's 18 year old face looking back at you. You sigh in relief. That's one problem solved.

You go out into the hall. You see the front door to your right. Part of you thinks you should just cut your losses and leave. Propserio said that you'd never get back to normal anyway. If you left now, you could seek out Jennfier. You know you could convince her, if you could convince anybody. And who knows? Maybe if you leave, this will all turn out to have been just a dream...

In the end, you decide to...
11522222211221.title: AGE

115222222112212.content:
In the end, you turn back into the mansion, to see what you can find. You can always leave whenever you want. You wander the halls, seeing all sorts of rooms that seem to offer all sorts of transformations, but you don't see anything that quite suits you. You do see a room marked INFORMATION, but there is a smaller sign saying "OUT TO LUNCH", so you pass it by. The mansion seems to go on forever. This place is like a TARDIS, you think.

Eventually, you notice that your shoes are starting to seem loose again. Oh, no! , you think. You race back down the hall to a ladies room that you just passed, and step inside. A look in the mirror confirms it, as you see 16 year old Jennifer looking back at you, You panic. If only I'd known this would happen, you think, I would have set my age to 50 or 60. At least I would've bought myself more time!

You think about what to do. Should I go back to the AGE room? I don't know for sure that the machine only gives you one try. Or maybe I could try the INFORMATION room. Maybe whoever works there is back.

In the end, you decide to ...
115222222112212.title: ...stay and see what you can find.

1152222221122121.content:
On the way back to the AGE room, your shoes become so loose that you end up taking them off. When you get to the AGE room, you have to force yourself to look into the mirror. You sob as you realize that you now look about 12 years old. To add to your sorrows, your panties, which are now too big for you, choose this moment to drop to the floor. It doesn't matter so much, since the sundress which had reached down to your knees, now reaches down closer to your ankles. The bra you are wearing is now dangling loose, virtually empty. You reach inside your dress and unhook it and pull it off.

You go over and try the machine. You are unsurprised when you see that it is limited to one operation per user. You pick up your shoes and underwear, and go out into the hall. You see the SIZE room. Would being bigger help? Or should you just go back to the INFORMATION room?

In the end, you decide to...
1152222221122121.title: ...go back to the AGE room.

11522222211221212.content:
You decide that being bigger won't give you any more time, so you head back to the INFORMATION room. You get lost trying to find it. you do find it eventually, but by the time you get there, you're tripping over the bottom of your dress. You catch your reflection in the polished wall surface - you look about nine years old!

When you get to the INFORMATION room, you see with relief that it is open for business. You go inside. Behind the counter is a kindly-looking old man. He seems innately trustworthy, so you pour out your story to him.

He looks thoughtful for a moment, and says:

"Welp, it seems to me as I know two people who might be able to help you, and they're both about an equal distance away from here. So, tell me, which do you want to try - science or magic?"

You think, and say...
11522222211221212.title: ...go back to the INFORMATION room.

115222222112212122.content:
You choose magic because you figure you're going to need a miracle at this point. The old man tells you where to go.

"In that case, you want to go left out of this office, left at the end of the corridor, then right, then right again, then you'll come to a large swan carved out of silver. Touch the swan's beak, then turn around. You'll see a room marked "SPELLS". Go right in there, they'll be able to help you."

You thank the man, then look at your shoes and underwear, They've become a hassle to carry around, as you need both hands free to hold your dress up. You ask the old man if you can leave them there, and he agrees.

As you go out the door, you hear him call out, Good luck, youngster!"

It takes you awhile to find the silver swan. By the time you get there, you're physically about six years old. It's all you can do reach the swan's beak, but you somehow manage it. When you turn around, the hall that was there is gone! All that's there was the promised door marked "SPELLS". You enter the room. It doesn't look much like a place you would find a witch in. It looks more like a comfortable subruban living room.

Sitting on a couch watching TV is a young Japanese (or maybe Japanese-descended) woman, who looks about 18 years old. Perched on the back of the couch is an African grey parrot. When you come in, the woman turns off the TV and looks at you and smiles.

"Hi, honey", she says, "I'm Maria, and this is Stacy. What can I do for you?"


You tell her your whole story. She looks sad, and says:

"I'm afraid I can't stop your reverse aging, but there is something else I can do for you."

"What's that?"


"Well, at the very moment that your age is reduced to zero, I can ensure that your spirit is carried to a safe haven."

"A 'safe haven'?"

"Yes, a new human body, one that will be...appropriate... for you."

"Who will I be? Where will I be?"

"I can't say. I just know that you'll be safe."

"And if you don't?"

"You'll become a wandering spirit. Assuming a spirit-eater doesn't get you, you'll either wander endlessly, which is very unpleasant, or you'll find yourself randomly attaching to a newborn life form. Maybe you'll be a human, but it's more likely you'll be something else. And even if you do become a human, there's no guarantee that you'll be a nice one, or one living in a nice situation. I'm afraid that there are a lot more unhappy people living unhappy lives in this world than most Americans realize. So, what do you say?"

You stop to think about it. It sounds like you have no good choice. On the other hand, Maria is a witch, and though she seems really nice, she could be lying to you for her own purposes. You know you don't have mich time to think it over, so you make a snap decision and say:
115222222112212122.title: "Magic!"

1152222221122121221.content:
You decide to trust Maria. While she prepares for the spell, you converse with Stacy the parrot. She tells you that she was once a human girl who was turned into a parrot by an evil witch. Things being as they were, she accepted a job as Maria's familiar.

"I had no idea there was so much magic in the world", you tell her.

"Neither did I", she replies.

Eventually, you reach a point where you can no longer walk. Maria picks you up and places you on the couch. Soon you are no bigger than a six month old. You're finding it hard to talk, even though the change hasn't affected your mind.

You ask Maria: "Will I 'memba who I am? Don' wanna f'get!"

"I can't say for sure. If you really want to remember, then when I cast the spell, try to hang on to who you are as hard as you can."

You get smaller and smaller, and the world seems to swirl away from you. The last thing you hear is Maria's chanting.

When the swirling stops, you find yourself floating someplace dark and warm and comfortable. You still remember who you were, and everything that happened to you. You have no sense of the passage of time but eventually the place where you are seems to convulse and you find yourself thrust out into a cold place fileld with bright light. Someone smacks you on the bottom, and you yowl for all you're worth!

Suddenly, you hear a voice say, "Congratulations, Mrs. Porter, it's a girl!"

Soon you are placed in your new mother's arms.

A nurse asks, "Do you have a name for her?"

"Yes", you hear your mother say. "Jennifer Anne. Welcome to the world, Jennifer Anne Porter."

This is when it hits you: You've been re-born as "your" Jennifer!

As a baby, you have plenty of time to think about what has happened to you. Was there some "original" Jennfier that my spirit somehow came back in time and displaced? Or was I always Jennifer? That would explain how she always seemed to know what I was thinking. It also would explain why she never wanted a romantic or physical relationship with me, wouldnt it?

And so you begin your life as Jennifer. You do your best not to give yourself away - not to talk too soon, not to show that you know more than you should. You do reasonably well, although someitmes you find people looking at you funny.

When you're five years old, you meet young Steve Thomas, your old male self. You wonder what would happen if you told him the truth, but in the end, you chicken out, and don't say anything to him that you don't remember Jennifer saying to you when you were him. It's fascinating and strange re-living so much of your relationship with Jennifer from her viewpoint, knowing all the things that she would never discuss with you.

The years go by more quickly then you remembered, and before you know it, you're 18 years old. You realize that the day is coming soon when Steve, your other self, will have the accident that leads to him going into Lord Prosperio's mansion and becoming Jennifer. At until now, you've gone out of your way to avoid changing history, but this will be your last chance. Should you do it? Should you warn Steve, and try to keep him from going there?
1152222221122121221.title: "Yes, thank you."

choices: You in alternate reality where you don't enter the arcade or parrot
11522222211221212211.content: You warn your former self of the up coming events and he/you don't seem to believe yourself all you say next is "don't enter the arcade" and with that you are thrown in a paradox loop and trust into another vessel, but who
11522222211221212211.title: Yes.

115222222112212122112.content: that will be interesting. How old is Maria?

what do you do?

121111111211.content:
You looked back at the machine as it said that you were now 1,500 pounds and after minimal thought, you decide to gain over 2,000 pounds. What was possesing you to fatten yourself from the obese 650 you stopped at earlier, to the now 1,500 pounds and counting? You didn't have any idea, but you were definately liking it. And why not take full advantage of your time in this mansion?

Another 100 pounds allows your belly to ooze off both sides of the platform, slowly sagging towards the floor. The extreme weight of your gut is bending you forward, forcing you to grab hold of the support bars on either side of the keypad to remain standing. 1,800 comes just as quickly, the sagging fat on your arms reaching halfway to your wrists. Your neck as a whole was getting packed with blubber. An awkward feeling as your neck simultaneously rolls down your back, over your shoulders, and into the rift created by your man-boobs.

The sheer size of your neck, coupled with the enormous jowls and chins pooling on your chest give the look of a man melting into himself. The top half of your head being the only part still holding its true shape. Your sides, creased with love handles, balloon outwards as you pass 1,900 pounds, burying your shoulders and some length of your arms within yourself. Many folds of back fat flop onto and cover the mound that is your ass, which is itself dangling behind your knees. You try getting a glimpse of your feet when your feel the fat from your calves roll over them and puddle on the floor, but you can barely move your head, much less see past your vast belly, which has long since reached the floor around the machine.

You're a monument. You smile as you survey yourself, reflecting on your thin frame which is now deeply immersed within your burgeoning expanse of blubber. A methodical beeping starts issuing from the keypad, snapping you out of your thoughts. Moving your eyes back to it you see smooth flesh oozing across the keypad, pressing every button it slides across. Your eyes follow the rolls to find that your hands, placed on both sides of the keypad for support, have fattened to semi-spherical blobs. The space between each finger overtaken almost to your second knuckles with bulging rolls of fat.

You carefully lift one hand at a time to keep your balance, lifting all the rolls off of the keypad before replacing it on the bracer. From all of the button mashing, the new display flashes an unbelievable 82 digit number that you've already started gaining.

"I - down't theenk - sho!" You struggle to say. Your jowls and neck making it near impossible to move your jaw properly.

Lifting one of your blob-like hands, you clumsily maneuver it over the largest button marked 'Cancel'. You feel your hand mold around the button before pressing it in with a muffled 'click'. The machine whirrs to a stop along with your growth, allowing your many folds to shift and settle into place against each other. The display flashed your present weight of 2,400 pounds, 400 more than you were going for thanks to your inattentiveness. You weren't about to complain though, the experience alone was more than even you could have asked for. And as you stand there atop the platform, an impossibly huge mound of fat and folds, a thought crosses your mind.

"What now?"
121111111211.title: A Ton of You

choices: You have a strange dream about getting even fatter, and the bed makes it real.
You wake up unable to move, and see Lord Hugo standing over you.
1211111112112.content:
Your legs, aching from the strain of your tonnage, are shooting pain through your body, crying for relief along with your back. From your vantage point atop the platform, you spot the canopied bed situated in the middle of the room, not only does it look comfortable, but it's more than big enough for you even at this monstrous size. You gather strength in your legs and shuffle your feet in place, feeling the fat puddled around them drag on the cold metal of the platform. Feeling discouraged, you let out a sigh, the bed may only be a few steps away from you, but when you weigh over 2,000 pounds, anything not within arms reach is too far.

There's no time to think about it though, you need to rest, as your body constantly reminds you. Not wanting to step on yourself, you shimmy your left foot to the edge of the platform, and as soon as your heel passes you lower your leg, keeping your calf fat hooked on the edge until your foot touches the floor. You keep moving it until you hear a loud 'smack' that echoes off the bare walls, the sound of blubber hitting the ground. Releasing one blob-like hand from the platform, you carefully shift your body weight onto the leg now planted on the ground.

A bead of sweat rolls down your cheek, the enormous effort of moving yourself causing your body temperature to rise. Hurrying now, you start moving your right leg onto the floor, the left one unable to support you alone. Another echoing 'smack', and both of your feet are back on normal ground. Keeping one hand on the platform for support, you sink the other deep into your belly while leaning back as far as your blubber will allow, and with one mighty heave you pull your belly over and off of the platform. Now that you have all of your blubber in one general area, you begin the task of simply making it to the bed.

Your belly, which was oozing across the floor in front of you, was already impeding your path, leaving you no choice but to move sideways, dragging your fat across the floor. If it was pain just trying to support 2,400 pounds, it was nothing compared to moving it. With nothing to brace yourself against, your legs were buckling from the brunt of your weight, while the remainder dragging on the ground was pulling at your back. Muscles were stinging and bones were aching until finally, relief came in the form of an immensely comfortable mattress with plush pillows.

Half sitting, half falling, the top half of you collides with the bed setting fat in motion, an odd sensation as your whole body moved independently, rippling like waves. The strain was lifted from your limbs and back, replaced with bliss and comfort as every curve of your huge form was gently cradled by the bed. With some effort, you pull the rest of yourself onto the bed and sink into it, as it contours to every single one of your rolls, supporting not only you, but your expanse of blubber as well. The bed continues to form to your body, suspending you near weightlessly in a perfect mold. A wave of forced calm passes over you, and your eyes start to close. You struggle to keep them open, but something about the bed is inviting you to sleep, and in your current state you gladly accept and fall quickly to sleep.
1211111112112.title: Oh, My Aching Blubber

12111111121122.content:
Your roased from your sleep as your nose starts twitching. Dozens of differant smells assaulted it, forbidding it from taking in anything but the armoas.

"Smthn smls gd." 'Something smells good." You say through your bloated and heavy cheeks. You struggle to sit up, but sadly for you the side effect of waying more than a ton was that the human body was not built to carry that much. Meaning almost as soon as you tried to get up your fat pushed you back down with all the ease ofan adult pushing a naughty child back onto their seat.

"I cnt ove!" You say in distress. The gravity of what you had become finally becoming apparent.

"No you cannot." Another voice say's.

A whizzing sound suddenly came from the bed as it folded in half and managed to sit you up. You could see past the enormous expanse that was your stomach that the speaker was lord Hugo. You were saved!

"Ord Hgo. Hlp me!" You muffle out.

The slimly built man chuckles. He walks around to your side and pats your arm. "Of course my child." He looks toward the door and raises his hand to the side of his mouth. "You can come in now dears."

The doors flew open and you saw something that shocked you. Twenty servants, ten maids and ten butlers all wheeled in massive carts. Each filled with enough food for a dozen people. The aromas tripled inn instensity, forcing you to gulp to stop any drool from escaping your mouth.

"I do so hope you enjoy this small snack I had the cooks prepare."

"SNCK!!!!

Lord Hugo grinned. He looked at your stomach and patted it gently. "Of course. We wouldnt want you to stop growing now would we. Now when you could spend the rest of your life getting bigger now could you."

You tried to shake your head 'no. However your immense jowls prevented that. The carts began to gather round your bed. Blocking any escape route, if you'd have been able to as much as lift your arms that is.

Hugo looked somewhat pensive now. "This is my sons old room you know."

You listened intently. It was all you could do. The maids and butlers also looked sad.

Lord Hugo pulled an old, beaten sepiatone photo out of his pocket and showed you.

He was enormous in this photo. Nowhere near you now but enough that he'd have had difficulty walked. About 7 or 800 ppounds at least and stuffed into a circus tent pair of black silk pants, a red velvet jacket built for 6 and a gold coloured ascot. Next to him was a woman in a bed, now she was about his size. In fact she looked a lot bigger, easily a half a times as big as you and dressed ontly in bed sheets and a mass of red curls down to her bloated cheeks. Standing next to Hugo was about three kids. All looking like they were on their way to becoming as massive as theyre parents.

"We loved being fat." Said Hugo in a distant voice. "We loved the feeling of dwarfing everyone else, the softness like having pillows under your skin.
