An' de Lawsey up in hebin sayin' do jus' as you is tol'
So I dos it whit' a smile, and neber tries to go astray...

It was a silly, self-deprecating nonsense song. It was a song I'd never heard before. It was a song of truth I'd sung ten-thousand times while I waddled about and scrubbed floors, polished silverwere and ironed "De Massas" suits. As I sang it I smiled and danced, but never once stopped working. I tried to sing something else, but couldn't remember any songs other than the old work songs I'd been singing for most of my 50 years. Inside, I wanted to cry. It was so unfair that something as simple and basic as my own taste and knowledge of music had been taken from me, but outside...

An observer would have seen a cartoon of a woman. An animated, laughing "Mammy" that bumped, bounced and laughed in time to the song she sang. Her 5-foot 3-inch, nearly six-hundred pound body wiggling and jiggling in time with her singing. Never once did she stop cleaning, nor even pause. She glided and danced about as she cleaned, both feeling ashamed of what he'd become and pleased that work was such a joy. Could there be any greater pleasure than a nice, relaxing day of hard labor in the service of the Prosperio family? She didn't think so.

Once she was done with that song, she could feel her head clearing...and though she was still "Mammy Prissy" outside, she could once again feel her real personality bobbing to the surface. She once again wanted to either try to flee or sink into a chair and weep...but as she thought about those things, the words to "Joshua fought the battle of Jericho" suddenly burst from her lips. Then "Swing low, Sweet Chariot". Then "The Gospel Train". Then...

The room was clean. In fact, everything was clean. She was in a room she didn't recognize...and it was clean as a whistle. She waddled into the next room, and saw that was clean as well...and the next...and the next. She glanced at a clock and saw that she'd sang and worked for five hours straight without realising it. Was that possible?

She mumbled aloud "Lawsey. Prissy. Jus' dis' mawnin' you was a free white boy. An now...you jus' a fat ol' mammy workin' fo dees folks. How you eva' gonna get outta heah, Prissy?"

Then...you start to move. You waddle to the kitchen and start brewing tea, making cucumber sandwiches and baking little cakes. When the chimes rang again, she waddled into the next room and served the Lord and Lady Prospero tea.

Lord Prospero said with a sigh "So, this is what you've made of the boy? What a pity, my dear. And yet...I must admit...that you've done a superb job with him. He's perfect, my dear. Just perfect. And the house has never been so clean." then, he turned to me and smiled an indulgent smile, saying "You should be proud of yourself, Prissy. You've pleased your master."

I wanted to scream at him. I wanted to curl my fat fingers into hooks and gouge his eyes out. Instead I smiled at his flattering words, lowered my head and said shyly "I jus' done whut comes natural to an' ol' Mammy like me, Massa Prospero. I's jus' so happy bein' yo property, an' don't nevah wanna does nuttin' 'cept whut you an' de Mistress tells be t' do."

It was a lie...but it was also the truth.

Lady Prospero laughed, and gestured towards the kitchen. "Well spoken, Prissy. Your adapting to your new life admirably. Now, go to your rooms and fix yourself a snack while I and my husband talk of important matters."

I didn't have the slightest idea where my rooms were, but I waddled away and towards the servants quarters...to single door at the end of the hall...and entered a room...

The room was a single room, with an attached bathroom. I peeked in and saw a sink, a huge toilet that could support my bulk, and a comicly large bathtub. The rest of my room was an oldfashoned, grandmotherly assortment of brick-a-brack. A mixed kitchen/living room that lacked a televison, but did have a huge oldfashoned radio. The massive couch had an indent in the middle, and a basket of knitting at one side. The walls were set with shelves, and on the shelves was a vast assortment of figurines and pictures...all of Black Americana collectables. Mammys and Aunt Jemimas grinned at me from every surface and shelf, and though I tried to fight it...I soon started tothink of these absurd, racists images as my ideals...my sisters...my rolemodels. Rotund women with grinning faces and empty eyes were seeming less like objects and more like reflections of my true self. I cooked, and hoping for music I turned on the radio to pass the time. Instead of music, an old episode of the "Great Gildersleve" came on. I listened to the episode, and unconsiously identified with the cheerful "Birdie" - the Glidersleeves housekeeper. Then an episode of "Fibber McGee and Molly" came on, and once again...I began to imagine myself living the life of "Beaulah" the McGees jolly, laughing maid. I realised that these shows were all this radio would pick up, and considered trying to turn it off, butI was busy making a huge mess of Black-eyed Peas and Collared Greens to go with the Mashed Potatoes, Country-fried Steak and Sweet Potatoe Pie I was baking. I'd never even been good with a microwave before, but now I was cooking like I'd been doing it all my life.

As I ate, gorging myself on enough food to feed a dozen people...eating till I felt swollen, bloated and contented...I listened to "Amon and Andy" and laughed along with the insulting minstrel show antics...and as always, I identified with Sapphire Stevens, Ramona Smith and Madame Queen, feeling that these women were like kin to me. They were like sisters. Heck, they WERE me! As I listened all evening, knitting an afghan as I sat on my couch, I replayed every episode in my head, but inserted myself into the episode. It was "Prissy" who was the Glidersleeves housekeeper. "Prissy" who laughed and said "I luvs dat man!" to Fibber McGee. I was "Madame Prissy", the Harlem beautician who Andy romanced. These stories gradually became a part of me.

Durring the The Amos 'n' Andy Music Hall (Durring which I sang and laughed) I set my knitting aside....and waddled into my only other room. The bedroom. I undressed (noting that my closet contained mostly uniforms and a few huge dresses) and lumbered into the bathroom to wash. I sat in the tub and let the hot water wash away the little pains that an obese black woman aquires durring a hard day, and when I was done...I toweled off and went to bed. I put on my nightgown (a huge, pink thing decorated with ruffled and bows, and including a night kerchief for my greying, knappy hair. I laid in bed...filling the bed from one broad, blubbery hip to the other...my massive breasts with their huge, plum-sized nipples hanging off to either side of my torso...and I saw that the cieling was mirrored. I looked up as my huge reflection, and started to sing myself to sleep...

"Mo' tea, Madame Pros'pero." I asked as natural as you pleased, pouring tea and manouvering my huge body about like I'd been doing it all my life. I finished serving breakfast, then started doing the morning dishes. I snacked on leftover sausages as I worked. It would be at least another twelve hours till I could go back to my room and REALLY eat, but I ate continuiously durring the day, never once letting my gluttony slow me down when it came to the housework. I had such a long hard day ahead of me...I started to sing again...

A knock at the door had me drying my hands and waddling to answer it.
122232.title: Master Prosperio runs into Prissy.

choices: Prissy and Bessie works together like that have been doing it for decades.
Prissy and Bessie are able to talk relatively freely while they work.
1222321.content:
As I made my way to the front door, I hear Lady Prosperio walk up behind me.

"Prissy, just open the door. I will talk to my guest."

"Yes, Madame Pros'pero."

So I opened and held the door open, unable to see who was there.

"Is my boyfriend here? I can see his car parked in front of here?"

The woman's voice sounds familiar.

"Come on in dear. I have good news. Would you like a glass of iced tea? Prissy, get two glass while we talk."

"Oh? Thank you. That is very kind."

The woman walks in. With my brief look at her face, it seems that I should know who she as. The strangely familiar stranger sees me and stares at me as I close the door.

Lady Prosperio gives a gentle gentle laugh and says, "Our Prissy is quite the impressive figure."

I kept pondering who she is as I fetch two glasses of tea. I piece together that just yesterday morning, I was a man and that I drove here. Which was strange, I am a mammy and I do not drive. I cannot fit behind the wheel and driving is to difficult and scary for me. But still, that is my car. And the stranger is looking for me, her boyfriend. I start to remember happy times with a young white woman, and I am not an fat old negress.

I feel an impulse to throw the glasses against the wall and scream out loud. "I mutter to myself, "Lawsey, Prissy, I knows dat ma place is here but I's alsa member dats I were a white boy and dat guest is ma gurlfriend. Hows can a mammy has a gurlfriend, Prissy?" I say it softly so that Lady Prosrerio cannot hear me. While I need to talk out loud in order to hear what I am trying to talk about, Massa and Madame Pros'pero do not like to hear it. And then, like yesterday when I got too upset, I started singing. Massa and Madame Pros'pero like it much better when I sing. I sing quietly. And I stop when I get to the kitchen door.

"Doesn't Prissy have a wonderful singing voice?" They heard me. "And she does such a wonderful job here."

I hand a glass to Madame Pros'pero and to our guest, beaming with pride that she had nice things to say about me, a simple mammy just doing her job. But still, I try to glance at our guest as much as I can. I do know her.

"Prissy, finish up the kitchen while we talk." I do not need to listen to their conversation, as much as I want to be around our guest. She stares at me and I am sure that she continues to watch my backside as I go back to the kitchen.

I am in there only a couple of minutes before Madame Pros'pero call me back out.

"Prissy, came back out to the living room. Our guest would like to talk to you."

I am nervous yet excited about being about to speak to a stranger, especially this stranger.

"Is it true that you were not always a maid?" Too many things are going on for me to follow with my simple little mind. I know her voice, I am happy to hear it. Yet she sounds like she can barely believe what she is asking.

I swallow and answer the best I can."Lawsey, I's member bein Massa and Madame Pros'pero mammy fer many years but i's also knows that just yesterday, I be a free white boy."

Madame Pros'pero smiles while our guest looks flabbergasted. "That cannot be true! Stop yanking my chain! No one talks like this!"

I look down at the spot where our guest's feet are at. "Oh, lawsey! I speaks like dis. I swears to our Lawsey in hebin dat I speaks da truth!"

"No! No! No! No!"

"Silence! Both of you silly biddies." I shut up because I cannot disobey Madame Pros'pero. Our guest also shuts up.

"As you will soon learn, Prissy was once _____ _______ but she is not longer him. She is quite happy to be who she now is, a fat and jolly mammy"

"But that is impossible. Also, _____ would never be happy being a racist caricature."

"Silence, Bessie. Let's ask Prissy how she likes being a racist caricature? Prissy, how do you like living and working here?"

"Oh, lawsey! I's dos not know what car, car...carture means. But workins for Massa and Madame Pros'pero is all dat a mammy like me cans hope for. I's jus be so happy to do what dey tel me ta do."

"Are you happy to be here?"

"A mammy needs a house ta cares for and good massas ta tells me whats ta do. I's be very happy."

"Happier than when you were a man?"

"I's be made to be a jolly mammy." I was smiling so hard.

Our guest could just stare at me with an open mouth.

"Bessie, follow Prissy to the servant's room and get her ready for work. You will find a box on your bed"

I waddle to my room, somehow knowing that Bessie will follow. When I get my room, I see that there is now a second bed. It is much smaller then the bed I slept in. As Madame Pros'pero, said, there was a box, just like the one that I got yesterday. Even I know what is going to happen next. I point at the new bed, "Ther's you be. Yous dress will be in de box. I's be sittin on de couch whiles yous gets dressed."

I do not watch as Bessie gets dressed. I went through this yesterday. I do not think Bessie wants me to talk while she becomes a mammy.

After a while, Madame Pros'pero shouts, "That has been long enough you two lazy cows! Get back out here!"

Bessie and I say in unison,"Yes'm, Madame Pros'pero!" Her voice is so high.

I go to open the door and hold it open for Bessie. And finally, I see her. She is so short, she could stand under by boobs. That is if my belly were not in the way. She is dressed like me; wearing a maid's dress that comes down to just below her knees, an apron, flat shoes and a cap pinned into her straightened and graying hair. She is as dark as I am. Her arms and legs seem to be so much shorter then they should be and her hands and feet are tiny. (I would not know until later in the day when we were working but Bessie's arms and hands barely reach above her head. Despite being so small, her ass and belly are round and her boobs are big. Just not as big as if they were on a normal sized woman. Also, she seems to be about the same age I am. Bessie is now a dwarf mammy. And we started working for Massa and Madame Pros'pero at the same time. Two days ago, none of this was true. But now two mammies were walking to our mistress. Dispite being so tiny, Bessie walks much more quickly then I can.

We both stand before Madame Pros'pero as she sits on the couch. She stands up and walks around little Bessie. Bessie barely is as tall as Madame Pros'pero's elegant waist. The entire time, Madame Pros'pero is smiling. I feel sorry for little Bessie, having gone through this yesterday.

I can tell that Little Bessie wants to ask why is she now a mammy. I sac see her trying to work up the nerve to speak. But it is so hard to speak to your master or mistress when she does not want you to speak.

Finally, Madame Pros'pero stands in front of little Bessie and leans down, emphasizing how small Bessie now is. "You may speak, Bessie."

"Wh.. why dids you dos dis to me an Prissy? We's not bes mammies but now...nows we be. Whys ain't we be free white folks nos more?"

"Well, Bessie, those are very good and fair questions. When I first saw Prissy, she already was a robust young Negress. Mr Prosperio met her first and he likes robust young Negresses. I could not have such a hussy lazing about this mansion so I changed her so that Mr Prosperio would not lust for her. But he is happy with what a fine domestic she now is. As for you, Bessie. I felt bad about breaking up a fine young couple like you two. So I am happy to reunite you two."

"B, b, but... yous cans make Prissy a white boy again and lets us be frees peoples."

"Listen here, Bessie! It is not your place to question me. You heard Prissy earlier, she is happy to be who she is. And once you start doing your duties, you will also be happy. As you can see, Prissy is huge. She has a hard time getting down on her knees or reaching down low. So you can help her out when she needs it. I wish that Prissy could control herself and not be so fat. But, alas, she cannot help herself. And she is such a great mammy."

"You are not able to be anything except who you are, you are not intelligent enough nor educated enough to be anything but a mammy. Just like Prissy. Also, I need a domestic staff to take care of this mansion. Prissy, listen up. This is the Transformation Mansion. Soon, Mr Prosperio and I will be opening this place up for business. People will pay plenty of money to be changed or have someone else changed into an other person. We need you two to get the rooms cleaned and ready. And you will help to care for our customers. Your services are needed here. You may now get to work."

I could tell that Bessie wanted to say more. But even more she felt the need to obey and get to work, just like I did.

"Comes witt me, Bessie. I's show you you where wes goes today."

Bessie looks up to me, tears in her eyes. "Okays, Prissy."

Once we are out of Madame Pros'pero's sight, I hug little Bessie against my giant belly. She cannot even reach around to my back. "Sweetums, wes may be just mammies now but wes will bes fine." I grab a paper towel and dry her eyes.

"I's dont know bout that. Lawsey, I was a free white gurl but nows i's jus be a mammy."

"I's knows, sweemtums. I's knows. Let's get ta work."
1222321.title: Say hello to my little friend.

choices: Something seems to change as their True Love starts influencing the magic...
The next day, someone else visits the TransforMansion
12223211.content:
And thus, the lumbering Mammy Prissy and nimble Lil' Bessie began their duties. Slightly dazed by the extreme nature of the changes they'd both been put through, they at first didn't realize just what they were doing. As Mammy Prissy waddled about and wiped tables, dusted shelves and cleaned windows, Lil' Bessie scurried about like she knew exactly what Prissy was going to do. She moved items from shelves ahead of Prissy, sprayed counter tops before Prissy wiped them, and handed Prissy dust rags, paper towels and wet sponges just as she needed them. An observer would have assumed that the two balck ladies had been doing this for decades.

And as they worked...Prissy and Bessie began to smile. It was fun having a helpmate who so understood her that Prissy didn't even have to ask for something before Bessie would scurry to her side. As they moved - two absurd creatures that would have inspired amusement in the people they'd once been - they began to sing. The song was a silly, bouncy, happy work song that neither woman had ever heard...but which also seemed perfectly familiar to them. Prissy sang in a rich, throaty contralto, while Bessie piped along in a high, jolly soprano that was so inflected that it was almost a falsetto.

Froggy wen' a courtin' an' he did ride, uh-huh
Froggy wen' a courtin' an' he did ride, uh-huh
Froggy wen' a courtin' an' he did ride
Wit' a sword an' a pistol by his side, uh-huh uh-huh uh-huh

He rides righ' up to Miss Mousie's door, uh-huh
He rides righ' up to Miss Mousie's door, uh-huh
He rides righ' up to Miss Mousie's door
Giv' t'ree loud raps, an' a great big ro', uh-huh uh-huh uh-huh

It was a silly old folk song that both ladies had known in their old lives. As fans of old folk music and Bob Dylan it was a song they'd both liked, and as they sang they began to smile...and to laugh...and finally to actually dance as they worked, bouncing their bottoms and swaying their hips in time with the song. They went through every course of the song, and when they'd finished they found that the work had flowed by as swift as a running stream, leaving the room glistening and spotless. Still laughing, and now singing another folk song they both knew, they waddled into the next room and started again...

When they'd finished, they chatted merrily and laughed about nothing at all for a few moments...till they realised that the sun was just setting, and at least six hours had passed since they'd begun working. Once again, Prissy looked back and saw how clean the first floor looked, and she shook her head in wonder, saying "Lawsy mercy, Lil' Bessie...dat went by like a dream. Yo sho' is a good worker, girl."

Bessie blushed and lowered her head, fully aware of what had happened to her. She'd been transformed from a free, educated white girl to a fat, old, black dwarf who stood no taller than 3'6" and still weighed almost 200 lbs...but she had to confess that she'd LOVED the time she'd spent with Prissy. She looked up at the obese, old black woman and though she knew she'd once been her boyfriend...yet she felt a powerful attraction to Prissy that was stronger than anything she'd ever felt for...whatever his name was. She giggled and laughed in her somehow very normal sounding falsetto voice (so high and silly and just right for her) and said "Thank yo much, Prissy. Ah Don' understan' how dis can be...but I's real happy bein' like dis wit' yo. Ah knows was a big, tall white girl...but I likes bein' what I is. I trys to 'magine what it'd be like to be all tall an' stuff like dat...but it seem so strange. I kinda feels like I's jus' de right size."

Prissy understood Bessies feelings, knowing she'd been a white boy just the other day...but feeling now that her huge, fat body with it's dark brown skin and grey-streaked hair was somehow...perfect. The feeling of her huge body rolling and bouncing as she waddled along was both a comfort and a pleasure.

"Well, aren't you two just the sweetest things?" laughed Master Prospero from behind them, and both Prissy and Bessie snapped about, bowing their heads and saying "Thanks yo, Massa Pros'pro." in unison.

"Didn't I tell you they were in love, darling?" chimed Madame Prospero by his side. "I knew if we could harness and direct that affection into sisterly love and support, these two would make marvelous workers. Did you see how fluidly they worked together? Like a pair of well-oiled machines!"

To be so lavishly praised by their Master and Mistress was so pleasing that both Prissy and Bessie burst into giggles and tears in unison, hugging themselves in delight and babbling "Thank yo, Massa Pros'pro." and "Yo sho'nuff is kind, Mistress." in genuine pleasure. Had they ever felt such happiness before? Certainly not in their complex and somehow alien lives as college students.

"Yes, such a happy and loving couple you are. Tell you what, ladies...why don't the two of you take off and go back to your rooms a couple hours early this one time. I and my wife have reservations at a resturant in town, so you need not cook dinner for anyone but yourselves tonight. Go back to your rooms - the rooms you've always lived in, you know - and spend some time together...with our blessing."

Prissy and Bessie squealed in delight, and they gushed and fawned over their wonderful, kindly masters. Bessie actually dropped to her thick knees and kissed Mistress Prosperos feet, which made her laugh and pat Bessie in the head like she was a dog. Prissy waved her hands in the air and cried "Praise de Lawdy fo' both o' yo, Massa! I jus' can't b'leve how lucky we is! Jus' yo' waits till de mownin', an' we be makin' all yo' favorites fo' breakfast!"

"And are you two ladies happy with your lives?" asked Madame Prospero.

It was obviously a silly question. Prissy and Bessie giggled and nodded, chiming "We luvs bein' yo Mammys! We don' neva wanna be nuthin' else."

"Good to hear, you two. Now...off to your rooms." he said with a shooing gesture. With a chorus of giggles and laughter, the two women waddled to their rooms. Rooms Prissy had only slept in once and Bessie had only just seen for a few minutes...but rooms they somehow felt they'd lived in together for more than three decades.

They continued to talk and laugh as they made a huge dinner of chicken and dumplings (Bessie was a big eater, but nowhere near Prissy when it came to eating) while they listened to the radio and sang songs they'd known all their lives. Afterwards, they sat and knitted together as they continued to chatter about verious things...before stripping and getting ready for a bath. Bessie looked at her friends giganticly fat body, and thought she looked beautiful and queenly, while Prissy thought that Bessies' chubby little body was the cutest thing she'd ever seen. Prissy helped Bessie into the large tub, then joined her. Bessie enjoyed soaping Prissys' body up, thinking about how largeand beautiful she was...and thinking about how she and her boyfriend had bathed together a few times...but she couldn't remember what her boyfriend looked like any more. In fact...she couldn't clearly remember what SHE'D looked like that morning...
12223211.title: Prissy and Bessie works together like that have...

choices: Another unexpected visitor to the TransforMansion
The Prosperos speak with a paying client about a troublesome spouse
122232111.content:
(My post was too long for a single page! If you don't like the ideas I present here, please continue off the first post. If you don't mind this, then continue from here. I'll understand.)

It started so quickly, that nether woman was aware of it...till it was happening.

Bessie leaned over Prissys' wet, soap-slicked body...and kissed her gently on the lips just as she'd done so often in the past. Prissy was sliding deep into old memories of her old life, as she raised her hands and took Bessies' face in hers...and kissed her back with both passion and desire.

Their programming had made them as close as sisters...but as they relaxed into old, submerged memories and feelings...that sisterly connection became romantic love again. How often had they done this...before? The spells that held them in bondage merged in a strange way, as old, pre-transformation feelings rushed forward again...and they continued to snuggle and kiss...then rinsed and dried...and moved to the bedroom. They moved in a sort of hypnotised, dream-like fog...where old memories and new programming blended together. They were a pair of young, happy college kids. They were a pair of jolly, cheerful sisters. They were a pair of old and dear friends. They were...and had always been...lovers.

Moving with a grace and fluidity that comes from long knowledge of their limitations, the hugely obese woman and the plump, diminutive dwarf - both ageing and weathered by long years of physical labor - moved to the larger bed and began kissing...fondling...touching. In the back of their minds they were in his car after a concert or on her couch listening to old records...but right now they were ageing, black women who deeply loved each other. Bessie (who knew she'd had a different name ages ago, but who LOVED to be called Bessie) kissed her lovers plum-thick nipple on her huge, elephantine breasts liked she'd done so for years. Prissy (good old Prissy) slipped one...then two...then three fingers into Bessies fleshy vagina and kneaded her clit like a pro. This was the way they always made love. This was the person they loved the most. They were perfect together.

The night grew humid and thick as the two black ladies snuggled, moaned and gasped as over and over again they brought each other to climax, knowing that something was wrong...but to deep into each other to care. Nothing was as important as the woman before them. Nothing was as importent as the lover by their side.

Finally, they lay sweaty and pleasantly exhausted in Prissys' larger bed, cuddling and cooing in each others arms, knowing that they'd somehow...broken something. The spells that had been woven about them had been powerful...but their genuine love had warped that magic. Bessie loved Prissy and Prissy loved Bessie...but they also knew what they'd been...and what had been taken from them.

"Ah luvs de Pros'pros...but ah luvs yo more, Bessie." the huge woman said, knowing that she couldn't have said it aloud just a few hours ago.

"Yo is so pretty, Prissy...ah knows ah shouldn't...but ah feels de same way 'bout yo. What if de Massa an' Mistress finds out? You thin' dey try an' change us again?"

Prissy kissed Bessie, and said "Let's not say nuthin' 'bout it, Bessie. Ah luvs workin' fo dem too...but if I had ta chose...I'd chose yo."

They fell asleep that night, Prissy cradling the tiny Bessie and Bessie burying herface between Prissys huge breasts. The next morning they went about their duties making breakfast, grateful for the chance to work together. They still embraced their lives as servants...but were quietly aware that their strongest loyalties had shifted from the Prosperos...to each other.
122232111.title: Something seems to change as their True Love st...

choices: Prissy And Bessie Spend Their Off Day Doing...
1222321111.content:
Life for Prissy and Bessie for the next week was a comfortable routine. In the morning, fixing breakfast for the Prosperios before they ate and cleaned the kitchen. The rest of morning and most of the afternoons were spent cleaning rooms and other tasks that their masters gave them. Because both Prosperios were busy elsewhere during the day, Prissy and Bessie did not have to fix a lunch for them. Late afternoon and early evenings were for fixing and serving the Prosperio's dinner. Only after the dinner dishes were done were they allowed to retire to their room and fix their own dinner.

While Prissy knew that she could work an entire day by herself and find joy in her work, she was grateful that Bessie was with her. She made her job so much more easy. Because of her size, it was difficult to clean low places like under beds and cabinets. And because she could only waddle instead of walk, Bessie made jobs much faster by fetching items she needed.

There was so much more. Prissy enjoyed Bessie's company. This was true in their old lives, before they became mammies. Before, they tried to find time to be together. Now, they were always together. Also, Bessie was the one person she could talk to. While Prissy became ecstatic with any words of praise that either Prosperio may give them, she could not really have a conversation with them. Bessie was the only one that understood who she now was. Personally, Bessie was a huge help. She helped Prissy get dressed; getting her bra on, pulling up her panties, tying her apron and her shoes. And at night, Bessie cleaned the parts of her body the Prissy could not reach.

As for Bessie, she was happy to help Prissy in any way she was needed. In their old lives, at times she wanted to help out her boyfriend more. But both were too busy with their own lives to allow that. While it may seem that she was Prissy's helper and did most of the work, Bessie did not see it that way. She was too short and because of of her very short arms (She could bare reach above her head.) to reach much of any room. Prissy did all of the higher work and did all of the heavier work.

Both were conditioned to find joy in their servitude; any domestic work that they did was the fulfillment of the meaning of their lives. As silly, racist and demeaning as all of the mammy figurines, pictures, posters and kitchen tools that was all over their room were , it served as a constant reminder of who they were and what they aspired to be. The next few minutes were spent running, catching, hugging, kissing and wordless expressions of joy. After they calmed down, they found that they could talk in a normal manner. It was then that they decided that they should check the clothes laid out for them.

Everything was so small. They were so small, barely ninety pounds each. Pammy and Tammy got dressed and proceeded to just start talking. About their old lives as Allen and Wendy. Their time as Prissy and Bessie. Their plans once they became Allen and Wendy again. Though neither realized it, the magical conditioning that made them accept being mammies as their self image remained intact. All of the knickknack that decorated their room were a silent reminder of who the Prosperios wanted them to be.

After a couple of hours of excited talking and random acts of jumping around, the twins realized that they were hungry. They ended up making about one third of what they used to eat but could not finish that. When they took a bath, they found that the tub that Prissy used could fit both ot them easily. It was at that point that Pammy realized that she was now lighter then one of Prissy's thights. And that Lil Bessie was heavier then Pammy and Tammy together. This caused yet an other laughing spree.

At midnight, though they were not tired, they decided it was time for bed. They slept together on Bessie's bed, Prissy's bed just felt too big. They kept talking late into the night. Though as Allen and Wendy and as Prissy and Bessie they were lovers, this night they could only embrace and kiss. But they were not concerned, this would be temporary. When finally they slept, both dreamed of their time as mammies.

In the morning, neither felt the lack of sleep. Both were excited to be going back in their environment. At seven, the strange new chauffeur, Lynn, knocked on their door. The restaurant he, she (It was hard for the twins to tell.) took them to was staffed by waitresses wearing black dresses with white aprons. Being served would have thrown Pammy and Tammy for a loop. For so long, they were the servers, not the served. Add the fact that their waitress was dressed much as they dressed for so long. It took all of their will to keep from running out of the place. Both bare spoke while fighting the urge to clean the surrounding tables.

Once back in the car, they felt free to talk again again.

"Tammy, I am not sure if I am ready to go back to school again."

"Pammy, we must remain strong. If we can get through tomorrow, we can go back to who we really are." Tammy gave Pammy a quick peck on the cheek.

"You are right. But it was so hard to keep from cleaning that restaurant."

"It was for me also."

Once on campus, they were assigned a student volunteer. They both know her but neither were friends, they moved in different social circles. It was easy enough to act like they were strangers. As for the classes they were going to sit in on, they were an introductory computer science and introductory literature class the Pammy and Tammy have taken. But at this time, they were high school seniors, not college juniors working on their majors.

While in one building Pammy and Tammy saw a cleaning cart. Only Tammy noticed Pammy taking a couple of steps towards it. Tammy fought her urge to start cleaning while grabbing her twin's arm and pulling her along. During the classes, both entered into a comfortable routine, sitting through classes both have taken before. Both were so familiar with the routine that both became distracted by the many things that needed to be cleaned. The floors were dirty and needed to be waxed. The windows were filthy. The Prosperios would chew their ears off if the lights at the Mansion had this much dirt. Both were mentally repeating to themselves to ignore their (What they could only think of.) mammy impulse.

During lunch and meetings with other students, most whom they knew, it was possible to mostly ignore the impulse to clean and to serve. But it never went away. During quiet moments, Pammy started thinking of her daughter, Topsy. Though she knew she never gave birth. She started thinking that she would leave her daughter without her mother.

Once Lynn came back to pick up the twins, Pammy and Tammy finally felt free to talk about their day.

"I don't know, Tammy, but I am just about ready to become Prissy again."

"I understand, Pammy. I almost want to give in and go back to being Bessie. It was so hard to keep from cleaning. And life would be so much easier. But I deserve to be Wendy again. And I want Allen to be with me."

They embrace. "Above all, I want to be with you, no matter who we are."

"Yes, but as Wendy and Allen. We must be strong. We must support each other."

Pammy started to weep. "Yes, Tammy."

The rest of the ride was in silence. The twins remained in an embrace as if this would carry them through.
1222321111121111111111121.title: Pammy And Tammy

choices: Are Prissy And Little Bessie Different Now That They know their Past
12223211111211111111111211.content:
Once back in the Mansion, the Prospeios were there to ask how the day was. The terse answer and the strained silence was all Hugo needed to know that they were about to crack. The fight against their conditioning was easy to see. The only question was who would fold. Once one broke, the other would follow.

Once in their room, the twins fixed themselves dinner. Once in the tub together, they finally loosened up enough to talk about their day. The fight against cleaning and serving. The pleasure of being able to have a real conversation. Being able to understand the world around them unlike their time as Prissy and Bessie. They kept talking about the things they realized that they were missing, what they wanted to reclaim. Yet everywhere they looked, they could see their "real" selves on the walls. They could see their closet with their "real" clothes. Pammy kept thinking of her "real" daughter and how much Topsy would miss her if she was gone.

Shortly after the twins went to bed, Pammy knew she made her choice. While tired, she did not feel right in her body. She was missing the heft, the solidity, the wiggles and jiggles, the curves and rolls. She missed how she worked with the out of control body. She felt that she owed a debt to the Prosperios. They gave her and Bessie a job and a home when they were in need. She had to show loyalty to them. Tammy felt the same way. But it was Topsy that pushed Pammy back to being Prissy. She could not leave her daughter alone, even though she rarely saw her.

Pammy waited until Tammy was both out and unresponsive when she move out of her arms. She went to her dresser and pulled out one of Prissy's nightgowns. She had to work herself around the many square yards of cloth and then hold the gown on. Soon, she could feel herself growing. She stood with her feet far apart, where she knew they would be when she was huge. She could feel the familiar weights return, her calves, her thighs, her ass, her stomach, her boobs, her arms, her hands. She could feel the floor settling under her. While her old and fat body was so limiting, it felt comforting to have it back. Whiling having a young and limber body was fun and the prospect of being back in her original body was tempting, being Prissy again fit her self image. As sore and slowing as she felt, it felt right and honest. Prissy crawled into her large bed and quickly feel asleep.

Around four, Tammy noticed that she was alone in bed. Then she noticed the familiar snoring. She awoke with a start, knowing that Prissy was back. As much as she wanted to, she could not wake her up in order to yell at her. As much as she struggled to make it to the morning and reclaim her old life as Wendy, she knew that she wanted to go back to being Lil Bessie. And she could not leave her partner, no matter who he or she was. With a lot of relief, she put on one of Bessie's nightgowns and quickly fell asleep again.

When the alarm when off at five, the mammies went about their routines as if yesterday did not happen. Just idle talk about the day's work.

The Prosperios did not look at all surprised when breakfast was served. They also did not say a word about the last couple of days. At least until Prissy and Lil Bessie start to clear off the dishes.

"Stop. We want to talk to you.," said Lady Prosperio.

Being good mammies, Prissy and Lil Bessie remained standing, across from the table where their masters remained sitting. Both were relieved that they wanted to talk about this situation.

"You have decided to remain in our employment. Why?"

Prissy answered. "You an massa Pros'pros helped me an Lil Bessie when we be out of a job and needs a place to live. We's coul not turn round and leaves."

Lil Bessie piped in, "Also, we's now knows dat we's like being you's mammies. We dint knows dat when we's be Allen an' Wendy."

Hugo asked, "So, you are happy to be who you are and want to stay."

"Yes! We's wants to stay!"

"Even though you know who you were?"

"I's knows that I's used ta work on puters but I's no longer needs to know how ta."

"AndI's knows I used ta knows bout books but I's no need that fancy book lernin."

"Do you want to go back to school and do you want to be Allen and Wendy again."

"Nos. There's be too much ta do here. Also, I woul miss Topsy too much."

"I's be where Prissy be."

Lady Prosperio chimed in, " I want you to say who you are."

In unison, "We's be mammies and we want ta stay."

"Congratulations, ladies. You you have shown that you deserve you status in life." Hugo's smile would be considered scary by an outside observer. But all Prissy and Lil Bessie could think of was the joy because of the praise from their masters, because they chose to become mammies. "You will be with us for many years."

A chorus of thank yous erupt from Prissy and Lil Bessie.

Laughing at how easy it was to turn two intelligent people into happy simple minded servants (Easy if one has access to mind warping magic.), Lady Prosperio says, "Enough playing. It is time to get back to work."

"Thanks be to yous, Massa an' Mistress Pro'spros. We's be happy ta."

"Also. I would like you to sing that Johnny Roach song."

"Happy ta do so."

To Canada old John was bound
All by de railroad underground;
He's got no clothes—he's got no "tin"
He wishes he was back agin.

Gib me de place called "Dixie's Land,"
Wid hoe and shubble in my hand;
Whar fiddles ring an' banjos play,
I'll dance all night an' work all day.

The other day, Prissy and Lil Bessie did not quite understand the meaning of the song, just that it spoke the truth for them. Just like all of their songs. Now they understood and they agreed. They knew their past and they knew they were home.

The sight of a slightly older, professionally-dressed woman in that mirror. A perfect ebony-tinged hourglass figure poured into a sharp skirt suit. "This... really is me now, isn't it?" you think aloud. That sultry voice that made you shudder before... You realize you didn't shudder this time. Was the shock wearing off? Was terror swiftly giving way to wonder and curiosity?

Womanhood was looking like an intriguing place to visit, but you certainly wanted the option of leaving it behind. So, once again determined to get answers, you pull your gaze away from the mirror and notice what's written on the door next to the table.

"The size room!?" you wonder aloud, contemplating the risk of searching for answers in there.

"I would advise against going in there just yet," a voice suddenly calls out. Startled, you stumble back with a high-pitched shriek, once again nearly tumbling over trying to balance in those heels. Ignoring your discomfort, the voice goes on. "You only just went through one major transformation. Undergoing another so soon could lock one or both changes in place for a long stretch. Days, perhaps more."

The thought of having no hope of reversing your gender-shift on demand makes your heart hammer in your chest. Without thinking, you bring your hand up around your heart again, once more having your soft fingertips brush against to exposed bits of your breasts. Man, these things really do get in the way, you think to yourself acidly. But you put those thoughts aside as you turn to face whoever had just showed up.
13121112122.title: You run into an occupant of the mansion.

choices: Have the maid demonstrate the Size Room
Follow the maid to your guest room
131211121221.content:
Turning to face the voice, you see what is undoubtedly one of the mansion's maids standing there in the hallway. She appeared to be in her mid-30s. But then again, considering what had just happened to you just by trying on some clothes, who knew how old she really was? Whatever her actual age, she was definitely as much as a looker as what you've become. Long, luscious brown hair, mesmerizing green eyes staring back at you from behind glasses, a curvy figure, pouty lips, slim waist, sizable bust... Her maid outfit obscured much, the hem of her dress less than a foot above the floor, covering most of the lace-up boots she wore. Still, what you saw was enticing.

Good to know I'm still a guy on the inside, you think as you look the maid over. Then again...perhaps SHE was original a man, too! you belatedly realize. Out loud, you say, "How did you know I've been...you know? And what would happen in there that would complicate things?" You suddenly realize you were probably being too vehement, but the voice escaping you now-plump lips... It sounded angelic to you, so hopefully that would mask any edginess you were feeling.

Whether or not the maid caught on, it was hard to tell. You can't be sure, since most of the light falling on the maid comes from candlebras on tables and wall sconches, but you swear you saw her lips curl up into a grin ever so slightly. "As a denizen of this mansion, one of its dedicated staff, I can simply tell when the one I see before me has been affected in some way," the maid tells you calmly. "And I must say, the changes you've just experienced are far more... PROFOUND than that usually happens to guests that find the room you did. As for what may await in this room... Like I said, inadvisable for you to experiment right this moment, but I could give you a demonstration myself. If you're not interested, I can direct you to a guest room that was just prepared."

You look over to the door that says 'Size Room', then back to the maid. Would stuff in there really do what the room's name implied? Make this made bigger, or smaller? That was physically impossible, but then again, so was women's clothing 'calling' to you, and making you switch race and gender when you obliged. The locks of hair with a completely different color and texture still dangling before your eyes, plus the sensation of just HAVING breasts, having nothing between your legs, and just standing around in heels drove all that home all over again. So your suspicions were certainly have credibility now, and now you are honestly curious.
131211121221.title: It's one of the mansion's maids

choices: "I need you to take me somewhere."
"Would you like to join me in a few hours, when it's safe for you?"
1312111212211.content:
"Well, if you don't mind... Err, I mean, if it won't interfere with your work, I... guess I'd like to see," you tell the maid anxiously.

Again, you're almost certain that the maid is grinning ever-so-slightly at you. She gracefully strolls past you and opens to door, motioning for you to follow. For a moment, you envy how the maid carries herself with such grace and poise. You wonder how an actual woman viewed your attempts to walk in a skirt and heels while carrying a purse; in her eyes, you were probably doing it all wrong. Then again, 'she' may not originally have been a 'she', you remind yourself. Still, as you stare at her ass as she enters the Size Room, you figure it doesn't really matter. This maid is certainly more than feminine enough now!

As you look past the maid, you notice a bed in the far corner, a small circular table with several bottles on it, and some weird machine that's like a booth with a weird telescope-looking thing attached to it. Some sort of shrinking ray? The thought both makes you nervous and intrigued.

"The name is Ella Johnston, by the way," the maid suddenly tells you. You turn to see Ella sauntering towards the table. "I'll do my best to make sure your stay at the TransforMansion is as pleasant as possible while your car undergoes repairs. But just keep in mind, with how I'm about to alter myself, the amount of assistance I'll be able to render will be...limited."

You can only watch in silence as Ella pours the contents of a bottle into a large glass with measurements for volume on the side. After she pours the desired amount of some weird pink solution, she doesn't hesitate to down the entire glass.

Your eyes widen with amazement, the effects are nearly instantaneous. You had guessed Ella's height to be about 5'7" or 5'8", give or take, depending on how much height her boots lent her. But in an eyeblink, Ella had already lost nearly a foot of height, and kept on dwindling away. Her gaze angled up at you as you stood there, frozen in shock, but Ella didn't look perturbed in the least. As if this was business as usual for her. You, however, are numb with shock and astonishment as Ella keeps on shrinking. Her clothes shrank with her, adding to the visual oddities. Ella had already been reduced to the size of a small child, but the proportions were still that of a grown woman, her maid outfit still clinging her voluptuous figure. Those breasts of hers, so big and enticing before, were now no bigger than little tangerines. Those hands, ladylike and dainty before, were now no longer than your thumb, and she was still shrinking! Still, Ella was calm and composed as she continued to shrink and shrink, unconcerned about the enormous black woman a few paces away that was towering over her like the Statue of Liberty. In fact, her look was...could it be...EXPECTANT!? As if she was about to enjoy having a guest of the mansion having such power over her!?

You still stay frozen in place, though balancing yourself in stiletto heels is still a challenge, as Ella continues to dwindle in size. But it looks like the rate of her reduction was slowing down, just as Ella was approaching what looked like Barbie size, but she dwindled even further than that. Ella must have measured her dose so that her shrinking stopped around action figure size. "So, I trust you're convinced of this room's power, now?" the maid calls up in a coy, and now cute high-pitched, voice.

Still shocked into silence, you take a tentative step toward the toy-sized maid. You imagine the sound of clicking heels must be ominous and deafening to someone of Ella's size, but the shrunken maid still does not retreat or flinch. She just cranes her neck up to keep gazing up at you as you stand practically toe-to-toe in front of each other. Ella's head barely reaches your ankle, but that's due to your own heels boosting your height. Still fearful your movements would startle the maid, you take a step back before getting down on one knee. You also lean down more, planting your hands on the polished, wooden floor. This makes your purse plop down on the floor noisily. The knee not on the floor now presses up against a breast, and once again you catch a glimpse of your feminized, race-changed self in the floor's reflection. You ignore all that, now more transfixed by the tiny woman you're trying to get a better look at. Indeed, this was the same voluptuous maid you just met back in the hall. The same knockout proportions, perfectly preserved at this tiny size. The sight of such a hot maid, at such a helpless size, stirred up a tempest of feelings within you. Such a hot babe, reduced to such helplessness? You try to force down such dirty thoughts, and other notions take hold. Protective notions. No matter how calm Ella looked, it didn't change how dangerous being toy-sized could be for her. You half-wanted to snatch her up, just to ensure she was kept safe. But did those feelings stem from your old male self, wanting to protect a lady that caught your eye? Or was it new feminine feelings, directing you to look out for your fellow woman?

As you try to process all this and wrest control of that raging tempest of conflicting feelings, Ella speaks up again. "Now that you've gotten a demonstration, and I'm now toy-sized..."
1312111212211.title: Have the maid demonstrate the Size Room

choices: Put Ella in a front pocket of your blazer.
13121112122111.content:
"I need you to take me somewhere," the tiny maid tells you matter-of-factly.

You can only blink in surprise as you stare down at the shrunken woman. "Wait a minute... You intend to STAY like this for the time being?" you ask her, incredulous. "Why? Isn't there some antidote up on that table or something? And it'd work as long as you didn't change in some other way recently, right?"

For the third time in less than five minutes, you get the notion that Ella is just smirking at you, amused at your incredulity. She simply puts her hands on her shapely little hips before answering. "You're...mostly correct about all that," Ella calls up to you in that now-squeaky voice. "But the truth was, I was heading for the Size Room on top of making sure your needs were sought to as Prosperio's guest."

For a moment, you remain kneeling, staring at the toy-sized maid as you try to make sense of her words. You take slow, deep breaths to counter your anxiety and shock. Of course, this makes your breast smush even tighter against the knee pressed up against your chest. So many alien sensations still, on top of this recent insanity. Naturally, it takes a few moments for the meaning of what Ella said sink in. "Wait a minute, you came this way INTENDING to shrink yourself!? Why in the world would you do that!?"

Now you're certain Ella's been smiling up at you. "For one thing, please keep your voice down. You have no idea how deafening your voice can be to shrunken people." You can only stare back down dumbly, feeling quite chastised. Before you can get over how weird it is to be scolded so easily by someone you can crush under your high heels, Ella goes on. "Secondly, yes, that was the main reason I came down this wing of the mansion. Actually, it's something I do frequently."

"Why's that?" you ask Ella, this time quite mindful of your decibel level. Whether it's old-fashioned lust of a red-blooded guy or how a girl looks out for one of her own, you did feel quite protective of this tiny maid at the moment. "I mean, I understand some people like the adventurous aspect of this...sort of thing. I was curious myself, but... Is there some special reason?"

"A very special reason," Ella replies. "Whenever I can find time, I quite enjoy shrinking myself and then playing with my daughter while in this state. It's a bit of a bonding thing, if that makes any sense. Normally, I bring the concoction to our quarters, but sensing your incredulity, I decided to drink it here."

"Oh. Well...OK then," was all you could say. Tinyfying yourself to better bond with your kid? That's dedication.

"I'd offer to join me. It's more fun than it sounds, believe me, and Jenna is just the sweetest little girl. But again, it's best you not undergo any other transformations, at least not yet," Ella goes on. "So for now, I'll tell you where the guest room prepared for you is, and the quarters Jenna and I share aren't too far away. Anytime you're ready."

Only able to nod, you slowly reach out for Ella. Your hand...slender fingers now, so dainty and delicate-looking, not mention a different skin tone. Still, to someone of Ella's size, it could crush her with ridiculous ease with just one careless move. Ella didn't seem to mind though. She stands firm, not flinching or retreating in the least. Clearly, she had gone through this sort of thing before. You doubt you would be so calm and collected if the situation was reversed, and a gigantic Ella was looming over you to snatch you up. As your hand closes around the maid, you still watch for any signs of discomfort, any signs your gripping her too tightly. It seems, though, that she's still smirking, amused by your pains to be gentle. For a moment, you're taken in by how you can feel her little torso expand with every breath she takes. Thankfully, your thumb is just under Ella's breasts, so no weirdness from THOSE pressing into your hand. You can still feel Ella's tiny heart beating, though. A life literally in your hands...

Ever so slowly and carefully, you lift the shrunken maid off the floor as you rise up. You wobble a little, still not quite at home in stiletto heels. There's a brief admonishing glare from Ella, but it soon fades. Still, it drove home how perhaps it wasn't a good idea to carry Ella all the way back to her daughter. "OK Ella, I'll put you someplace safe," you tell the maid. Eventually, you decide to...
13121112122111.title: "I need you to take me somewhere."

choices: Something happens on the way to Ella's quarters.
You reach Ella's quarters and her daughter without incident.
131211121221111.content:
You look away from Ella and down at yourself, decked out in professional attire for women. How Ella pegged you as a man originally, despite wearing feminine stuff that showed off all your new assets, was beyond you for the moment. At any rate, you're more concerned with finding a safe place for Ella as you navigate these halls. You seriously doubt Ella would want to be put in your cleavage. Besides, that would just feel... too weird. Your white blazer has pockets in the front, and possibly more on the inside (you're not really sure, given your haste to change into something warm before), but given how snugly it hugs your new figure, it might be too tight for Ella. And if you bumped into anything or anyone...

Sighing, you look over at your shoulder, wondering if Ella could sit there, with your hair tied around her waist for insurance. But a quick glance reminds you that might be infeasible with your shoulder-length hair. Still, you catch a glimpse of something else that might help you: your purse.

"Ella, does this purse sound OK to you?" you ask the tiny maid sheepishly. Realizing that you didn't even know what was EVEN IN IT, you fumble around, trying to open it.

"A Chanel purse, on top of everything else?" Ella asks in that squeaky voice, sounding amused. "You do realize that that's a top brand for ladies' accessories, right?"

"Actually, I had no idea," you admit as you finally flip your purse open. In contrast to the black, quilted exterior, the inside is rose-colored. And it looks to be full of all sorts of stuff. A wallet, all sorts of makeup... You pull out what looks like lipstick, and see the same Chanel logo on the tip of the cap. You've never messed with makeup before, naturally, but in your now-dainty hands, the lipstick looks like it belongs there. "Why? Why's that important... Well, I guess it's weird that such an expensive purse was just lying around..."

"More than that, I suspect it only came about after your current transformation," Ella went on. "How did you transform, again? Was it an outfit that seemed to call to you?" Your gaze swivels back over to the maid held in your hand, your mouth now hanging open. "I'll assume that it was. Well, when the mansion changes a man in that manner, it's usually not without reason. Perhaps this is something that will improve your life in the long run, or something you may have secretly longed for. Whatever the case, in circumstances like that, a purse or similar object may present itself, to give clues to the new life that awaits you if you choose."

"If I choose?" you repeat. "You mean...there's still a chance I can undo all this?" You wave your hand around yourself, as if to point out your breasts, longer hair, darker skin, new face, everything.

"Most likely," Ella tells you, with an indifference that annoyed and scared you. "At any rate, is there a wallet in there?" You can only nod to the small woman. "Then there's already a potential new identity for you to assume. Since you cannot leave until your car is repaired, you have time to think on it. As outlandish as it may seem to choose to remain a woman, I urge you not to dismiss it out of hand."

"Were you originally a man?" you blurt out before you can stop yourself.

If Ella was offended by your bluntness, she doesn't show it. "If you wish to know more about me, there'll be time later. For now, I wish to return to my daughter."

A man potentially choosing to remain a woman, having sex with another man, and giving BIRTH!? Ella was right: you weren't in the mood to learn if that was true in her case, what with still coming to terms with your own womanhood. Looking over into your purse again, you move some stuff around to make room for Ella. You carefully set the maid down in the space you created. You look for any sign of discomfort or disapproval, but Ella just looks up at you, kneeling down in your purse as you pull your hand away. She at least nods, and so, with a deep breath, you pull the flap back over and close the purse.

Wanting to get out of the Size Room before something else could happen, you turn to leave. Whereas while walking before, you held onto a purse strap, now you keep your purse pressed against your hip with your hand. You didn't want to risk Ella getting hurt because the purse bounced around, knocking some makeup kit into her or something. For Ella's vantage point, that lipstick was the size of a log, a makeup compact bigger than a tire for a semi-truck! Insane... Having to worry about a tiny woman getting hurt by rapidly-accelerating makeup. MY makeup, if Ella's to be believed! The thought of a purse appearing with much of what would be needed to start a new life... Insanity! But Ella said such a chance shouldn't be dismissed out of hand, and you had a feeling she could be trusted. Maybe. After all, it's not like I have a little advisor between my legs threatening to intrude on my decision-making process, right? you try to reassure yourself. Whatever. Best to just get Ella to her kid, so then I can be alone and make some sense out of all this... Lost in your own thoughts, you barely hear Ella calling out directions from inside your purse. Sighing, you do your best to follow them. Take the first left after turning left once leaving the Size Room, then take the second right...
131211121221111.title: Ella's taking a ride in your purse.

choices: Decide it's time to leave the mansion.
Go to the guest room to try and relax.
1312111212211112.content:
Deep breaths, deep breaths, you keep telling yourself as you navigate the mansion's halls, with the tiny maid in your purse shouting out directions. Of course, the quilted leather of the purse sort of muffles Ella's voice. Maybe I should've just stuffed her between my breasts, you think dejectedly as the maid tells you to turn another corner. You do it so suddenly, however, that you almost lose your balance in those high heels for the umpteenth time. Something that Ella undoubtedly notices, despite your best efforts to keep the maid from being jostled about in your purse.

"Perhaps if you do choose to embrace womanhood to the fullest, don't wear heels until you're entirely comfortable with them," Ella calls out in her squeaky voice.

A good thing about Ella being in a purse, though: harder to mess with her back, you realize as you continue on your way. You just try to concentrate on getting through the halls, doing your best to not dwell on the weirdness of all this. Becoming a woman, changing race, escorting a maid who willingly shrank herself, and doing it all while walking in HEELS. You were getting better at that last part, but it was still an awkward experience. Furthermore, heels made a distinct clicking sound, and the halls making the noise resounding off the floorboards echo punctuated that. It also served to highlight the gloomy unease you felt in this mansion. So far, Prosperio and this maid were the only people you saw. Ella had a daughter, so that was three. But how many others were there? Surely, Ella couldn't do all the work maintaining a mansion this size by herself. Just what was the story behind this creepy place that could feminize and shrink people?

At last, you reach a rather fancy-looking door that must lead to where Ella lives with her daughter, if you understood the maid's directions. You tentatively hold your fist in front of the door, noting how it looks a little smaller than the fist you could make as a guy. Your hand looks so dainty and ladylike, even when balled up into a fist. Then, taking a deep breath, you knock on the door and wait for a response.

It only takes a few moments, but anxious as you are while standing in place in those heels, the seconds seem to drag on. But at last, the door swings open. Looking down, you see a girl you guess to be around six years old, wearing a white t-shirt and pink overalls. She has curly blond hair, and when she looks up... The little bugger is cute as a button, with a button nose to boot along with sparkling green eyes, just like Ella's. Obviously, this was Ella's kid Jenna.

But then Jenna spoke up, ruining the notion that she's naturally a sweet kid. "Who're you? Where's Mommy?" the girl demands.

Sighing, you kneel down before the girl and put your purse down in front of her. Pulling back the flap, you reveal the shrunken maid who tagged along. "Here you go, Jenna. Your mom just wanted to show me how this shrinking stuff works before heading back to you."

Whatever moodiness Jenna was harboring fled as she beamed down at her toy-sized mother. She immediately snatched the maid out of the purse, but if Jenna was being too rough with her mother, Ella kept quiet about it. "You really did it, Mommy? I knew you wouldn't break your promise!" the child beams as she hugs Ella tightly against her chest. Ella, meanwhile, spreads her arms in an attempt to embrace her daughter back as Jenna gently strokes her hair with her finger. Now you're certain that the maid is smiling, overjoyed by this chance to bond with her daughter in this bizarre way.

Once done hugging her mother, Jenna carefully puts Ella in the front pocket of her overalls. "Thank you again... whatever your name is. I suggest you look in your purse to see if you have a name already for this identity. In any case, your guest room is right over there," Ella calls out, pointing to her right. "Take this time to think over what's happened and what Prosperio and the mansion can do for you. Doubtless the master will expect you to join him for breakfast tomorrow. If you need me, though, I'll be here with Jenna."

"We got another guy the mansion called out to to turn into a girl?" Jenna cut in. "I hope he does better than the last guy. There's a reason no one likes driving that BMW anymore..."

Now more anxious than ever, you ask, "What... BMW? What last guy?"

"It's nothing you need to worry about. Again, if you need someone to talk you, I'll be here," Ella tells you quickly. "For now, rest and focus your thoughts."

"Bye-bye new guy-lady," Jenna adds cutely before closing the door, leaving you kneeling there facing it.

Grabbing your purse, you slowly rise. This time, no wobbliness. Wearing heels seems to be becoming second-nature. But now, as you stare down into your cleavage and fiddle with your girl's hair, you're not sure if that's encouraging or frightening.
1312111212211112.title: You reach Ella's quarters and her daughter.

13121112122111122.content:
You entertain thoughts of fleeing the mansion altogether. Of course, your car is useless at the moment, and this mansion is nestled in a remote part of the countryside. You couldn't leave until you found a way to undo these changes. Besides, even if you WANTED to remain a lady, walking alone on a country road dressed like this would be asking for it.

With a resigned sigh, you walk over to the door Ella pointed out. The clicking of your heels echoes in your ears again as you grab the doorknob with your dainty hand. The polished brass... The brief sensation of cold feels a little stronger than when you were a man, the ornate designs on the doorknob digging a little deeper into your palm. Subtle reminders of your transformation to go along with the profound, just as the clicking heels, the bobbing of your breasts, and the purse swinging at your side.

Trying not to dwell too much on all that, you take in the grandeur of your guest room as you take a few tentative steps inside. Your clicking heels seem to echo more profoundly now. The fancy furniture with inlays of silver and mother-of-pearl, the huge, comfy looking bed, the huge full-length mirror with a silver frame with intricate patterns and designs... This digs put any rooms in Donald Trump's hotels to shame! And you notice a door off to the right, no doubt leading to a bathroom equally luxurious. Just how loaded was this Prosperio guy? That would only be half the story, as it contained all sorts of weird stuff that transforms guys it... calls to.

You're so taken aback by the splendor of where you'll be staying, you almost don't notice the small oak table right in the middle, which has a few items on it. Walking up to it, you notice it has some items on it. Stuff you left behind after ditching your old clothes! Your wallet, smartphone and car keys, mainly. But you notice another set of car keys, which are lying atop a note. You set your purse down on the table next to your old stuff and snatch up the note.

I see that you've already undergone one transformation already, and I trust that Ella Johnston has informed you of the risks of undergoing another too soon. I trust she's also alluded to the possibilities of accepting this change, that it may lead to a life more advantageous than what awaited you before. Even I am not certain what that may entail, but your handbag may provide clues. Please take some time to reflect on all this, and if you would be so kind, join me for breakfast tomorrow so we may discuss the possibilities. I could always use a new hire to welcome into the TransforMansion family! In the meantime, I have left keys for a car guests can use. Do not worry about insurance, all drivers are covered, but take care in using your debit card attached to your previous identity should you choose to take a drive. Same with your old smartphone. Again, I hope to see you tomorrow morning!

Oh, and your wi-fi password is Morpheus60706. As Chiwetel Ejiofor said, we're not savages.

Best regards,
Lord Hugo Prosperio

You look over the note one more time, not feeling much better. Nothing new that was concrete, ant any rate. Looking back down at the new car keys, you see the logo on the fob... "A BMW!?" you cry out, suddenly remembering Jenna's offhand comment. That certainly put a damper on any desire to take a joyride. But you decide to do what Ella and Prosperio suggested and open your purse again. You pull out the wallet for this new female persona. Like the purse itself, it's black, quilted-patterned leather, though there's no Chanel logo on it. Flipping that open, you look at the driver's license contained within. Apparently, you are now a 20-year-old woman named Terisa Shonla, the piercing gaze in the photo just like what you glimpsed in the mirror before, only with longer hair and a bob cut. Fumbling through the cards again, you come across a college student ID. Evidently, you're a student at Michigan State University! As a guy, you just graduated high school with top honors and a lot of college credits already, so going into a junior year in a college if you stuck with this new life wasn't too daunting. Fumbling through some more cards in the wallet, you find something for a law student group. This Terisa Shonla was aiming for a career as a lawyer? "Why would Prosperio need someone like that?" you wonder aloud.

Having come across more questions than answers, you put all the cards back and drop the wallet back in the purse. Still looking into your purse, you pull out something that looks like the lipstick, only bigger, blueish-purple and a lot bigger. Opening it up, you see it's a taser. "OK, so I won't be defenseless if I hit the road," you mutter. But then you see the Chanel-brand lipstick you found before, and swap the taser for that. Opening that up, you take in the sparkly, resplendent redness. You didn't remember your lips being all red whenever you saw your reflection. For some reason, you're toying with the idea of trying to apply lipstick, and perhaps other cosmetics.

"What for? Going out tonight might not be a good idea," you tell yourself as you put the lipstick back. But what do you end of deciding on doing?
13121112122111122.title: Go to the guest room to try and relax.

131211121221111221.content:
Still trying to process everything that's happened to you since arriving at this mansion, you stagger back and fall into a cushy chair right behind you, leaving your new purse on the little table. It was a god thing there WAS a chair there, given how heels are still a bit of a challenge for you. So your big butt lands hard onto the chair, and it's then that you realize just how plump it is PERIOD. It was as if you had a pillow attached to the back of your hips! Looking down, past your ample bust, you see your nylon-clad legs dangling over the chair. Belatedly, you cross your legs, figuring that if you were stuck as a black woman for the time being, you might as well get the most out of the experience, learning the finer points of having this body. Somehow, crossing your legs felt natural, and the smoothness of your legs as they brushed past each other... Definitely odd, but somehow, kind of nice. You gaze lingers a moment longer, this time on one of your feet, flexing your ankle as you examine your footwear again. Although still a bit of a pain, it's amazing how quickly you're learning to walk in these things.

Tentatively, you reach out and touch your pump, then your hand travels back upward, stroking across your leg. The sensation of not only your hand brushing across nylon covering smooth, flawless ebony skin, but the feel of a hand stroking your leg... Then you notice your perfectly manicured nails. Your hand still going up your body, it traces the curves your butt makes in your pencil skirt, before finally traveling up to your bust to cup a size DD breast. Even though your hand falls on a part covered by your white blazer, the sensitivity of your massive mammary...

This is still too much, you fume inwardly, leaning back in the chair, covering your face with your hands. Even that reflexive gesture serves to remind you of your softer, more nubile body. Those soft palms pressing down on the smooth skin of your face, not to mention your plump lips and the tips of your bangs. Everything felt so different from when you were just any other white guy. 131222221112.content:
It's so weird, yet strangely delightful, the way the air just rushes between your legs as your skirt ripples and twirls. How there's now nothing under there, but rather you feel some excess baggage jiggle on your chest. You stop your twirling and look down, absentmindedly noticing some locks of purplish-black hair tumbling down. These were hardly the biggest tits ever, but from your perspective they're quite large.

For a moment, you just stand there staring down at your new assets, watching them rise and fall with each unsteady breath. Just... having breasts now was a curious, exciting experience! It takes some time to work up the courage to cup them and feel them through your school uniform. It sends a strange shiver through you, but after a moment you do it again, and look at yourself doing so in the mirror.

"W-W-W-W-Wow," you mutter, smiling at yourself. "I-I-I-I really am the very embodiment of the beautiful, sprightly Japanese girl..." Even your voice was softer, higher-pitched, making you sound demure.

You smile widens. You can't get over how you now give off such a happy vibe, beaming optimism and kindness. That was one big reason why the idea of being a girl fascinated you. Not just what a different body would feel like, but would it change your outlook on life? Make you see things differently, act differently, and most importantly, maybe make you happier?

Not that checking your new female self out didn't excite you. Smiling at your reflection, you wonder if you can see yourself naked, but feared removing your uniform would reverse the transformation. You didn't want to be a guy again just yet, not with so much you'd like to do, but you longed to check out the goods...

Before you can decide, however, the door to the Gender Room swings open. You yelp, a high-pitched squeal that sounds ridiculously cute. Turning back to the door, you see...
