1312222211122.content:
Your giddiness steadily gives way to unease as you see a girl who looks to be a couple years younger than you peer into the room. Wait, in a sense she's probably my own age, you realize after a quick glance back in the mirror. The effects of this uniform, the magic or whatever, probably aged you down physically at least two years.

Looking back, you see that girl has stepped inside. Like you, her face is strikingly beautiful (though unlike your present form she's Caucasian), with makeup and lip gloss expertly applied, complementing her radiant blond hair done up in a ponytail. Only thing is, she looked a tad haughty too, a look complemented the different school uniform she wore. A navy blue blazer with gold trim and buttons, a blue bow tie, blue-and-black plaid pleated skirt, and bluish-black stockings and dress shoes.

"Uh, h-h-h-h-hi," you stammer, trying to control your breathing. The sudden arrivals make you nervous, causing your chest to heave, something now awkward given you're not used to having breasts. "C-C-C-Can I help..." You stop when you notice four other girls wearing the same uniform follow the first blond girl inside. You barely get a chance to scrutinize their faces, however. Out your peripheral vision, you notice that blond girl standing over your discarded pile of guy clothes.

"I take it you're the new arrival Lord Prosperio mentioned?" the girl asks. "The one awaiting repairs to his car?"

"Uh, y-y-y-yeah, I guess," you splutter, feeling surrounded. It was then you realize that in turning into a girl, you lost quite a few inches of height. You guess you're about 5'4", or 5'5" at most. Three of these girls were easily just as tall, the other two quite a bit taller. "So... who are all of you? Prosperio's adopted daughters or something?"

The blond girl chuckles a little, though it did nothing to alleviate tension. "We're part of this mansion's family, I suppose. We all actually go to a private school not too far from here. Monday is actually our last day of the school year."

"Well, congrats. I just graduated too, or rather my old self did," you say. "Ummm, errr, do you know anything, about, well..."

"How you've become a girl?" the blond girl finishes for you. "Why so nervous? It obviously wasn't entirely involuntary. Let me guess, that uniform you're wearing seemed to call to you, didn't it?"

You look down at yourself, grab handfuls of your skirt's fabric, then look back with blushing cheeks. "I'd be lying if I said, 'No'."

"That would signify this is something you must've wanted on some level, some deep desire," says another one of the girls. You glance in the voice's direction. This one was a black girl taller than you, shoulder-length hair done up in a bob cut.

"Ummm, I'll admit I've always been curious about what it'd be like, to, well..."

"Curious about batting for the other team?" the black girl finishes. You look down again, blushing even more.

"Hey, nothing to be ashamed of. This is the 2020s, the country's getting more trans-friendly." The blond girl made a point of sounding sincere, but you still don't feel at ease. It gets worse as she fishes out your wallet from your old clothes and pulls out your driver's license. "And like you said, at this age you'd be graduating from high school. Yet of all the outfits here in this room, the one that draws you in is one that ages you down, would give you a life that'd require working back up to graduation."

"Why is that?" asks the black girl. "Come on, you can tell us. Just us girls, right?"

By now, all five of them had spread out, truly surrounding you. It hits home that going through high school again as a girl wouldn't be smooth sailing. Girls would get bullied too, by OTHER GIRLS who're supposed to look out for each other. That's a stab to the heart for you. "Well, I guess I'm looking back and seeing I didn't accomplish much, not really looking like I'll get into any good college and NO IDEA what to do, and I didn't have the best social life. Not many friends, practially zero girlfriends. So maybe, I dunno..."

"You figured it'd be better to back and do it again as a girl? Do what you wouldn't or couldn't before, and have other girls to do it with, to guide you and lend you support and strength?" the blond girl finishes.

At this point, you work up a little courage and spit back, "Y'know, man or woman, it's annoying to have sentences always finished for you."

At first, you're afraid these girls would get mad. You know a little martial arts, but who knows if you could pull off any in this body and there's FIVE of them. Thankfully, they chuckle a little, hardly sounding offended.

"Ooooh, the new little missy has a bit of fire. Nice," says the black girl.

"Perhaps we can put a word in for Lord Prosperio, find a way to make this permanent and give you new life," says the blond girl. "Starting next school year, maybe you could come with us."

What had once started out as a curiosity, indulging a silly dream brought on by uncertainty and regret, could now be a reality? Your mind goes in a hundred different directions at once. You grab some of your long hair, feeling its silkiness, then look down at your skirt and shapely legs. Did you really want to take the plunge? Take a shot at doing the last few years of high school over again, and do things right?

"It's too soon for you to make such a choice," says the black girl. "But... After talking with Lord Prosperio, we COULD take you with us for our final day on Monday. Show you the school he'd put you in with us, what kind of life you'd be leading."

"Really?" you ask before you could stop yourself.

"When a set of clothing calls someone for a possible new life, so much is provided already." The blond girl holds up a schoolbag not unlike what you see Japanese schoolgirls carry in anime. "You missed this. I glanced inside and it already has documents for you, a new name. If you wish it, Lord Prosperio could make it all permanent. But for now..." Her voice trails off as she looks to the other girls in her clique. You get uneasy at the way they all smirk and nod back to her.

13122222111222.content:
The blond girl saunters up to you, holding the schoolbag that's supposedly yours. She's smiling, but it's a furtive, devilish smile. "It'll be nice to have another girl in our group at school, another roomie here," she says. "But you have to understand, there'll be more to it than that. And we need to know if we can trust you."

You're almost nose-to-nose with her now, and you notice she's probably an inch taller than you. You feel utterly dwarfed by her presence alone, though. You try to ignore the eyes of all the other girls on you. You wonder if they notice your chest heaving from your unsteady breathing. Your own breasts are certainly hard for you to ignore!

"T-T-Trust?" you repeat. "Y-Y-Y-You mean, b-b-b-because I'm actually a guy?"

"You WERE a guy," says the tall, black girl. "So was another one of us."

"And two of us used to be older, one a WHOLE lot older before becoming such a pretty little thing," says another girl with a thick Southern accent. She has reddish-brown hair and a lot of freckles. You also take note of the last two. One is another Asian girl, possibly Japanese as well, about the same height as you but with a pixie cut, her hair dyed a flamboyant pink. The other looked to be more of a Pacific Islander, and was even taller than the black girl.

"We're a rather diverse group. We've all got our stories, and hopefully in due time you can hear them all," says the blond girl. "In the meantime... Walk with me."

The blond girl slings her arm across your shoulders, guiding you toward a window. The two of you walk past that computer with the cameras set up, and the bed. Once you reach the window, she pulls back the curtains, opens it up, and leans through it. After a moment's hesitation, you do the same. You're dimly aware of how this makes your breasts dangle a little, despite how snug your school uniform feels.

"It's a beautiful night out," says the blond girl. "The views from this mansion are quite breathtaking, especially after nightfall. But the night can hide many things too."

"Errrr, sure," you mutter, not sure where this is going. You look out at the grounds, at the flowering trees, and the gargoyle statues lining the outer wall. "Ummm, not sure where you're going with this, uhhh..."

"The name's Brianna," she says. "As for you, you're..." She flips open that schoolbag again and pulls out an ID card. "Ahhh, Miyuki Tomson. Does that name sound right to you?"

You jerk back a little. That certainly was your last name as a guy, but of course you have a more Japanese-sounding first name in this body. "Ummm, I guess. So Brianna, what are we looking at exactly?"

"I'll get right to it, then," Brianna says. "Would you agree there's a lot fucked up in this world?" You're a bit shocked that such a proper-looking girl would swear, but nod dully. "So do I. And as you've just learned, magic exists in this world too. And those who can utilize it... Well, let's just say they cannot ignore the world's fuckeduppery anymore. Deal with it in secret they'll try for now, but sometimes..."

Suddenly, Brianna's hand shot out, and she seemed to draw something in the air with her fingers at blinding speed. An instant later, what can be only described as some sort of 'magic circle' springs to life, glowing with an otherworldly fierceness. Brianna shouts something that might've been English or might've been some language you've never heard, and some sort of blast shoots out, blinding you for a moment. You do, however, see it blast away one of those gargoyles perched on the outer wall. The shockwave from the impact blows past you, making your long hair fly everywhere. Smoke rises from the fragmented stone, which soon fades into the night sky as the light from Brianna's 'spell' dies away.

"Called it. Brianna blew up another gargoyle. Pay up, Nikka," says that girl with the Southern accent.

"Lord Prosperio's gonna get tired of needing to replace those things is all I was saying, Darlene," the black girl shoots back, forking over a twenty.

You're too flabbergasted by Brianna's display of raw power to reflect on how she's done this many times. "T-T-T-That..." you splutter, brushing your long hair out of your face. "T-T-T-That was..."

"Magic? You got it," Brianna beams. "It's kind of like an anime, isn't it? Girls in cute uniforms wielding such power, bound by friendship? I'm going to assume that you're drawn to stuff like that, but it's the latter that does it, not the power fantasy?"

It's still eerie how this girl is getting so much right about you. "Y-Y-Yeah, I-I-I suppose. I mean, like I said, bad with girls anyway, not many friends, plus my mother died when I was young and my father's always pretty distant..."

"Looks like you're no stranger to how rough this world can be, hun," says Darlene. "You'll fit right in. We all got our sad origin stories."

"And if you're so in tune with this mansion's power, that it'll call to you the way it did, perhaps you can learn sorcery as we have," Nikka adds.

This is all happening so fast. Just the thought of living most of your high school years over again, have real friends to rely on, and possibly be happier as the opposite sex, all sounded too good to be true. Now these girls were saying they're magical girls, and wanted you to be one too? Your elation is clearly showing, as the girls can read you like a book, smirking and giggling.

"You're interested, I take it," says Brianna. "Again, we need to get to know you a little better. Thankfully, we've got a little initiation ritual for just that, and it also serves as a trust exercise."

"A... trust exercise?" you repeat dubiously.

Brianna takes your hand to lead to back into the room's center. You shiver at her soft touch, making your breasts heave again, but also you feel a bit of strange energy flow through you.

"I had a talk with Lord Prosperio before meeting the others here," says Darlene. "I know cars, hun. Sounds like those repairs'll take over a week. So you might as well stick with us. If things don't work out, you can just bug out when it's done. What've you got to lose?"

Once again, the girls have surrounded you again, and now they're much closer than before. You suppose they sound sincere, but anxiety remains.

"We need your consent to begin the initiation ritual, Miyuki," Brianna tells you. It's still weird, being called by a girl's name, but somehow it seems a little natural. "May we begin?"

Proof that magic exists, and a chance to have it used to fulfill your fondest wish, and use it for good? It ultimately proves too good to turn down. Your words catching in your throat, you can only nod weakly.

Brianna smiles warmly and steps forward. "Here, hang on to this," she says, handing you that schoolbag. All the other girls step forward as well, joining hands and forming a ring around you. All five begin to chant in unison, and suddenly another one of those magic circles forms on the floor underneath your feet. You look down as a blast of power shoots up, blowing up your skirt. "Eeeeek!" you shriek, trying to pull your skirt down. You can't help but notice Brianna and Nikka smirk and smile again as they continue to chant.

Your breathing is unsteady again, and the surge of power going through you... It makes your breasts feel uncomfortable all over again. Wow, are your nipples getting hard? You try to cross your arms underneath them, but you find you're frozen in place, paralyzed by their spell! Well, you could still move your neck and eyes a little, and that lets you see what's happening...

When you looked ahead again, however, you're plenty weirded out. Before, you were pretty much eye-level with Brianna and nearly a head shorter than Nikka. But now, you notice that Brianna is a head taller than you! She smiles again, noticing you've realized something was wrong.

Yet moments pass, and nothing happens. Slowly, you rise from your cringe and look up. Brianna's holding her huge hand a few inches from you, palm up. Her meaning is plain: climb on.

Filled with doubt, you look up to Brianna. Her gaze was soft, patient, but something told you it was best not to test that patience. Or any of the other girls', for that matter. There's still plenty of your male psyche kicking in your head to get excited about that, weird as it would be. "Besides, this is the Transformansion. Just about anything can happen here..."

The room is empty, except for what appears to be a surgical table and some scientific instruments at the distant center of the room.

Curious, you walk towards the table, wondering how such a massive building can exist inside the mansion. Suddenly, something heavy hits the back of your head with a loud "CLONG!" and everything fades to black.

The world slowly regains focus, and you realize that you're still in the warehouse, but are now lying on the surgical table. You roll your head to the right to see a man whose very appearance defines the term "mad scientist." With his white lab coat, dishevelled gray hair, and maniacal grin, he is an imposing figure. You try to sit up, but are pulled back down by the rubber-lined metal restraints clasped to you wrists and ankles.

"Hello there, my little specimen. I'm Dr. Bane," the man announces. "And I love to make things grow. GROW! HA HA HA!" He cackles for several seconds, as you get a sinking feeling in your stomach. The doctor pulls a remote control out of his lab coat. He thumbs a button, and a strange sci-fi laser descends from the ceiling, aimed directly at you. "You'll be experiment #52. I hope you fare better than the other 51."

He thumbs another button, and the laser fires a blue beam at you. Blue energy envelopes your body. A tingling sensation ripples up and down your senses, but it's more ticklish than anything else.

Suddenly, your perception seems to shift, and the room seems to be getting a little smaller. Your sneakers start to feel uncomftorably tight, as the cuffs of your pants seem to hike themselves up above your ankles. The waist of your jeans is starting to feel like a boa constrictor attacking it's prey. Your t-shirt, once loose-fitting, is now pulling tight, revealing you naval. The shirts collar pulls tight against your neck, and the sleeves stop at the middle of your biceps.

The doctor flicks another button on the remote, and the laser stops. He cackles maddly. "It works! It works! You see, you're six inches taller now!"

You look down, and sure enough, your body seems longer and proportionately wider. The restraints have adjusted themselves to keep you restrained. Now what?
1452.title: Meet the doctor!

choices: Don't move!  You don't know what might happen!
14522.content:
Maybe it's just the idea of becoming taller, or maybe it's a side-effect of the machine, but you're overcome by a sense of fearlessness. You start to laugh confidently. Dr. Bane looks confused, but continues to smile like somebody who didn't quite get the joke.

"That's all?" you finally manage to say. "You made me six inches taller? Well whoop-de-doo! And you call yourself a mad scientist? Ha!"

Anger flashes across the mad-man's face, but is quickly replaced by a twisted grin. "Well then, my little experiment, I think we should proceed to stage 2." He presses a button on the remote again. Once more, the blue laser fires, and the energy flows around you. This time the tingling feeling is even stronger this time, as though ants are crawling on your skin. You look over to the right, only to see Bane is running as fast as he can for a door along the side wall.

That's not a good sign.

Your perception starts to shift again, but much faster this time. Your sneaker burst off of your widening feet, their ragged remnants falling to the floor. The waist of your jeans in unbearably tight, until finally the button pops off, flinging itself across the room. The seams alongside your thighs tear with a loud "RRRRIIIIIIPPPPP!!!" as the cuffs pull up around your calves. Your shirt makes a valiant effort to stay in one piece, pulling tauntly against you ever-expanding body, but finally explodes off of you body like The Incredible Hulk.

During this expansion, the restraints have been adjusting themselves to compensate for your enlargening frame. Now they're starting to feel particularly tight, chafing your limbs. A computerized voice from one of the instruments nearby announces, "WARNING: SUBJECT'S MASS HAS EXCEEDED SAFETY TOLERANCES. DEACTIVATING RESTRAINTS." The restraints pop off. What do you do now?
14522.title: That was a bad idea.

choices: Mess with the machine.  What's the worst that could happen?
Go back out the hallway and look for help.
145221.content:
Without a second thought, you roll off the operating table, the act of which causes your jeans (which now look like ill-fitting clam-diggers) to finally pop off your much larger frame. You hit the ground, and scramble away, knocking over a table of instruments. The computerized voice announces, "ERROR: SUBJECT NO LONGER DETECTED WITHIN TEST FIELD. TERMINATING EXPERIMENT." The beam promptly switches off.

No longer in any immediate danger, you rise to your feet to take stock of your surroundings. You're amazed at how far off the ground you are. The warehouse, still massively expansive, seems a little smaller now. The operating table now looks more appropriate for a child now, surrounded by the torn remains of your clothes.

You look down at your body. Everything is still proportional; your muscles, body mass, even your hair and nails are the same as they were before, just bigger. You seem to tower above your old height. The only stitches of clothing left on your body are your socks (which are actually forcing you to clench your toes together), and you boxers (which are now so tightly pulled against your waist, they look more like briefs). You look down at one of the machine's displays. The now-tiny monitor reads "12 ft. 2in." You've more than doubled in height.

You regain your senses, and take stock of your situation. You could try and fiddle with the machine (although there's no telling what that'll do), you could try to go after the doctor (who seems to have run off through a side door at the far end of the room), or you could go back out into the hallway and try to find a way to reverse your...situation.
145221.title: Well, at least the experiment was a success

choices: Get the buttler to help you.
Screw this, I'll go look somewhere else for help.
1452212.content:
You stride across the room, amazed at how much quicker you move with longer legs. You squat down and squeeze through the sheet-metal doorway, returning to the elaborate hallway.

The hall seems totally different now. The once cavernously tall ceiling now forces you to bend your knees and hunch your neck. The suits of armor look like abnormally large action figures. As you walk down the hall, you accidentally knock over one of the suits, and it crashes to the ground with a series of metallic bangs.

At this point, you suddenly feel very self-conscious. Not only are you running around a strange mansion wearing only your socks and underwear, but you're also a 12-foot tall freak.

After what feels like an eternity of wandering through cramped hallways, you arrive at a set of open double-doors, beyond which appears to be a dining room. The room is filled with maids and buttlers, scurrying about trying to tidy the room and set the table for a meal. You try to slink in unnoticed (ironic, considering your current state), and turn to the nearest buttler.

"Um, excuse me?" you say meekly.

The buttler gives you a sideways glance. "Yes, sir?" he asks snobbishly.

"I, uh, think I need...uh, a little help," you stammer.

"Do you now, sir?" the buttler replies. By this point, most of the other staff have noticed your presence. Several of the maids are whispering to each other and giggling like school girls. You feel even more self-aware than ever, and realize you're probably blushing. What next?
1452212.title: Back in the hall.

choices: Go in, what do you have to lose?
This guy's up to something, I'm outta here.
14522121.content:
As cliche as it seems, you are bigger than this snooty buttler, and you decide it's time to take advantage of your new size. You lay a hand on the butler's shoulder (which is massive enough to cover his shoulder and a good portion of his upper torso), and turn him around to face you.

"Look, buddy," you say with a slightly tougher tone. "I entered this mansion 5' 11", and I intend to leave here 5' 11". Now are you gonna help me, or not?"

The butler doesn't bat an eye lash at you, but sighs and say, "Very well, sir. Follow me." The butler walks around your bulky self, and you turn and follow, but not before bumping you head on the doorway.

As you follow the butler down the hallway, you can't help but imagine what an odd sight this must be: a butler leading a giant through a mansion hallway. Despite this, the few maids and butlers you pass through the halls do little more than nod in acknowledgement at you. You comment as such to your butler as you tug at your tight boxers.

"Hardly unusual, sir," he replies in the same snooty tone of voice. "In fact, this is considered to be fairly calm for a Tuesday afternoon."

You can't help but wander what this place must be like on Friday nights.

After another eternity of walking through cramped halls, you arrive at a door that resembles a hatchway from a battleship. The butler spins the wheel on the door, and gestures for you to enter. Dare you proceed?
14522121.title: The buttler.

choices: The door slams shut before you can leave.
145221211.content:
It takes some effort, but you manage to squeeze through the portal. You're now standing (well, crouching really) in a room crammed with monitors, electronic gizmos, and enought equipment to launch the space shuttle.at the center of the room is another operating table. Standing near this one is a man who looks almost identical to Dr. Bane. The only difference is this one is wearing an incredibly fake pair of glasses with a plastic nose and Groucho Marx-style moustache.

"Welcome!" he announces in the same creepy tone. "I am Doctor Zane! So it seems you've met my twin brother, Dr. Bane!"

You roll your eyes. If you weren't a half-naked giant right now, this would probably be funny.

"Well, we'll just have to do something about that. Pleases, lie on the table."

You look down at the table, which is a bit too small. Hesitantly you lie down on the table, your legs, head, and arms dangling over the sides. The doctor looks up from his equipment, and chuckles. "Woopsie, let me make a quick adjustment..." He presses a few buttons, and several extensions pop out of the table to accomadate your massive frame. Another laser swings down from the ceiling, this one with subtle differences from the last one.

Dr. Zane (or whatever his name is) mutters to himself while flitting about the various read-outs and keyboards. Finally, he pulls a lever, and the laser spits out a red beam. A red energy field surrounds you, and another tingling sensation ripples across your body (although this one feels different from before). Suddenly the room starts to shift, the table seems to be growing larger. Your distressed boxers seem to be shifting of their own accord. Your socks feel like they're stretching out, relieving the pressure on your feet.

The light from the laser fades away, and you sit up. The table feels huge, and the once cramped room feels spacious. A conveniently placed mirror shows that you've returned to your original size. You feel so relieved you could kiss the mirror. The butler, who apparently stepped out for a moment approaches you carrying a silver tray. Lying on the tray are what appears to be exact replicas of your t-shirt, jeans, and sneakers.

"How..." you begin to say.

"The mansion provides, sir," the butler states.

You quickly get dressed, and decide to it's probably not a bad idea to scram. What happens next?
145221211.title: The doctor's twin?

1452212112.content:
The portal swings closed on it's own with a reverberating slam. You spin around in surprise, only to see that the laser has pivoted to face you. Dr. Zane points and shouts, "Fooled you!!!" He throws the lever, and a familiar red beam hits you. You try to dodge the laser, but it tracks your movements.

The tingling sensation returns, and the ceiling seems to retreat away from you. Your toes start to slide away from the edges of your sneakers. Your clothes feel as though they are moving on their own, even though you by now realize that you're shrinking. Your t-shirt hangs off of your shoulders like a sack, and your jeans start to look a size too big.

You look up at the butler, who seems as collected and indifferent as ever to your situation. He's obviously not going to help.
1452212112.title: Here we go again.

choices: Leave and search the mansion for somebody to help you.
14522121121.content:
Not willing to give up your re-acquired normal height so easily, you decide to try to retreat the only way you see how: the portal. Hurrying over to the door, you start to spin the large wheel in the center of the door. To your surprise, it spins freely (you half expected it to be locked). You desperately spin the lock wheel, diminishing all the while. Finally, the door swings open. You rush out the door, and stumble over the lip of the portal (losing your sneakers and stretched-out socks in the process).

Hitching up the waist of your jeans, you turn left and run down the hall, leaving the field of the shrink beam in the process. Without looking back or caring where you're going, you flee down the maze of halls. The corridors, which only a minute ago had seemed uncomfortably cramped, are now caverns wide enough for five of you to walk side-by-side.

After about five minutes, you run into an empty bed room and shut the door. The bed room is extraordinary only for how ordinary it is (which in this house is quite amazing). In the corner is a full-body mirror, which you hesitantly approach. You look like a pre-teen. Your jeans are about two sizes too big. Your t-shirt's collar droops down to the middle of you chest, and it drapes down to the middle of your thighs. You guess that you're about 4 feet tall now.

"Well, this sucks," you announce to on one in particular. "I finally got my old height back, I even get my clothes back, and now this happens."

You spend a few more minutes pouting at the mirror, before finally deciding to take action.
14522121121.title: Try to escape.

choices: Start searching some of the rooms that line the hall.
Keep looking for somebody to help you.
145221211212.content:
The Law of Averages says there has to be somebody in this crazy mansion that will help you. It's just a matter of finding them. You open the door, noting that the door knob has moved to shoulder-height. Hiking up your jeans, you explore the corridors.

You waddle through the hallways, passing by giant-sized suits of armors, monstrous portraits, and the occasional piece of titan-sized furniture. You're not really paying attention to where you're going, too busy gawking at the new perspective you have. So it's a bit surprising when you turn a corner, and Dr. Zane is standing there, fake glasses and all. Surprised, you freeze in your tracks.

"Ah, there you are my little experiment, pun intended." The mad doc reaches into his lab coat, and withdraws a hand-held version of the shrinking laser you saw in his lab. "Now, let's pick up where we left off, shall we?"

He pulls the trigger. Another red beam, another buzzing feeling, and you're shrinking again. The collar of your shirt droops down to the middle of your torso. You grab the waist of your pants, desperate to keep them in place. Suddenly, the beam sputters and dies. Dr. Zane looks at the gun with a confused look. "Darn batteries," he mutters, slapping the back of the gun with his free hand.

You take advantage of the break, turn and run. Admittedly your stubby little legs aren't helping you run any faster, but you're not worried about that right now. Rushing down the halls, you take several turns, hoping to lose any pursuit. At one point, your foot catches in the leg of your pants, and you trip. You hit the ground and slide clear out of your jeans. Still frightened, you hitch up your boxers and leave the over-sized pants behind.

After about 10 minutes of running, you finally stop to catch your breath. A conveniently-placed mirror sits the end of the hall. As you wonder why there are so many mirrors in this bizarre place, you shuffle into it's gaze. You look like a hobbit. You guess that your most recent encounter with Dr. Zane has stolen another 12 inches, leaving you a diminuitive 3 feet tall. Your t-shirt fits you like a dress. Your boxers, which are already stretched and distorted from your recent giant status, need to be held up, lest they join your jeans on the ground. You briefly consider leaving them behind, but reason that if you return to your old height, it would be nice to have some cover around your waist.

Now what do you do?
145221211212.title: Leave and search the mansion for somebody to he...

choices: Sneak up behind her, and follow her.
1452212112122.content:
Firmly gripping your boxer's waistband, you continue walking the halls, desperate to get some help. You take a moment to marvel at how long it takes you to walk down a hallway. Just like your giant state allowed you to take longer strides, your shrunken state forces you to take smaller strides, so even a brisk jog doesn't cover as much ground as you used to.

Finally, luck seems to favor you. Just down this newest corridor, one of the maids is pushing a trolley filled with trays, plates, and cleaning supplies. The woman appears to be older than you, probably in her early to mid-thirties. Her blond hair is tied in a bun on the back of her head, with her bangs framing her face. She's wearing a French maid outfit, which nicely accentuates her curves (and it doesn't hurt that she swings her hips when she walks). Although she's probably a petite woman, she towers over you.

You start to approach her, but suddenly remember that your current situation is thanks to the snobby butler. There's no guarantee she's going to be any better.
1452212112122.title: The maid.

choices: You bump into an old friend.
The maid stops at one of the rooms.
14522121121221.content:
Tired of being messed with by mad scientists, you boldly walk up to the maid, who doesn't really notice your presence.

"Excuse me," you say, surprised at how high-pitched and squeaky your voice sounds (obviously a side effect of the shrinking).

The maid looks down at you, and regards you with a kindly smile. "What can I do for you, young sir?" she asks with a sweet voice and a slight English accent.

You're about to correct her by saying you haven't actually become younger, but then realize that she is in fact older than you are, so she's technically correct. "Well, a mad scientist shrunk me, and I'm trying to return to my old size. Can you possibly help me?"

Despite the ridiculousness of the question, the maid smiles, and says, "Certainly, sir. Please, follow me."

She pushes her cart down the hall, and you struggle to keep pace. She leads you through hallways that don't look much different than the ones you've been exploring, but at least she seems to know her way. After a few moments, she suddenly stops. You peer around her cart. Lying in the middle of the floor are your jeans, still puddled on the floor where you left them.

You blush, but manage to bashfully say, "Uh, those are mine." You can't remember ever feeling this embaressed.

The maid just seems to take it all in stride. She clucks her tongue and says, "How am I supposed to keep this mansion clean when people leave their things lying about?" She promptly picks up the pants, folds them, and places them on the lower part of her trolley.

The two of you continue onward. You both turn around a corner, and...
14522121121221.title: Finally, a little help.

choices: Search for Lord Prosperio, maybe he can restore you.
Maybe if you can find that growth ray, you can return to your old size...
145221211212211.content:
Standing in the middle of hallway, apparently waiting for you, is Dr. Zane, portable shrink ray in hand. He wags his finger at the maid. "Tsk tsk, my dear. You know better than to interfere with my experiments. You know the penalty for that."

He point the laser at the poor maid, and fires. Red energy surrounds her. She has a look of surprise on her face, as she slowly begins the shrinking process. You find yourself unable to stop staring at the scene. The first sign of her condition is her thigh-length stockings, which start to bunch up around her knees. Then her garters start to sag. Her feet slowly begin to slide down her high heels. Her blouse seems to balloon around her, and her white gloves fall to the floor. As she approaches your height, her blouse droops to one side, exposing her left shoulder. She steps out of her high heels, and her stockings and garters fall to the floor. They are quickly joined by a pair of black satin panties that drop from her skirt.

She reaches your height, and continues to dwindle. Her short white apron slides off her waist. A moment later she becomes so tiny, the collar of her outfit slides off her body, leaving her nude. Finally, as she passes the 1 ft. mark, her hair ties become too large for her, and pop off the back of her head, allowing her blonde hair to drop down to her shoulders. By the time the doctor stops the laser beam, the maid is no taller than 6 inches. She looks like a life-like Barbie doll.

Dr. Zane turns to you. "You're next!.....At least, you will be as soon as I get some more batteries." He gestures at the portable shrinker. "This thing eats batteries like they're candy!"

He turns and runs down the hall, disappearing down the maze of hallways. You turn to the shrunken maid, who seems to be fretting. "Oh, foo!" she says in an adorably cute high-pitched English voice. "Now how am I supposed to finish my cleaning?"

This strikes you as an odd thing to say. In fact, she seems more concerned with finishing her work than with her sudden height reduction. "Shouldn't you be trying to find a way to return to normal?" you ask.

The maid reaches into one of the pockets of the now tent-sized apron, and withdraws a handkerchief. She ties it around her body like a toga. "Oh, think nothing of it, young sir. There is no normal in the mansion. Last week I was a house cat until Lord Prosperio realized he needed some one to clean the East Wing. Before that, I weighed 900 pounds."

Your eyes go wide. Obviously this place is more dangerous than you originally thought. You start to walk away as the maid grabs a scrub brush (which is way too large for her), and tries to scrub the floor.
145221211212211.title: The maid's turn.

choices: "We'll climb atop the cart, of course!"
1452212112122112.content: "Hey!" you say somewhat loudly, causing the maid to stop her (futile) scrubbing and look at you. "Dr. Zane has a shrink ray, so Dr. Bane should have a growth ray! Why don't we go look for that?" The tiny maid sighs. "Dr. Bane wouldn't let us use his inventions. And it's against Maid code to steal." You frown. "What if...I use it? Then you're not breaking the rules!" The Maid thought about it for a second, and nodded in agreement. "That could work...if we could find his lab." "You're the maid, cant you find the way?" The Maid rolls her eyes. "This place is magic, its layout is perpetually random to ward off intruders. Fortunately, I have a map...up on the cart." You look up at the towering cart. It looks...climbable, but far too dangerous. "Got any bright ideas?"
1452212112122112.title: Maybe if you can find that growth ray, you can ...

choices: Follow the doctor back into the hallway.
Look around the room, try to reverse the process.
14522121122.content:
Your mind races, trying to figure out what to do, but you're so panic-stricken, all you can do is stand with a deer-in-headlights stare. Your shirt continues to balloon outward, it's hem reaching down past your thighs. You grab the waist of your jeans, desperate to keep the clothes you've just been re-united with.

Looking behind you, you see the portal door, rising like a monolith. The central lock wheel is still within your reach (barely), but is so massive you doubt your tiny arms have the strength to spin it. So much for trying to get out of here. By now your shirt is hanging off one side, exposing your right shoulder, and almost ready to slide off your left. The tops of your sneakers reach up to the middle of your calves, and your pants (still being held up) are now so wide that two of you could fit in them.

As you turn back to face the laser, you get tripped up by your over-seized socks. Losing your balance, you fall on your ass, your shirt collapsing on top of you. Even though you're now lost in a sea of clothing, the laser seems to pass right through, continuing your tingly trip downward. Finally, the laser crackles to a stop. After it takes you a moment to realize you're not shrinking anymore, you start to try to find a way out. Crawling underneath the t-shirt is like finding your way out from a collapsed circus tent. Eventually, you fumble your way out of the neck of the shirt into a whole new world. The room stretches up and out, seemingly forever. Normal sized furniture looks like skyscrapers. The butler (still standing perfectly still) could make Godzilla look like a shrimp. You hold up the edge of the giant t-shirt to try to cover yourself. Your shoes are large enough for you sleep in.

"Well, that worked quite nicely!" says Dr. Zane in a booming voice. "Well, I guess we're done here. How about a frappacino?" he asks the butler.

The butler opens the portal, steps over you and your clothes, and walks down the hallway. Dr. Zane shrugs, and starts to leave. "What about me?" you shout in a voice squeakier than Jimminy Cricket's.

Dr. Zane frowns. "What about you? You've been shrunk to six inches tall. I could shrink you some more, but what would be the point?" The doctor walks out the door, conveniently leaving it open.

With some effort, you manage to tear off a strip of cloth from the t-shirt, and wrap it around your waist like a towel. What do you do now?
14522121122.title: I can't see my house from here!

choices: It's one of your pals.  He's still normal sized.
It's one of your pals.  He's smaller than you!
145221211221.content:
Following that crazy doctor doesn't seem like the best idea, especially if he changes his mind and wants to shrink you even smaller, but what choice do you have? That butler is still with him, maybe he might finally do something to help you.

You run after them, though with your little legs you have no chance of catching up with them. You keep running, however, watching as they walk further and further away. Finally you stop, exhausted and panting for breath. It's only at that point that you realize you hadn't tied that scrap of cloth around your waist as tight as you thought you had. In your pursuit of Dr. Zane and the butler, the knot you had made had come undone, and the cloth slipped off you, leaving you stark naked, once again.

Cursing at your luck, you stand there wondering whether to just continue after the doctor, or head back to either find that cloth or tear another strip from your t-shirt.

Just as you've about made up your mind someone comes around the corner. It's...
145221211221.title: Follow the doctor back into the hallway.

1452212112212.content:
Just as you've about made up your mind someone comes around the corner. It's your pal, Dave, and it looks like he's been a victim of Dr. Zane's shrink ray. He's barely knee high to you, and, like you, also bare naked.

The two of you stand there in shock for a moment. Then Dave gives a rueful smile. "Well, fancy meeting you here. It's a 'small' world after all," he says, his voice also as squeaky as a chipmunk's.

You nod. "Looks Dr. Zane got you too."

Dave nods. "Yeah. My car broke down in front of the mansion yesterday. My cell phone wouldn't work, so I came up to the mansion to see if I could use the phone here. It was going to be a couple hours before the garage would send a tow truck. Lord Hugo said I could wander around while I was waiting.

"While I'm wandering around, I pass by this room. That Zane guy grabs my arm, pulls me in, and before I can do anything, he's got me strapped in a chair and is pointing that ray at me. He zaps me and before I know it I'm shrinking until I'm only 3 feet tall. He shuts it off and runs laughing from the room, saying he can't wait to tell everyone his experiment's a success.

"Well, the straps are now all loose about me, along with my clothes. I slip out from the chair and try and make my way to see if I can find Lord Hugo and see if he can do anything to help me. While I'm wandering around, I run into Zane again. He cackles and says how glad he is to see me, he's got a new experiment to try out on me. He pulls a raygun from his lab coat, aims it at me, and I'm starting to shrink again!

"Soon I'm only a foot tall, my clothes have fallen off me, and I'm still getting smaller. Finally he lets up on the ray gun. I'm staring up at this nut case who's giggling and snickering at what he's done to me. Next thing I know he's running off again and I'm knee high to a grasshopper, or pretty close to it.

"Since then I've been trying to find Lord Hugo or someone in this crazy place who can bring me back to normal. That and avoiding Dr. Zane whenever I see him. At least that's one good thing about being this small, I can hide pretty easily.

You grimace and nod. That might be the only good thing about your current state, it'll be tougher for Dr. Zane to find you. "But you've been here since yesterday, hasn't anyone been able to help you?"

Dave shakes his head. "None of the servants seem to do anything. Says that's not part of their job, there are other servants who help guests. Or, it's all part of the mansion experience, just keep wandering, you'll find a way of changing back. At least they were willing to give me something to eat. Food here is pretty good, by the way."

"Yeah, and at our size, we probably can't eat much. So, where were you going right now?" you squeak.

"I was on my way to Zane's lab again," Dave replies. "I saw him and that butler heading away from here, so I thought I'd try and sneak in and see if I could figure out how to work that machine. Maybe we both can

"Are you nuts?" you ask in astonishment. "Zane catches us he'll shrink us even smaller for sure. He's already shrunk you twice! Let's keep wandering."
1452212112212.title: It's one of your pals.  He's smaller th...

choices: Back into the mansion with you!
145221212.content:
You frown, and look down at the butler. "What's in there?" you ask suspiciously.

The butler arches an eyebrow, and replies in a smarmy voice, "Go in and find out, sir."

"Why don't you just tell me what's in there?"

The butler remains silent. You regard him with suspicion. Even though his offer seems to be on the level, you can't help but feel he's hiding something. The butler sighs, and says, "Either go in, or stay out sir. It makes no difference to me."

That does it. "You know what? Forget it. I'm staying out here." The butler promptly shuts the battleship door, locks it, and goes back the way he came without so much as a word. Shaking your head, you stride off in the opposite direction, hunching down to avoid the low ceiling.

A few moments later, you suddenly find yourself in a wide-open foyer. There before your disbelieving eyes is the entryway you came in from earlier today. You look around, trying to find some kind of trap, or at the very least a size-altering crazy man. When you're convinced that your escape route is clear, you start to reach for the exit.

Suddenly you remember that you've been turned into a 12 foot tall giant, clothed only in socks and boxers. You pull your hand back, smacking yourself in the forehead for forgetting this "little" problem. Still, this is a bit of a quandary: go back into the depths of the mansion, and try to find a cure for your condition (which may or may not exist), and risk never finding your way back out of the maze of rooms and hallways. Alternatively, you could leave now, make a break for home, and try to forget this crazy mansion, it's bizarre owner, and and it's insane occupants. This means you'll have to live as the tallest man in the world; maybe get a job in the NBA. Of course, explaining this mess might be difficult....
145221212.title: An exit?

1452212121.content:
After giving it some thought, you finally work up enough resolve, grab the door handle, and open the door (consequently breaking the door off it's hinges, apparently a result of the added leverage of your extended arms). Squeezing your way out of the entrance, you find yourself out in the open. It's still daylight, but judging by the sun's position it's probably late in the afternoon. A slight breeze kicks up, once again painfully reminding you that your clothing situation still needs to be remedied. You start to consider going back inside, when you hear Dr. Bane's laughter echoing from somewhere behind you. Without a second though, you run down the drive way, and alongside the road.

You marvel at how fast you can run now. Even though you weren't the fastest runner in high school, the new reach of your legs gives you amazing speed. Several of the trees nearby are just above eye level. It's a calm peaceful summer day, and you find yourself grateful it isn't winter time. The only sound other than the waves hitting the shore of the distant beach is the sound of your feet slapping against the pavement.

After a few minutes of running, you finally come to a stop. You turn to look how far you've run, surprised to see that the mansion is now a spot on the horizon. With your attention distracted, you don't notice the car until it's stopped right next to you. You look down in surprise as the door opens and out steps....
1452212121.title: The outside world.

choices: Follow the old ball and chain.
No way, let her see for herself.
14522121211.content:
Out of the car steps a young woman about your age. She has shoulder-length auburn hair, black-rimmed glasses, and a modestly attractive body. She's wearing a yellow spaghetti-strap top, blue jeans, and white tennis shoes. Your stomach sinks with horror, as you recognize her: your ex-girlfriend.

She stares at you for a second, before finally stammering, "What the HELL happened to you?"

"Uh, well....it's kinda a long story," you mumble.

Her face gets an irritated look. "Try me."

You relate to her the story, from your car accident, to the encounter with Dr. Bane. At the end of your story, she regards you with an arched eye-brow. "So basically you're telling me that you wandered into a mansion, and fell victim to a mad scientist who made you grow taller."

"Well.....yeah."

She sighs. "And so your plan was to just run down the road wearing nothing but your boxers?"

"And my socks," you add.

She snickers. "Wow, you really are an idiot. You never could plan anything, could you?"

You roll your eyes. "And you're as helpful as ever."

"Oh, you're right. My bad. Let me go get my shrink ray out of the trunk."

"Well what would YOU suggest?" you snap back.

She puts her hands on her hips. "Let's go back to this mystery mansion, and reverse this." She motions to the car. "Get in."

You regard the beat-up compact car, which doesn't have so much as a sunroof. "No problem, genius. While I'm at it, I can do my impression of Dino at the end of The Flintstones."

She huffs, but concedes the point. You run back to the mansion, your ex following you in her car. It seems strange, returning to the mansion so soon. Still, knowing your girlfriend, she'd probably go and try to fix everything, even if you stayed behind (she always was kind of stubborn like that). And despite the fact that things didn't exactly end on a high note, you don't want to abandon her to whatever else lurks in the house of horrors. You arrive at the mansion, surprised to see the door has already been replaced. In fact, the mansion looks exactly the same as when you first arrived. The ex opens the door, and with her old familiar recklessness storms in. She looks over her shoulder, and half-asks, half-commands, "Are you coming?"
14522121211.title: Oh, great.  It's HER.

You continue to slink through the halls, hoping to find some kind of answer. After a few minutes of wandering, you realize you're totally lost. You sit down on the floor indian-style, and try to think about what to do next.

Suddenly, walking through the intersection in front of you is Dr. Bane. He appears to be reading something on a clip board while whistling "Dixieland." He stops mid-stride in the middle of the hallway, and slowly looks in your direction. His eyes go wide with recognition, and he quickly turns and runs comically down the hall. Seeing this may be your chance to get some answers out of this guy, you scramble to your feet. Of course, you're a 12 ft. 2 in. tall titan now, so you end up banging your head into the ceiling (leaving a sizeable crater in the plaster).

Rubbing your sore head, you start to crawl after the mad doctor. You follow the scientist through the halls, bumping into things along the way. Suddenly, as you turn a corner, you almost smash head-first into another giant, this one a woman. She appears to be about the same altered height as you are, wrapped in a red curtain as a makeshift dress. She looks to be the same age as you, with shoulder-length brown hair, brown eyes, crawling like you are.

The two of you stare at each other for a moment, wide-eyed with disbelief. Finally the two of you (almost at the same time) suddenly remember your partially-clad giant status. She pulls her improvised dress a little tighter, and you tug at your boxers a bit. "So..." you say quietly. "I guess you met Dr.Bane."

The giantess nods sheepishly. "He tied me to a table, and fired some kind of laser at me. He called me Experiment # 53."

"Yeah, I was # 52." The two of you pause awkwardly, until finally you blurt out, "I saw him running this way. Maybe if we find him, he can reverse this!"

She nods, and starts to turn around, but suddenly remembers she's only wearing a large curtain. "After you," she mumbles.

After squeezing past your new ally, you lead the charge after the size-mologist. After some scurrying, you come to a T-intersection. What do you do?

Suddenly from behind you, you hear somebody clearing their throat. The two of you look up in surprise, only to see an older maid standing at the doorway. You stand up, brushing some red hair out of your face.

"You rang, ma'am?" she asks dryly.

It takes you a second to realize she's talking to you. "Well, yes, I used to be a man, but now look at me!" You hold up your arms in frustration, and gesture at your curvacious body.

The maid sighs. "Well, what did you eat?"

Unamused, you put your hands on your widened hips. "So what food changes me back?"

The maid shrugs. "Who knows? There's no guarantee anything here even will change you back. I suppose you could try some foods. Might be better to find Lord Prosperio first." She shrugs her shoulders. "Oh well, if there's nothing else, I'll be going back to my responsibilities."

Before you can say anything, she turns around and walks out of the room. So now what?

You brush your hair out of the way, and turn back to the table, only to see that the lady has taken a slice of cake, and is in the process of eating it herself. She looks at you, and says through a bite-full of pink pastry, "Well, it can't hurt to see what happens."

The both of you sit down next to each other in the large, plush, velvet lined chairs that line the table. You take a bite of your first slice, and the aroma melts in your mouth. You had three slices, reducing you to a precocious nine year-old. The lady (well, girl really) fared a little better with only one slice, bringing her to 15.

The fat on her body isn't just melting off, it's reshaping itself. It eventually settles itself into muscle, and lots of it. Her arms are like steel cables, and her legs look like she could run down a cheetah. Her potbelly has been replaced with a perfect set of six-pack abs. Within the span of a few minutes, she's gone from circus freak to Miss Universe. She looks down at herself, suddenly realizing what happened. She slaps the stop button, and the treadmill whirs to a stop. She steps off, looking at her rippling muscles, then looks up and realizes you're staring at her. She grabs the curtain off the ground, wrapping it around her naked body.

You quickly hop onto the treadmill, and push the start button. Nothing happens. You frown, and hit the button a few more times. "What's wrong?" you say frustratedly. What now?
145221221222112.title: We're here to pump you up!

choices: OK, time to get serious with the butler.
He's just going to give you the run-around.  Keep moving.
145221222.content:
Before you can say anything, the young lady says, "You go to the right, I'll take the left and we'll flush this guy out."

She immediately shuffles past you, and you can't help but admire her shapely legs as she passes by on her way down the hall. She looks over her shoulder, and catches you staring. "Move!" she commands. Not wanting to face the wrath of an angry giantess, you proceed down the right hallway.

Hurrying down the corridor, you notice that the ceiling seems to be getting higher, allowing you to stand back up again. Eventually the hallway opens up into an atrium leading many different directions. Walking towards you is the snooty butler you encountered back in the dining room. He appears to be pushing a cart with several covered dishes on it.

"Oh, it's you again," he mutters, annoyance dripping from his words. You might be able to get some directions out of this guy. He might have even seen where your new giantess friend went to. Of course he wasn't much help last time...
145221222.title: You take the high road...

choices: Try to crawl around and find a way up.
145222.content:
Worried that moving could cause some sort of accident, you lie still, paralyzed by fear. Your body continues to grow at a rapid pace. Your once-baggy jeans cling for dear life to your legs, but finally give up the fight against your expanding frame. Next to go are your socks, which fall to the ground as little more than torn rags. Finally, your boxers, stretched to little more than a strip of cloth, snaps it's spandex band and flops to the ground.

Now naked, you continue to expand, the ceiling now looming closer as the laser adjusts itself to keep out of your way. The surgical table shudders under the weight of your body, before collapsing. Still the laser continues to cause your body to enlarge.

Eventually, just as you think you will hit the ceiling, the computer announces, "WARNING: SUBJECT AS ACHIEVED MAXIMUM MASS TOLERANCE. DISCONTINUING EXPERIMENT." The beam shuts down.

The once spacious warehouse is now so cramped, you barely have enough room to sit up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice one of the readouts that you massive body didn't crush. Squinting, you manage to read, "Final height: 82 ft. 0 in."

You lift up your head, and look at your massive body. You barely recognize the humongous bulk. You're not able to sit up, but you can roll over and crawl around a bit. What do you do?
145222.title: Giant

choices: Go back, and try to find the mansion.
1452222.content:
Rolling over onto your stomach gives you a much better view of the room. You still can't sit up very far, but you can look around easier. Your gaze falls upon the remains of the table and the scraps of your clothes. They are almost unimaginably tiny, far beneath doll-size to your perspective. You try to pick up the rags, but your fingers are simply too large and clumsy, and all you manage to do is push them around the floor before giving up in frustration.

You shimmy across the floor to the far wall. You don't have far to go; your new size fills almost half the length of the warehouse. As you slide across the cold cement floor, you can't help but curse Dr. Bane. At the same time, however, you find yourself feeling an odd sense of curiosity and fascination, idly wondering what the outside world would look like from your new height. Heck you wonder what anything would look like from your new height, since you can't stand up at the moment.

You reach the far wall. It looks exactly like the other three walls, and you're not sure what exactly you'll achieve here, but it feels better than simply lying around. You place a mega-sized hand on the wall, large enough to cover half the wall on it's own. There doesn't appear to be anything here, and in frustration you give the wall a good hefty push.

To your surprise, the wall effortlessly swings outward and upward. It's a secret door, so large it was concealed to your old size. Beyond the new opening, natural daylight pours in. Amazed by this new turn of events, you shimmy forward, and find yourself outside in a massive field of green tall grass (which is little thicker than moss to you). Carefully, you stand up and look around. You tower above the ground, the air feeling crisp and fresh at your new altitude. A few birds fly around, chirping in protest at this intrusion into an otherwise-empty sky. You look behind you. Oddly enough, you can't see the mansion. Only the warehouse is there, with a few foothills behind it. Just in front and a little to the left is what appears to be a small city, complete with medium-sized skyscrapers and everything. Where do you go?
1452222.title: Exploring your new size.

choices: Somebody confronts you about the damage you've caused.
14522222.content:
The city looks interesting (particularly since you don't remember there being any cities near the mansion). Curiosity gets the better of you, and you start walking. Your giant strides leave huge footprints in the ground, so at least you'll be able to find your way back easily enough.

A moment later, you take your first step into the metropolis. Though the streets are wide by city standards, you find yourself shuffling a bit (since your feet are the size of big rigs). Oddly enough, there doesn't seem to be anybody on the ground. All the cars are parked and you can't see any signs of life. You stop at one of the skyscrapers, and lean in to try to peak into the window. Inside, it appears to be a fully furnished office, complete with cubicles and office chairs, but it's as dead as the street level. You decide to try tapping on the glass to see if you can get anyone's attention. Unfortunately, your finger now has the same size and mass as a wrecking ball, so instead of a gentle knock, you knock the plastic window in.

Reflexively, you back away, taking a step back. Of course, you're still in the city, so your foot lands on top of one of the parked cars, squashing it into a perfect pancake. Wincing (not so much in pain, but more in embarrassment), you take your foot off the car, revealing it's new, flatter form.

A sense of humiliation kicks in, and you start to question the logic of coming to the mystery city in the first place. A quick updraft reminds you of your giant nudity, and you wonder what you'd even say to somebody even if you found them in this ghost town. Still, you can't shake the feeling that this place is somehow connected to Dr. Bane.

What happens next?
14522222.title: In the City

1453.content:
You open the door, and to your surprise, it was different than the last room. Instead of a bed, it had several nests along the walls on the floor. There was a sign above it that said, "Mythical Mothers Nests: If you want to have your own mythical creature, why not be the mother of a clutch of them! NOTICE: Once, you are inside the nest, you will be transported to that creature's natural habitat."

You liked that idea, but then you saw a collection of gems in a chest. Above it said, "Dragon Gold: Touch it, and you will never want to let go as you begin to hoard it like a dragon. NOTICE: You will be transported to a cave to become the gold's new guardian."

That also interested you. But there is one more thing that catches your eye. You spot a closet filled with costumes of mythical creatures of all varieties. Which one do you choose?

which room do you want to go to?

You smile a little, "So what you're saying is that I am the superior negotiator?".
"No, you're the one who I can transform at will. It's not your mind, nor the fact that you are an unbearably cute little girl that will convince him. He is a massive poon hound. I'll be turning you into an 22 year-old woman for 24 hours to convince him."

"Don't worry so much dear!" The witch replies, calmly "the potion would change the way you think as well. You would want it, and even though I'm asking you to seduce him, you could easily use your looks to convince him without doing that."

As you regain consciousness, the first thing you notice that you're lying flat on your stomach comfortably. Surprisingly comfortable, actually, like the softest bed you've ever slept on. Looking around, you realize the room is full of those wood shavings... and in fact, the room is bordered on all four sides by bars. You're in a cage! Beyond the cage is too dark to see much of anything. Panicked, you gasp and scramble to your feet.

"AH!"

You hear a loud, shrill woman's voice scream -- as loud as you've ever heard any human voice, like it's on a speaker too loud. You turn around and to your shock see the top half of a young woman beyond the bars of your cage, her face peering down through the room's clear ceiling. She's about the age of 23. She has long, lush red hair, big pouty pink lips and green eyes, wearing a tight black top. She's also the size of your apartment building!

"You're awake! I'm so glad, I wondered if the potion may have knocked you out forever..."

In your shock, you fall back onto your bare bottom. The woman pokes at the side of the cage with her finger.

"You know the leaders of the house didn't think I could make a good potion," she said, seemingly to no one but herself. "Guess they were wrong. Ha! Never doubt Artemis, I told them..."

Artemis! That must be her name -- a name you recognize as the Greek goddess of nature.

"Wha wh--" you try to stammer something. "How did you do this? Change me back?"

She replies with a laugh. "Change you back? No, honey -- I'm gonna have some fun I've always wanted to have in this house. I mean, look how cute you are!"

She places a handheld mirror down at your height, and through the cage bars you're stunned at what you see. Your naked body looks even paler than usual, somehow -- but more noticeable are the fact that your ears have grown to four times their usual size -- well, proportional to the rest of your tiny body. They flop outward from behind your hair. As you turn to the side, another thing catches your eye -- the top of your ass has sprouted a long, thin gray tail! As you're thinking it, Artemis says it: "You're the cutest little mouse-boy!"

You try to scream, but only a squeak pops out. Artemis cackles again as she pulls out a small glass bottle and takes a swig. "Wait right there," she says. "Well, not that you can go anywhere!"

154.content:
"Now this is odd," you mumble to the empty hallway. The sound of your voice does not hang heavy in the air, nor is there an echo. Yet, there is something strange in way it sinks into the walls and floor, as if the mansion is absobing every word and with each, a tiny piece of your inner self.

A bit taken aback, you shout, trying to produce an echo. The mansion absorbs the sound of your shout and for just a moment, seems distinctly pleased.

None of the doors with wizards and whatnot seem inviting. Bored, wondering vaguely what kind of cliche you've stumbled into this time, you back against the nearest wall and contemplate what meaning, if any, Lord Prosperio's cryptic words might hold.

Outside, a clap of thunder rumbles across the countryside. Up near the end of the hall is a half-dead potted plant across from a marble bust. The bust reminds you vaguely of Franklin D. Roosevelt, although you're not sure exactly why. On the wall directly across from you is the portrait of a portly, middle-aged man in a traditional judge's wig and gown. The painter captured a merry twinkle in the fellow's smile, but there is also a certain darkness to the eyes. While not frightening, the portrait is somewhat unsettling. The statue might resemble F.D.R., but if you had to put a name to the man in the portrait you would call him Benjamin Franklin. Although, like the statue, you're not sure exactly why.

Not wanting to linger in the hallway any longer, you reach for the Wizard's door when a flash of light at the far end catches your eye. It can't be lightning because there is no window, and, unless you are mistaken, the flash of light appeared along the seam where the wall meets the floor.

Curious, and knowing full well that curiosity is the first misstep into the ultimate horror movie of cliches, you walk down to the end of the hall to check it out.

As you pass the half-dead potted plant, an odd shadow catches your eye. Pausing to investigate further reveals an iron lever hidden just behind the base of the plant stand.

Lever? Light?

A smile of anticipation plays across your lips. Knowing full well the lever must operate a hidden door at the end of the hall, you step firmly down on it. The hidden door slides open and you step quickly into the passage concealed behind it.

The passage extends into shadow on both sides of the door. Surprisingly, it does not curve back around to follow the shape of the hall. Rather, it simply runs arrow straight in both directions, making you wonder a moment just how wide the mansion really is. The hard part though, is figuring out whether it runs from right to left or from left to right, or perhaps neither.

With a chuckle, you pull a coin from your pocket, twirl it through the air, catch it lightly in one hand, and slap it down on the back of the other.

The metal is cold and hard against your skin. Lifting your hand reveals the soaring eagle of an American quarter-dollar.

15422122212.content:
Everything goes black! You feel yourself falling, or at least it seems like you're falling, but you can't see anything so you have no idea what's going on.

Oh, shit! What did you do?!?

Just as suddenly, you feel ground under your feet, and your vision slowly returns. Wherever you are, it's dark, but your vision is getting keener by the second. You look down at your hands, all clawed and hairy since you pressed the werewolf picture. They still look like werewolf hands, and your feet look like werewolf feet. You can also sort of see your snout in front of your eyes (although it's so close that it's blurry and unfocused, like trying to look at your nose as a human), but you don't have a mirror so you can't see what the rest of you looks like.

You examine your surroundings. Although there aren't any light sources that you can see, you can see fairly well nonetheless - must be one of the perks of being a werewolf. You are in a long, dark, tunnel, its walls built of ancient brick. Through an archway to your left is a stairway that descends down into darkness. On your right is a stairway going up... also into darkness.

"Where the hell am I?" you ask in your gruff new werewolf voice. You weren't actually talking to anyone (since you seem to be alone), so you are quite surprised when you get an answer.

"Oh, sorry," says a disembodied voice. It sounds like the voice you heard when you first entered the room, though all of the impressive tone it had earlier is gone. "I guess I should explain."
"Since you pressed two pictures in a row, I assume that means you wanted a combination of both creatures. However, there's a bit of a catch: After you've chosen one form, if you attempt to gain the abilities of another, you have to defeat that creature in order to gain its abilities."

"WHAT?" you say.

"Basically, if you press one picture, you turn into that creature. If you press another picture without first changing back, you'll have to fight that creature for its power. It's like Megaman."

"...How was I supposed to change back?" you ask, only becoming more confused.

"You press the picture once to change and twice to change back," says the voice, sounding bored. "Duh."

You ignore the insult for the time being. "Is there any way out of here?"

"Once you defeat the vampire lord of this castle, and become a ......vamp..wolf, you'll be allowed to return to the mansion. You can also choose to stay here, though - wherever here is."

"You don't even know where I AM?"

"Look, I don't know everything. I don't make these rules, you know."

"......Does that mean there might be some way to get back without having to fight a fucking vampire lord?"

"I dunno. Could be. Not really my department."

"You've gotta be the most unhelpful magic voice ever!"

"Hey" says the voice, "I didn't have to tell you anything, you know."

"Look, I'm sorry, OK?" you concede. "This is just a lot to take in. Is there anything you can tell me about this vampire guy? Do you think I could take him?"
There is no response.

"Hello?" you ask. Nothing. You look around, and can't help sniffing the air absentmindedly with your new wolf nose. "I guess I'm on my own for now."

You look at the long tunnel ahead of you, and at the stairs on either side. You scratch the back of your neck. God, you think, I hope I don't have fleas.



Which way do you go?

“Have you come to slay the vampire who rules this castle?”

“Only me.” At that, you hear a flittering from the darkness, and from the same direction that the voice came from emerges a little black bat. You’re expecting it to ‘poof’ into a vampire any second, but it doesn’t. However, as it flies closer, you see that this bat has the face of a beautiful woman, with dark hair to match her fur. “Hey, listen,” you say. “I actually got dumped here by some kind of magic painting or something because I wanted to be a vampire, and it said that in order to do that I’d have to, like, beat up somebody who was already a vampire and take their powers. You say somebody’s already done that to you?”

Marcilla looks confused. “Y-yes. Do you mean to suggest that my usurper arrived here the same way you did?”
